1119 , m_return_toolbar()
1120 , m_canvas_type(ECanvasType::CanvasView3D)
1121 , m_gizmos(*this)
1122 , m_use_clipping_planes(false)
1123 , m_sidebar_field("")
1124 , m_extra_frame_requested(false)
1125 , m_config(nullptr)
1126 , m_process(nullptr)
1127 , m_model(nullptr)
1128 , m_dirty(true)
1129 , m_initialized(false)
1130 , m_apply_zoom_to_volumes_filter(false)
1131 , m_picking_enabled(false)
1132 , m_moving_enabled(false)
1133 , m_dynamic_background_enabled(false)
1134 , m_multisample_allowed(false)
1135 , m_moving(false)
1136 , m_tab_down(false)
1137 , m_cursor_type(Standard)
1138 , m_color_by("volume")
1139 , m_reload_delayed(false)
1140#if ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1141 , m_show_picking_texture(false)
1142#endif // ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1143 , m_render_sla_auxiliaries(true)
1144 , m_labels(*this)
1145 , m_slope(m_volumes)
1146{
1147 if (m_canvas != nullptr) {
1148 m_timer.SetOwner(m_canvas);
1149 m_render_timer.SetOwner(m_canvas);
1150#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
1151 m_retina_helper.reset(new RetinaHelper(canvas));
1152#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
1153 }
1154
1155 load_arrange_settings();
1156
1157 m_selection.set_volumes(&m_volumes.volumes);
1158}

◆ _check_and_update_toolbar_icon_scale()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_check_and_update_toolbar_icon_scale ( )
private
6935{
6936 // Don't update a toolbar scale, when we are on a Preview
6937 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_preview_shown())
6938 {
6939
6940#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6941 IMSlider* m_layers_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_layers_slider();
6942 IMSlider* m_moves_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_moves_slider();
6943 const float sc = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
6944 m_layers_slider->set_scale(sc);
6945 m_moves_slider->set_scale(sc);
6946 m_gcode_viewer.set_scale(sc);
6947
6948 auto* m_notification = wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager();
6949 m_notification->set_scale(sc);
6950
6951#endif
6952 return;
6953 }
6954
6955 float scale = wxGetApp().toolbar_icon_scale();
6956 Size cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
6957
6958 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
6959 float size = GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size * scale;
6960 //float main_size = GLGizmosManager::Default_Icons_Size * scale;
6961
6962 // Set current size for all top toolbars. It will be used for next calculations
6963 GLToolbar& collapse_toolbar = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar();
6964#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6965 const float sc = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor() * scale;
6966 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
6967 m_main_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6968 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6969 m_separator_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6970 collapse_toolbar.set_scale(sc);
6971 size *= m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
6972
6973 auto* m_notification = wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager();
6974 m_notification->set_scale(sc);
6975#else
6976 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
6977 m_main_toolbar.set_icons_size(GLGizmosManager::Default_Icons_Size * scale);
6978 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6979 m_separator_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6980 collapse_toolbar.set_icons_size(size);
6981#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
6982
6983 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
6984#if BBS_TOOLBAR_ON_TOP
6985 float collapse_toolbar_width = collapse_toolbar.is_enabled() ? collapse_toolbar.get_width() : GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size;
6986
6987 float top_tb_width = m_main_toolbar.get_width() + m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_width() + m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width() + m_separator_toolbar.get_width() + collapse_toolbar_width;
6988 int items_cnt = m_main_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + m_gizmos.get_selectable_icons_cnt() + m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + m_separator_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + collapse_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt();
6989 float noitems_width = top_tb_width - size * items_cnt; // width of separators and borders in top toolbars
6990
6991 // calculate scale needed for items in all top toolbars
6992#ifdef __WINDOWS__
6993 cnv_size.set_width(cnv_size.get_width() + m_separator_toolbar.get_width() + collapse_toolbar_width);
6994#endif
6995 float new_h_scale = (cnv_size.get_width() - noitems_width) / (items_cnt * GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size);
6996
6997 //for protect
6998 if (new_h_scale <= 0) {
6999 new_h_scale = 1;
7000 }
7001
7002 //use the same value as horizon
7003 float new_v_scale = new_h_scale;
7004#else
7005 float top_tb_width = = collapse_toolbar.get_width();
7006 int items_cnt = collapse_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt();
7007 float noitems_width = top_tb_width - size * items_cnt; // width of separators and borders in top toolbars
7008
7009 // calculate scale needed for items in all top toolbars
7010 float new_h_scale = (cnv_size.get_width() - noitems_width) / (items_cnt * GLToolbar::Default_Icons_Size);
7011
7012 //items_cnt = m_main_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + m_gizmos.get_selectable_icons_cnt() + 3; // +3 means a place for top and view toolbars and separators in gizmos toolbar
7013
7014 // calculate scale needed for items in the gizmos toolbar
7015 items_cnt = m_main_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt() + m_gizmos.get_selectable_icons_cnt() + m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_visible_items_cnt();
7016 float new_v_scale = cnv_size.get_height() / (items_cnt * GLGizmosManager::Default_Icons_Size);
7017#endif
7018
7019 // set minimum scale as a auto scale for the toolbars
7020 float new_scale = std::min(new_h_scale, new_v_scale);
7021#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
7022 new_scale /= m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
7023#endif
7024 if (fabs(new_scale - scale) > 0.01) // scale is changed by 1% and more
7025 wxGetApp().set_auto_toolbar_icon_scale(new_scale);
7026}

◆ _get_current_partplate_print_volume()

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_get_current_partplate_print_volume ( )
private
1348{
1349 BoundingBoxf3 test_volume;
1350 if (m_process && m_config)
1351 {
1352 BoundingBoxf3 plate_bb = m_process->get_current_plate()->get_bounding_box(false);
1353 BoundingBoxf3 print_volume({ plate_bb.min(0), plate_bb.min(1), 0.0 }, { plate_bb.max(0), plate_bb.max(1), m_config->opt_float("printable_height") });
1354 // Allow the objects to protrude below the print bed
1355 print_volume.min(2) = -1e10;
1356 print_volume.min(0) -= Slic3r::BuildVolume::BedEpsilon;
1357 print_volume.min(1) -= Slic3r::BuildVolume::BedEpsilon;
1358 print_volume.max(0) += Slic3r::BuildVolume::BedEpsilon;
1359 print_volume.max(1) += Slic3r::BuildVolume::BedEpsilon;
1360 test_volume = print_volume;
1361 }
1362 else
1363 test_volume = BoundingBoxf3();
1364
1365 return test_volume;
1366}

◆ _init_assemble_view_toolbar()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_init_assemble_view_toolbar ( )
private
6221{
6222 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << ": enter, m_assemble_view_toolbar.is_enabled=" << m_assemble_view_toolbar.is_enabled() << "\n";
6223 if (!m_assemble_view_toolbar.is_enabled())
6224 return true;
6225
6226 BackgroundTexture::Metadata background_data;
6227 background_data.filename = m_is_dark ? "toolbar_background_dark.png" : "toolbar_background.png";
6228 background_data.left = 16;
6229 background_data.top = 16;
6230 background_data.right = 16;
6231 background_data.bottom = 16;
6232
6233 if (!m_assemble_view_toolbar.init(background_data))
6234 {
6235 // unable to init the toolbar texture, disable it
6236 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_enabled(false);
6237 return true;
6238 }
6239
6240 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_layout_type(GLToolbar::Layout::Horizontal);
6241 //BBS: assemble toolbar is at the top and right, we don't need the rounded-corner effect at the left side and the top side
6242 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_horizontal_orientation(GLToolbar::Layout::HO_Left);
6243 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_vertical_orientation(GLToolbar::Layout::VO_Top);
6244 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_border(5.0f);
6245 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_separator_size(10);
6246 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_gap_size(4);
6247
6248 m_assemble_view_toolbar.del_all_item();
6249
6250 GLToolbarItem::Data item;
6251 item.name = "assembly_view";
6252 item.icon_filename = m_is_dark ? "toolbar_assemble_dark.svg" : "toolbar_assemble.svg";
6253 item.tooltip = _utf8(L("Assembly View"));
6254 item.sprite_id = 1;
6255 item.left.toggable = false;
6256 item.left.action_callback = [this]() { if (m_canvas != nullptr) wxPostEvent(m_canvas, SimpleEvent(EVT_GLVIEWTOOLBAR_ASSEMBLE)); };
6257 item.left.render_callback = GLToolbarItem::Default_Render_Callback;
6258 item.visible = true;
6259 item.visibility_callback = [this]()->bool { return true; };
6260 item.enabling_callback = [this]()->bool {
6261 return wxGetApp().plater()->has_assmeble_view();
6262 };
6263 if (!m_assemble_view_toolbar.add_item(item))
6264 return false;
6265
6266 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << ": Finished Successfully\n";
6267 return true;
6268}
L
#define L(s)

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_is_any_volume_outside ( ) const
private
9030{

9032 if (volume != nullptr && volume->is_outside)

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_print_object_toolpaths ( const PrintObject &  print_object,
const BuildVolume &  build_volume,
const std::vector< std::string > &  str_tool_colors,
const std::vector< CustomGCode::Item > &  color_print_values 
)
private
8380{
8381 std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> tool_colors = _parse_colors(str_tool_colors);
8382
8383 struct Ctxt
8384 {
8385 const PrintInstances *shifted_copies;
8386 std::vector<const Layer*> layers;
8387 bool has_perimeters;
8388 bool has_infill;
8389 bool has_support;
8390 const std::vector<std::array<float, 4>>* tool_colors;
8391 bool is_single_material_print;
8392 int filaments_cnt;
8393 const std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>* color_print_values;
8394
8395 static const std::array<float, 4>& color_perimeters() { static std::array<float, 4> color = { 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.f }; return color; } // yellow
8396 static const std::array<float, 4>& color_infill() { static std::array<float, 4> color = { 1.0f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.f }; return color; } // redish
8397 static const std::array<float, 4>& color_support() { static std::array<float, 4> color = { 0.5f, 1.0f, 0.5f, 1.f }; return color; } // greenish
8398 static const std::array<float, 4>& color_pause_or_custom_code() { static std::array<float, 4> color = { 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.f }; return color; } // gray
8399
8400 // For cloring by a tool, return a parsed color.
8401 bool color_by_tool() const { return tool_colors != nullptr; }
8402 size_t number_tools() const { return color_by_tool() ? tool_colors->size() : 0; }
8403 const std::array<float, 4>& color_tool(size_t tool) const { return (*tool_colors)[tool]; }
8404
8405 // For coloring by a color_print(M600), return a parsed color.
8406 bool color_by_color_print() const { return color_print_values!=nullptr; }
8407 const size_t color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx(const size_t layer_idx) const {
8408 const CustomGCode::Item value{layers[layer_idx]->print_z + EPSILON, CustomGCode::Custom, 0, ""};
8409 auto it = std::lower_bound(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(), value);
8410 return (it - color_print_values->begin()) % number_tools();
8411 }
8412
8413 const size_t color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx_and_extruder(const size_t layer_idx, const int extruder) const
8414 {
8415 const coordf_t print_z = layers[layer_idx]->print_z;
8416
8417 auto it = std::find_if(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(),
8418 [print_z](const CustomGCode::Item& code)
8419 { return fabs(code.print_z - print_z) < EPSILON; });
8420 if (it != color_print_values->end()) {
8421 CustomGCode::Type type = it->type;
8422 // pause print or custom Gcode
8423 if (type == CustomGCode::PausePrint ||
8424 (type != CustomGCode::ColorChange && type != CustomGCode::ToolChange))
8425 return number_tools()-1; // last color item is a gray color for pause print or custom G-code
8426
8427 // change tool (extruder)
8428 if (type == CustomGCode::ToolChange)
8429 return get_color_idx_for_tool_change(it, extruder);
8430 // change color for current extruder
8431 if (type == CustomGCode::ColorChange) {
8432 int color_idx = get_color_idx_for_color_change(it, extruder);
8433 if (color_idx >= 0)
8434 return color_idx;
8435 }
8436 }
8437
8438 const CustomGCode::Item value{print_z + EPSILON, CustomGCode::Custom, 0, ""};
8439 it = std::lower_bound(color_print_values->begin(), color_print_values->end(), value);
8440 while (it != color_print_values->begin()) {
8441 --it;
8442 // change color for current extruder
8443 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange) {
8444 int color_idx = get_color_idx_for_color_change(it, extruder);
8445 if (color_idx >= 0)
8446 return color_idx;
8447 }
8448 // change tool (extruder)
8449 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ToolChange)
8450 return get_color_idx_for_tool_change(it, extruder);
8451 }
8452
8453 return std::min<int>(filaments_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(extruder - 1, 0));;
8454 }
8455
8456 private:
8457 int get_m600_color_idx(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it) const
8458 {
8459 int shift = 0;
8460 while (it != color_print_values->begin()) {
8461 --it;
8462 if (it->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange)
8463 shift++;
8464 }
8465 return filaments_cnt + shift;
8466 }
8467
8468 int get_color_idx_for_tool_change(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it, const int extruder) const
8469 {
8470 const int current_extruder = it->extruder == 0 ? extruder : it->extruder;
8471 if (number_tools() == size_t(filaments_cnt + 1)) // there is no one "M600"
8472 return std::min<int>(filaments_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(current_extruder - 1, 0));
8473
8474 auto it_n = it;
8475 while (it_n != color_print_values->begin()) {
8476 --it_n;
8477 if (it_n->type == CustomGCode::ColorChange && it_n->extruder == current_extruder)
8478 return get_m600_color_idx(it_n);
8479 }
8480
8481 return std::min<int>(filaments_cnt - 1, std::max<int>(current_extruder - 1, 0));
8482 }
8483
8484 int get_color_idx_for_color_change(std::vector<CustomGCode::Item>::const_iterator it, const int extruder) const
8485 {
8486 if (filaments_cnt == 1)
8487 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
8488
8489 auto it_n = it;
8490 bool is_tool_change = false;
8491 while (it_n != color_print_values->begin()) {
8492 --it_n;
8493 if (it_n->type == CustomGCode::ToolChange) {
8494 is_tool_change = true;
8495 if (it_n->extruder == it->extruder || (it_n->extruder == 0 && it->extruder == extruder))
8496 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
8497 break;
8498 }
8499 }
8500 if (!is_tool_change && it->extruder == extruder)
8501 return get_m600_color_idx(it);
8502
8503 return -1;
8504 }
8505
8506 } ctxt;
8507
8508 ctxt.has_perimeters = print_object.is_step_done(posPerimeters);
8509 ctxt.has_infill = print_object.is_step_done(posInfill);
8510 ctxt.has_support = print_object.is_step_done(posSupportMaterial);
8511 ctxt.tool_colors = tool_colors.empty() ? nullptr : &tool_colors;
8512 ctxt.color_print_values = color_print_values.empty() ? nullptr : &color_print_values;
8513 ctxt.is_single_material_print = this->fff_print()->extruders().size()==1;
8514 ctxt.filaments_cnt = wxGetApp().filaments_cnt();
8515
8516 ctxt.shifted_copies = &print_object.instances();
8517
8518 // order layers by print_z
8519 {
8520 size_t nlayers = 0;
8521 if (ctxt.has_perimeters || ctxt.has_infill)
8522 nlayers = print_object.layers().size();
8523 if (ctxt.has_support)
8524 nlayers += print_object.support_layers().size();
8525 ctxt.layers.reserve(nlayers);
8526 }
8527 if (ctxt.has_perimeters || ctxt.has_infill)
8528 for (const Layer *layer : print_object.layers())
8529 ctxt.layers.emplace_back(layer);
8530 if (ctxt.has_support)
8531 for (const Layer *layer : print_object.support_layers())
8532 ctxt.layers.emplace_back(layer);
8533 std::sort(ctxt.layers.begin(), ctxt.layers.end(), [](const Layer *l1, const Layer *l2) { return l1->print_z < l2->print_z; });
8534
8535 // Maximum size of an allocation block: 32MB / sizeof(float)
8536 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - start" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8537
8538 const bool is_selected_separate_extruder = m_selected_extruder > 0 && ctxt.color_by_color_print();
8539
8540 //FIXME Improve the heuristics for a grain size.
8541 size_t grain_size = std::max(ctxt.layers.size() / 16, size_t(1));
8542 tbb::spin_mutex new_volume_mutex;
8543 auto new_volume = [this, &new_volume_mutex](const std::array<float, 4>& color) {
8544 // Allocate the volume before locking.
8545 GLVolume *volume = new GLVolume(color);
8546 volume->is_extrusion_path = true;
8547 tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock;
8548 // Lock by ROII, so if the emplace_back() fails, the lock will be released.
8549 lock.acquire(new_volume_mutex);
8550 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(volume);
8551 lock.release();
8552 return volume;
8553 };
8554 const size_t volumes_cnt_initial = m_volumes.volumes.size();
8555 tbb::parallel_for(
8556 tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, ctxt.layers.size(), grain_size),
8557 [&ctxt, &new_volume, is_selected_separate_extruder, this](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
8558 GLVolumePtrs vols;
8559 auto volume = [&ctxt, &vols](size_t layer_idx, int extruder, int feature) -> GLVolume& {
8560 return *vols[ctxt.color_by_color_print()?
8561 ctxt.color_print_color_idx_by_layer_idx_and_extruder(layer_idx, extruder) :
8562 ctxt.color_by_tool() ?
8563 std::min<int>(ctxt.number_tools() - 1, std::max<int>(extruder - 1, 0)) :
8564 feature
8565 ];
8566 };
8567 if (ctxt.color_by_color_print() || ctxt.color_by_tool()) {
8568 for (size_t i = 0; i < ctxt.number_tools(); ++i)
8569 vols.emplace_back(new_volume(ctxt.color_tool(i)));
8570 }
8571 else
8572 vols = { new_volume(ctxt.color_perimeters()), new_volume(ctxt.color_infill()), new_volume(ctxt.color_support()) };
8573 for (GLVolume *vol : vols)
8574 // Reserving number of vertices (3x position + 3x color)
8575 vol->indexed_vertex_array.reserve(VERTEX_BUFFER_RESERVE_SIZE / 6);
8576 for (size_t idx_layer = range.begin(); idx_layer < range.end(); ++ idx_layer) {
8577 const Layer *layer = ctxt.layers[idx_layer];
8578
8579 if (is_selected_separate_extruder)
8580 {
8581 bool at_least_one_has_correct_extruder = false;
8582 for (const LayerRegion* layerm : layer->regions())
8583 {
8584 if (layerm->slices.surfaces.empty())
8585 continue;
8586 const PrintRegionConfig& cfg = layerm->region().config();
8587 if (cfg.wall_filament.value == m_selected_extruder ||
8588 cfg.sparse_infill_filament.value == m_selected_extruder ||
8589 cfg.solid_infill_filament.value == m_selected_extruder ) {
8590 at_least_one_has_correct_extruder = true;
8591 break;
8592 }
8593 }
8594 if (!at_least_one_has_correct_extruder)
8595 continue;
8596 }
8597
8598 for (GLVolume *vol : vols)
8599 if (vol->print_zs.empty() || vol->print_zs.back() != layer->print_z) {
8600 vol->print_zs.emplace_back(layer->print_z);
8601 vol->offsets.emplace_back(vol->indexed_vertex_array.quad_indices.size());
8602 vol->offsets.emplace_back(vol->indexed_vertex_array.triangle_indices.size());
8603 }
8604 for (const PrintInstance &instance : *ctxt.shifted_copies) {
8605 const Point &copy = instance.shift;
8606 for (const LayerRegion *layerm : layer->regions()) {
8607 if (is_selected_separate_extruder)
8608 {
8609 const PrintRegionConfig& cfg = layerm->region().config();
8610 if (cfg.wall_filament.value != m_selected_extruder ||
8611 cfg.sparse_infill_filament.value != m_selected_extruder ||
8612 cfg.solid_infill_filament.value != m_selected_extruder)
8613 continue;
8614 }
8615 if (ctxt.has_perimeters)
8616 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(layerm->perimeters, float(layer->print_z), copy,
8617 volume(idx_layer, layerm->region().config().wall_filament.value, 0));
8618 if (ctxt.has_infill) {
8619 for (const ExtrusionEntity *ee : layerm->fills.entities) {
8620 // fill represents infill extrusions of a single island.
8621 const auto *fill = dynamic_cast<const ExtrusionEntityCollection*>(ee);
8622 if (! fill->entities.empty())
8623 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(*fill, float(layer->print_z), copy,
8624 volume(idx_layer,
8625 is_solid_infill(fill->entities.front()->role()) ?
8626 layerm->region().config().solid_infill_filament :
8627 layerm->region().config().sparse_infill_filament,
8628 1));
8629 }
8630 }
8631 }
8632 if (ctxt.has_support) {
8633 const SupportLayer *support_layer = dynamic_cast<const SupportLayer*>(layer);
8634 if (support_layer) {
8635 for (const ExtrusionEntity *extrusion_entity : support_layer->support_fills.entities)
8636 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(extrusion_entity, float(layer->print_z), copy,
8637 volume(idx_layer,
8638 (extrusion_entity->role() == erSupportMaterial ||
8639 extrusion_entity->role() == erSupportTransition) ?
8640 support_layer->object()->config().support_filament :
8641 support_layer->object()->config().support_interface_filament,
8642 2));
8643 }
8644 }
8645 }
8646 // Ensure that no volume grows over the limits. If the volume is too large, allocate a new one.
8647 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
8648 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
8649 if (vol.indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved.size() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
8650 vols[i] = new_volume(vol.color);
8651 reserve_new_volume_finalize_old_volume(*vols[i], vol, false);
8652 }
8653 }
8654 }
8655 for (GLVolume *vol : vols)
8656 // Ideally one would call vol->indexed_vertex_array.finalize() here to move the buffers to the OpenGL driver,
8657 // but this code runs in parallel and the OpenGL driver is not thread safe.
8658 vol->indexed_vertex_array.shrink_to_fit();
8659 });
8660
8661 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - finalizing results" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8662 // Remove empty volumes from the newly added volumes.
8663 m_volumes.volumes.erase(
8664 std::remove_if(m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial, m_volumes.volumes.end(),
8665 [](const GLVolume *volume) { return volume->empty(); }),
8666 m_volumes.volumes.end());
8667 for (size_t i = volumes_cnt_initial; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++i) {
8668 GLVolume* v = m_volumes.volumes[i];
8669 v->is_outside = ! build_volume.all_paths_inside_vertices_and_normals_interleaved(v->indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved, v->indexed_vertex_array.bounding_box());
8670 v->indexed_vertex_array.finalize_geometry(m_initialized);
8671 }
8672
8673 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading print object toolpaths in parallel - end" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8674}

◆ _load_print_toolpaths()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_print_toolpaths ( const BuildVolume &  build_volume)
private
8324{
8325 const Print *print = this->fff_print();
8326 if (print == nullptr)
8327 return;
8328
8329 if (! print->is_step_done(psSkirtBrim))
8330 return;
8331
8332 if (!print->has_skirt() && !print->has_brim())
8333 return;
8334
8335 const std::array<float, 4> color = { 0.5f, 1.0f, 0.5f, 1.0f }; // greenish
8336
8337 // number of skirt layers
8338 size_t total_layer_count = 0;
8339 for (const PrintObject* print_object : print->objects()) {
8340 total_layer_count = std::max(total_layer_count, print_object->total_layer_count());
8341 }
8342 size_t skirt_height = print->has_infinite_skirt() ? total_layer_count : std::min<size_t>(print->config().skirt_height.value, total_layer_count);
8343 if (skirt_height == 0 && print->has_brim())
8344 skirt_height = 1;
8345
8346 // Get first skirt_height layers.
8347 //FIXME This code is fishy. It may not work for multiple objects with different layering due to variable layer height feature.
8348 // This is not critical as this is just an initial preview.
8349 const PrintObject* highest_object = *std::max_element(print->objects().begin(), print->objects().end(), [](auto l, auto r){ return l->layers().size() < r->layers().size(); });
8350 std::vector<float> print_zs;
8351 print_zs.reserve(skirt_height * 2);
8352 for (size_t i = 0; i < std::min(skirt_height, highest_object->layers().size()); ++ i)
8353 print_zs.emplace_back(float(highest_object->layers()[i]->print_z));
8354 // Only add skirt for the raft layers.
8355 for (size_t i = 0; i < std::min(skirt_height, std::min(highest_object->slicing_parameters().raft_layers(), highest_object->support_layers().size())); ++ i)
8356 print_zs.emplace_back(float(highest_object->support_layers()[i]->print_z));
8357 sort_remove_duplicates(print_zs);
8358 skirt_height = std::min(skirt_height, print_zs.size());
8359 print_zs.erase(print_zs.begin() + skirt_height, print_zs.end());
8360
8361 GLVolume *volume = m_volumes.new_toolpath_volume(color, VERTEX_BUFFER_RESERVE_SIZE);
8362 for (size_t i = 0; i < skirt_height; ++ i) {
8363 volume->print_zs.emplace_back(print_zs[i]);
8364 volume->offsets.emplace_back(volume->indexed_vertex_array.quad_indices.size());
8365 volume->offsets.emplace_back(volume->indexed_vertex_array.triangle_indices.size());
8366 //BBS: usage of m_brim are deleted
8367 _3DScene::extrusionentity_to_verts(print->skirt(), print_zs[i], Point(0, 0), *volume);
8368 // Ensure that no volume grows over the limits. If the volume is too large, allocate a new one.
8369 if (volume->indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved.size() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
8370 GLVolume &vol = *volume;
8371 volume = m_volumes.new_toolpath_volume(vol.color);
8372 reserve_new_volume_finalize_old_volume(*volume, vol, m_initialized);
8373 }
8374 }
8375 volume->is_outside = ! build_volume.all_paths_inside_vertices_and_normals_interleaved(volume->indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved, volume->indexed_vertex_array.bounding_box());
8376 volume->indexed_vertex_array.finalize_geometry(m_initialized);
8377}

GLVolume * new_toolpath_volume(const std::array< float, 4 > &rgba, size_t reserve_vbo_floats=0)

◆ _load_sla_shells()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_sla_shells ( )
private
8851{
8852 const SLAPrint* print = this->sla_print();
8853 if (print->objects().empty())
8854 // nothing to render, return
8855 return;
8856
8857 auto add_volume = [this](const SLAPrintObject &object, int volume_id, const SLAPrintObject::Instance& instance,
8858 const TriangleMesh& mesh, const std::array<float, 4>& color, bool outside_printer_detection_enabled) {
8859 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(new GLVolume(color));
8860 GLVolume& v = *m_volumes.volumes.back();
8861#if ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
8862 v.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(mesh, true);
8863#else
8864 v.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(mesh);
8865#endif // ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
8866 v.indexed_vertex_array.finalize_geometry(m_initialized);
8867 v.shader_outside_printer_detection_enabled = outside_printer_detection_enabled;
8868 v.composite_id.volume_id = volume_id;
8869 v.set_instance_offset(unscale(instance.shift.x(), instance.shift.y(), 0.0));
8870 v.set_instance_rotation({ 0.0, 0.0, (double)instance.rotation });
8871 v.set_instance_mirror(X, object.is_left_handed() ? -1. : 1.);
8872 v.set_convex_hull(mesh.convex_hull_3d());
8873 };
8874
8875 // adds objects' volumes
8876 for (const SLAPrintObject* obj : print->objects())
8877 if (obj->is_step_done(slaposSliceSupports)) {
8878 unsigned int initial_volumes_count = (unsigned int)m_volumes.volumes.size();
8879 for (const SLAPrintObject::Instance& instance : obj->instances()) {
8880 add_volume(*obj, 0, instance, obj->get_mesh_to_print(), GLVolume::MODEL_COLOR[0], true);
8881 // Set the extruder_id and volume_id to achieve the same color as in the 3D scene when
8882 // through the update_volumes_colors_by_extruder() call.
8883 m_volumes.volumes.back()->extruder_id = obj->model_object()->volumes.front()->extruder_id();
8884 if (obj->is_step_done(slaposSupportTree) && obj->has_mesh(slaposSupportTree))
8885 add_volume(*obj, -int(slaposSupportTree), instance, obj->support_mesh(), GLVolume::SLA_SUPPORT_COLOR, true);
8886 if (obj->is_step_done(slaposPad) && obj->has_mesh(slaposPad))
8887 add_volume(*obj, -int(slaposPad), instance, obj->pad_mesh(), GLVolume::SLA_PAD_COLOR, false);
8888 }
8889 double shift_z = obj->get_current_elevation();
8890 for (unsigned int i = initial_volumes_count; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++ i) {
8891 // apply shift z
8892 m_volumes.volumes[i]->set_sla_shift_z(shift_z);
8893 }
8894 }
8895
8896 update_volumes_colors_by_extruder();
8897}

◆ _load_wipe_tower_toolpaths()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_load_wipe_tower_toolpaths ( const BuildVolume &  build_volume,
const std::vector< std::string > &  str_tool_colors 
)
private
8677{
8678 const Print *print = this->fff_print();
8679 if (print == nullptr || print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes.empty())
8680 return;
8681
8682 if (!print->is_step_done(psWipeTower))
8683 return;
8684
8685 std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> tool_colors = _parse_colors(str_tool_colors);
8686
8687 struct Ctxt
8688 {
8689 const Print *print;
8690 const std::vector<std::array<float, 4>>* tool_colors;
8691 Vec2f wipe_tower_pos;
8692 float wipe_tower_angle;
8693
8694 static const std::array<float, 4>& color_support() { static std::array<float, 4> color = { 0.5f, 1.0f, 0.5f, 1.f }; return color; } // greenish
8695
8696 // For cloring by a tool, return a parsed color.
8697 bool color_by_tool() const { return tool_colors != nullptr; }
8698 size_t number_tools() const { return this->color_by_tool() ? tool_colors->size() : 0; }
8699 const std::array<float, 4>& color_tool(size_t tool) const { return (*tool_colors)[tool]; }
8700 int volume_idx(int tool, int feature) const {
8701 return this->color_by_tool() ? std::min<int>(this->number_tools() - 1, std::max<int>(tool, 0)) : feature;
8702 }
8703
8704 const std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult>& tool_change(size_t idx) {
8705 const auto &tool_changes = print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes;
8706 return priming.empty() ?
8707 ((idx == tool_changes.size()) ? final : tool_changes[idx]) :
8708 ((idx == 0) ? priming : (idx == tool_changes.size() + 1) ? final : tool_changes[idx - 1]);
8709 }
8710 std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> priming;
8711 std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> final;
8712 } ctxt;
8713
8714 ctxt.print = print;
8715 ctxt.tool_colors = tool_colors.empty() ? nullptr : &tool_colors;
8716 //BBS: has no single_extruder_multi_material_priming
8717 //if (print->wipe_tower_data().priming && print->config().single_extruder_multi_material_priming)
8718 if (print->wipe_tower_data().priming)
8719 for (int i=0; i<(int)print->wipe_tower_data().priming.get()->size(); ++i)
8720 ctxt.priming.emplace_back(print->wipe_tower_data().priming.get()->at(i));
8721 if (print->wipe_tower_data().final_purge)
8722 ctxt.final.emplace_back(*print->wipe_tower_data().final_purge.get());
8723
8724 ctxt.wipe_tower_angle = ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_rotation_angle.value/180.f * PI;
8725
8726 // BBS: add partplate logic
8727 int plate_idx = print->get_plate_index();
8728 Vec3d plate_origin = print->get_plate_origin();
8729 double wipe_tower_x = ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_x.get_at(plate_idx) + plate_origin(0);
8730 double wipe_tower_y = ctxt.print->config().wipe_tower_y.get_at(plate_idx) + plate_origin(1);
8731 ctxt.wipe_tower_pos = Vec2f(wipe_tower_x, wipe_tower_y);
8732
8733 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - start" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8734
8735 //FIXME Improve the heuristics for a grain size.
8736 size_t n_items = print->wipe_tower_data().tool_changes.size() + (ctxt.priming.empty() ? 0 : 1);
8737 size_t grain_size = std::max(n_items / 128, size_t(1));
8738 tbb::spin_mutex new_volume_mutex;
8739 auto new_volume = [this, &new_volume_mutex](const std::array<float, 4>& color) {
8740 auto *volume = new GLVolume(color);
8741 volume->is_extrusion_path = true;
8742 tbb::spin_mutex::scoped_lock lock;
8743 lock.acquire(new_volume_mutex);
8744 m_volumes.volumes.emplace_back(volume);
8745 lock.release();
8746 return volume;
8747 };
8748 const size_t volumes_cnt_initial = m_volumes.volumes.size();
8749 std::vector<GLVolumeCollection> volumes_per_thread(n_items);
8750 tbb::parallel_for(
8751 tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, n_items, grain_size),
8752 [&ctxt, &new_volume](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
8753 // Bounding box of this slab of a wipe tower.
8754 GLVolumePtrs vols;
8755 if (ctxt.color_by_tool()) {
8756 for (size_t i = 0; i < ctxt.number_tools(); ++i)
8757 vols.emplace_back(new_volume(ctxt.color_tool(i)));
8758 }
8759 else
8760 vols = { new_volume(ctxt.color_support()) };
8761 for (GLVolume *volume : vols)
8762 // Reserving number of vertices (3x position + 3x color)
8763 volume->indexed_vertex_array.reserve(VERTEX_BUFFER_RESERVE_SIZE / 6);
8764 for (size_t idx_layer = range.begin(); idx_layer < range.end(); ++idx_layer) {
8765 const std::vector<WipeTower::ToolChangeResult> &layer = ctxt.tool_change(idx_layer);
8766 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
8767 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
8768 if (vol.print_zs.empty() || vol.print_zs.back() != layer.front().print_z) {
8769 vol.print_zs.emplace_back(layer.front().print_z);
8770 vol.offsets.emplace_back(vol.indexed_vertex_array.quad_indices.size());
8771 vol.offsets.emplace_back(vol.indexed_vertex_array.triangle_indices.size());
8772 }
8773 }
8774 for (const WipeTower::ToolChangeResult &extrusions : layer) {
8775 for (size_t i = 1; i < extrusions.extrusions.size();) {
8776 const WipeTower::Extrusion &e = extrusions.extrusions[i];
8777 if (e.width == 0.) {
8778 ++i;
8779 continue;
8780 }
8781 size_t j = i + 1;
8782 if (ctxt.color_by_tool())
8783 for (; j < extrusions.extrusions.size() && extrusions.extrusions[j].tool == e.tool && extrusions.extrusions[j].width > 0.f; ++j);
8784 else
8785 for (; j < extrusions.extrusions.size() && extrusions.extrusions[j].width > 0.f; ++j);
8786 size_t n_lines = j - i;
8787 Lines lines;
8788 std::vector<double> widths;
8789 std::vector<double> heights;
8790 lines.reserve(n_lines);
8791 widths.reserve(n_lines);
8792 heights.assign(n_lines, extrusions.layer_height);
8793 WipeTower::Extrusion e_prev = extrusions.extrusions[i-1];
8794
8795 if (!extrusions.priming) { // wipe tower extrusions describe the wipe tower at the origin with no rotation
8796 e_prev.pos = Eigen::Rotation2Df(ctxt.wipe_tower_angle) * e_prev.pos;
8797 e_prev.pos += ctxt.wipe_tower_pos;
8798 }
8799
8800 for (; i < j; ++i) {
8801 WipeTower::Extrusion e = extrusions.extrusions[i];
8802 assert(e.width > 0.f);
8803 if (!extrusions.priming) {
8804 e.pos = Eigen::Rotation2Df(ctxt.wipe_tower_angle) * e.pos;
8805 e.pos += ctxt.wipe_tower_pos;
8806 }
8807
8808 lines.emplace_back(Point::new_scale(e_prev.pos.x(), e_prev.pos.y()), Point::new_scale(e.pos.x(), e.pos.y()));
8809 widths.emplace_back(e.width);
8810
8811 e_prev = e;
8812 }
8813 _3DScene::thick_lines_to_verts(lines, widths, heights, lines.front().a == lines.back().b, extrusions.print_z,
8814 *vols[ctxt.volume_idx(e.tool, 0)]);
8815 }
8816 }
8817 }
8818 for (size_t i = 0; i < vols.size(); ++i) {
8819 GLVolume &vol = *vols[i];
8820 if (vol.indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved.size() > MAX_VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
8821 vols[i] = new_volume(vol.color);
8822 reserve_new_volume_finalize_old_volume(*vols[i], vol, false);
8823 }
8824 }
8825 for (GLVolume *vol : vols)
8826 vol->indexed_vertex_array.shrink_to_fit();
8827 });
8828
8829 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - finalizing results" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8830 // Remove empty volumes from the newly added volumes.
8831 m_volumes.volumes.erase(
8832 std::remove_if(m_volumes.volumes.begin() + volumes_cnt_initial, m_volumes.volumes.end(),
8833 [](const GLVolume *volume) { return volume->empty(); }),
8834 m_volumes.volumes.end());
8835 for (size_t i = volumes_cnt_initial; i < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++i) {
8836 GLVolume* v = m_volumes.volumes[i];
8837 v->is_outside = ! build_volume.all_paths_inside_vertices_and_normals_interleaved(v->indexed_vertex_array.vertices_and_normals_interleaved, v->indexed_vertex_array.bounding_box());
8838 v->indexed_vertex_array.finalize_geometry(m_initialized);
8839 }
8840
8841 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "Loading wipe tower toolpaths in parallel - end" << m_volumes.log_memory_info() << log_memory_info();
8842}

◆ _max_bounding_box()

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_max_bounding_box ( bool  include_gizmos,
bool  include_bed_model,
bool  include_plates 
) const
private
6373{
6374 BoundingBoxf3 bb = volumes_bounding_box();
6375
6376 // The following is a workaround for gizmos not being taken in account when calculating the tight camera frustrum
6377 // A better solution would ask the gizmo manager for the bounding box of the current active gizmo, if any
6378 if (include_gizmos && m_gizmos.is_running())
6379 {
6380 BoundingBoxf3 sel_bb = m_selection.get_bounding_box();
6381 Vec3d sel_bb_center = sel_bb.center();
6382 Vec3d extend_by = sel_bb.max_size() * Vec3d::Ones();
6383 bb.merge(BoundingBoxf3(sel_bb_center - extend_by, sel_bb_center + extend_by));
6384 }
6385
6386 bb.merge(include_bed_model ? m_bed.extended_bounding_box() : m_bed.build_volume().bounding_volume());
6387 if (include_plates) {
6388 bb.merge(wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_bounding_box());
6389 }
6390
6391 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled()) {
6392 const BoundingBoxf3& toolpath_bb = m_gcode_viewer.get_max_bounding_box();
6393 if (toolpath_bb.max_size() > 0.f)
6394 bb.merge(toolpath_bb);
6395 else
6396 bb.merge(m_gcode_viewer.get_shell_bounding_box());
6397 }
6398
6399 if ((m_canvas_type == CanvasView3D) && (fff_print()->config().print_sequence == PrintSequence::ByObject)) {
6400 float height_to_lid, height_to_rod;
6401 wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_height_limits(height_to_lid, height_to_rod);
6402 bb.max.z() = std::max(bb.max.z(), (double)height_to_lid);
6403 }
6404
6405 return bb;
6406}

◆ _mouse_to_3d()

Vec3d Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_mouse_to_3d ( const Point &  mouse_pos,
float *  z = nullptr 
)
8287{
8288 if (m_canvas == nullptr)
8289 return Vec3d(DBL_MAX, DBL_MAX, DBL_MAX);
8290
8291 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
8292 Matrix4d modelview = camera.get_view_matrix().matrix();
8293 Matrix4d projection= camera.get_projection_matrix().matrix();
8294 Vec4i viewport(camera.get_viewport().data());
8295
8296 GLint y = viewport[3] - (GLint)mouse_pos(1);
8297 GLfloat mouse_z;
8298 if (z == nullptr)
8299 glsafe(::glReadPixels((GLint)mouse_pos(0), y, 1, 1, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, GL_FLOAT, (void*)&mouse_z));
8300 else
8301 mouse_z = *z;
8302
8303 Vec3d out;
8304 igl::unproject(Vec3d(mouse_pos(0), y, mouse_z), modelview, projection, viewport, out);
8305 return out;
8306}

◆ _parse_colors()

std::vector< std::array< float, 4 > > Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_parse_colors ( const std::vector< std::string > &  colors)
staticprivate
8931{
8932 static const float INV_255 = 1.0f / 255.0f;
8933
8934 std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> output(colors.size(), { 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f });
8935 for (size_t i = 0; i < colors.size(); ++i) {
8936 const std::string& color = colors[i];
8937 const char* c = color.data() + 1;
8938 if (color.size() == 7 && color.front() == '#') {
8939 for (size_t j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
8940 int digit1 = hex_digit_to_int(*c++);
8941 int digit2 = hex_digit_to_int(*c++);
8942 if (digit1 == -1 || digit2 == -1)
8943 break;
8944
8945 output[i][j] = float(digit1 * 16 + digit2) * INV_255;
8946 }
8947 }
8948 }
8949 return output;
8950}

◆ _perform_layer_editing_action()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_perform_layer_editing_action ( wxMouseEvent *  evt = nullptr)
8264{
8265 int object_idx_selected = m_layers_editing.last_object_id;
8266 if (object_idx_selected == -1)
8267 return;
8268
8269 // A volume is selected. Test, whether hovering over a layer thickness bar.
8270 if (evt != nullptr) {
8271 const Rect& rect = LayersEditing::get_bar_rect_screen(*this);
8272 float b = rect.get_bottom();
8273 m_layers_editing.last_z = m_layers_editing.object_max_z() * (b - evt->GetY() - 1.0f) / (b - rect.get_top());
8274 m_layers_editing.last_action =
8275 evt->ShiftDown() ? (evt->RightIsDown() ? LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_SMOOTH : LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_REDUCE) :
8276 (evt->RightIsDown() ? LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_INCREASE : LAYER_HEIGHT_EDIT_ACTION_DECREASE);
8277 }
8278

8280 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
8281
8282 // Automatic action on mouse down with the same coordinate.
8283 _start_timer();
8284}

◆ _picking_pass()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_picking_pass ( )
private
6433{
6434 std::vector<int>* hover_volume_idxs = const_cast<std::vector<int>*>(&m_hover_volume_idxs);
6435 std::vector<int>* hover_plate_idxs = const_cast<std::vector<int>*>(&m_hover_plate_idxs);
6436
6437 if (m_picking_enabled && !m_mouse.dragging && m_mouse.position != Vec2d(DBL_MAX, DBL_MAX)) {
6438 hover_volume_idxs->clear();
6439 hover_plate_idxs->clear();
6440
6441 // Render the object for picking.
6442 // FIXME This cannot possibly work in a multi - sampled context as the color gets mangled by the anti - aliasing.
6443 // Better to use software ray - casting on a bounding - box hierarchy.
6444
6445 if (m_multisample_allowed)
6446 // This flag is often ignored by NVIDIA drivers if rendering into a screen buffer.
6447 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
6448
6449 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_BLEND));
6450 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6451
6452 glsafe(::glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
6453
6454 //BBS: only render plate in view 3D
6455 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasView3D) {
6456 _render_plates_for_picking();
6457 }
6458
6459 m_camera_clipping_plane = m_gizmos.get_clipping_plane();
6460 if (m_camera_clipping_plane.is_active()) {
6461 ::glClipPlane(GL_CLIP_PLANE0, (GLdouble*)m_camera_clipping_plane.get_data());
6462 ::glEnable(GL_CLIP_PLANE0);
6463 }
6464 _render_volumes_for_picking();
6465 if (m_camera_clipping_plane.is_active())
6466 ::glDisable(GL_CLIP_PLANE0);
6467
6468 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
6469 //_render_bed_for_picking(!wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().is_looking_downward());
6470
6471 m_gizmos.render_current_gizmo_for_picking_pass();
6472
6473 if (m_multisample_allowed)
6474 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
6475
6476 int volume_id = -1;
6477 int gizmo_id = -1;
6478
6479 GLubyte color[4] = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
6480 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
6481 bool inside = 0 <= m_mouse.position(0) && m_mouse.position(0) < cnv_size.get_width() && 0 <= m_mouse.position(1) && m_mouse.position(1) < cnv_size.get_height();
6482 if (inside) {
6483 glsafe(::glReadPixels(m_mouse.position(0), cnv_size.get_height() - m_mouse.position(1) - 1, 1, 1, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)color));
6484 if (picking_checksum_alpha_channel(color[0], color[1], color[2]) == color[3]) {
6485 // Only non-interpolated colors are valid, those have their lowest three bits zeroed.
6486 // we reserve color = (0,0,0) for occluders (as the printbed)
6487 // volumes' id are shifted by 1
6488 // see: _render_volumes_for_picking()
6489 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
6490 //volume_id = color[0] + (color[1] << 8) + (color[2] << 16) - 1;
6491 volume_id = color[0] + (color[1] << 8) + (color[2] << 16);
6492 // gizmos' id are instead properly encoded by the color
6493 gizmo_id = color[0] + (color[1] << 8) + (color[2] << 16);
6494 }
6495 }
6496 else
6497 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(inside && (unsigned int)gizmo_id <= GLGizmoBase::BASE_ID ? ((int)GLGizmoBase::BASE_ID - gizmo_id) : -1);
6498
6499 //BBS: add plate picking logic
6500 int plate_hover_id = PartPlate::PLATE_BASE_ID - volume_id;
6501 if (plate_hover_id >= 0 && plate_hover_id < PartPlateList::MAX_PLATES_COUNT * PartPlate::GRABBER_COUNT) {
6502 wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().set_hover_id(plate_hover_id);
6503 hover_plate_idxs->emplace_back(plate_hover_id);
6504 const_cast<GLGizmosManager*>(&m_gizmos)->set_hover_id(-1);
6505 }
6506 else {
6507 wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().reset_hover_id();
6508 if (0 <= volume_id && volume_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size()) {
6509 // do not add the volume id if any gizmo is active and CTRL is pressed
6510 if (m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::EType::Undefined || !wxGetKeyState(WXK_CONTROL))
6511 hover_volume_idxs->emplace_back(volume_id);
6512 const_cast<GLGizmosManager*>(&m_gizmos)->set_hover_id(-1);
6513 }
6514 else
6515 const_cast<GLGizmosManager*>(&m_gizmos)->set_hover_id(inside && (unsigned int)volume_id <= GLGizmoBase::BASE_ID ? ((int)GLGizmoBase::BASE_ID - volume_id) : -1);
6516 }
6517
6518 _update_volumes_hover_state();
6519 }
6520}

◆ _rectangular_selection_picking_pass()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_rectangular_selection_picking_pass ( )
private
6523{
6524 m_gizmos.set_hover_id(-1);
6525
6526 std::set<int> idxs;
6527
6528 if (m_picking_enabled) {
6529 if (m_multisample_allowed)
6530 // This flag is often ignored by NVIDIA drivers if rendering into a screen buffer.
6531 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
6532
6533 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_BLEND));
6534 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6535
6536 glsafe(::glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
6537
6538 _render_volumes_for_picking();
6539 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
6540 //_render_bed_for_picking(!wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().is_looking_downward());
6541
6542 if (m_multisample_allowed)
6543 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
6544
6545 int width = std::max((int)m_rectangle_selection.get_width(), 1);
6546 int height = std::max((int)m_rectangle_selection.get_height(), 1);
6547 int px_count = width * height;
6548
6549 int left = (int)m_rectangle_selection.get_left();
6550 int top = get_canvas_size().get_height() - (int)m_rectangle_selection.get_top();
6551 if (left >= 0 && top >= 0) {
6552#define USE_PARALLEL 1
6553#if USE_PARALLEL
6554 struct Pixel
6555 {
6556 std::array<GLubyte, 4> data;
6557 // Only non-interpolated colors are valid, those have their lowest three bits zeroed.
6558 bool valid() const { return picking_checksum_alpha_channel(data[0], data[1], data[2]) == data[3]; }
6559 // we reserve color = (0,0,0) for occluders (as the printbed)
6560 // volumes' id are shifted by 1
6561 // see: _render_volumes_for_picking()
6562 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
6563 int id() const { return data[0] + (data[1] << 8) + (data[2] << 16); }
6564 //int id() const { return data[0] + (data[1] << 8) + (data[2] << 16) - 1; }
6565 };
6566
6567 std::vector<Pixel> frame(px_count);
6568 glsafe(::glReadPixels(left, top, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)frame.data()));
6569
6570 tbb::spin_mutex mutex;
6571 tbb::parallel_for(tbb::blocked_range<size_t>(0, frame.size(), (size_t)width),
6572 [this, &frame, &idxs, &mutex](const tbb::blocked_range<size_t>& range) {
6573 for (size_t i = range.begin(); i < range.end(); ++i)
6574 if (frame[i].valid()) {
6575 int volume_id = frame[i].id();
6576 if (0 <= volume_id && volume_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size()) {
6577 mutex.lock();
6578 idxs.insert(volume_id);
6579 mutex.unlock();
6580 }
6581 }
6582 });
6583#else
6584 std::vector<GLubyte> frame(4 * px_count);
6585 glsafe(::glReadPixels(left, top, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)frame.data()));
6586
6587 for (int i = 0; i < px_count; ++i)
6588 {
6589 int px_id = 4 * i;
6590 int volume_id = frame[px_id] + (frame[px_id + 1] << 8) + (frame[px_id + 2] << 16);
6591 if (0 <= volume_id && volume_id < (int)m_volumes.volumes.size())
6592 idxs.insert(volume_id);
6593 }
6594#endif // USE_PARALLEL
6595 }
6596 }
6597
6598 m_hover_volume_idxs.assign(idxs.begin(), idxs.end());
6599 _update_volumes_hover_state();
6600}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_refresh_if_shown_on_screen ( )

6421{
6422 if (_is_shown_on_screen()) {
6423 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
6424 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
6425

6427 // frequently enough, we call render() here directly when we can.

◆ _render_arrange_menu()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_arrange_menu ( float  left,
float  right,
float  bottom,
float  top 
)
private
5327{
5328 ImGuiWrapper *imgui = wxGetApp().imgui();
5329
5330 auto canvas_w = float(get_canvas_size().get_width());
5331 auto canvas_h = float(get_canvas_size().get_height());
5332 //BBS: GUI refactor: move main toolbar to the right
5333 //original use center as {0.0}, and top is (canvas_h/2), bottom is (-canvas_h/2), also plus inv_camera
5334 //now change to left_up as {0,0}, and top is 0, bottom is canvas_h
5335#if BBS_TOOLBAR_ON_TOP
5336 float zoom = (float)wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_zoom();
5337 float left_pos = m_main_toolbar.get_item("arrange")->render_left_pos;
5338 const float x = 0.5 * canvas_w + left_pos * zoom;
5339 imgui->set_next_window_pos(x, m_main_toolbar.get_height(), ImGuiCond_Always, 0.0f, 0.0f);
5340
5341#else
5342 const float x = canvas_w - m_main_toolbar.get_width();
5343 const float y = 0.5f * canvas_h - top * float(wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_zoom());
5344 imgui->set_next_window_pos(x, y, ImGuiCond_Always, 1.0f, 0.0f);
5345#endif
5346
5347 //BBS
5348 ImGuiWrapper::push_toolbar_style(get_scale());
5349
5350 imgui->begin(_L("Arrange options"), ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar);
5351
5352 ArrangeSettings settings = get_arrange_settings();
5353 ArrangeSettings &settings_out = get_arrange_settings();
5354 const float slider_icon_width = imgui->get_slider_icon_size().x;
5355 const float cursor_slider_left = imgui->calc_text_size(_L("Spacing")).x + imgui->scaled(1.5f);
5356 const float minimal_slider_width = imgui->scaled(4.f);
5357 float window_width = minimal_slider_width + 2 * slider_icon_width;
5358 auto &appcfg = wxGetApp().app_config;
5359 PrinterTechnology ptech = current_printer_technology();
5360
5361 bool settings_changed = false;
5362 float dist_min = 0.1f; // should be larger than 0 so objects won't touch
5363 std::string dist_key = "min_object_distance", rot_key = "enable_rotation";
5364 std::string bed_shrink_x_key = "bed_shrink_x", bed_shrink_y_key = "bed_shrink_y";
5365 std::string multi_material_key = "allow_multi_materials_on_same_plate";
5366 std::string avoid_extrusion_key = "avoid_extrusion_cali_region";
5367 std::string postfix;
5368 //BBS:
5369 bool seq_print = false;
5370
5371 if (ptech == ptSLA) {
5372 dist_min = 0.1f;
5373 postfix = "_sla";
5374 } else if (ptech == ptFFF) {
5375 auto co_opt = m_config->option<ConfigOptionEnum<PrintSequence>>("print_sequence");
5376 if (co_opt && (co_opt->value == PrintSequence::ByObject)) {
5377 dist_min = float(min_object_distance(*m_config));
5378 postfix = "_fff_seq_print";
5379 //BBS:
5380 seq_print = true;
5381 } else {
5382 dist_min = 0.1f;
5383 postfix = "_fff";
5384 }
5385 }
5386
5387 dist_key += postfix;
5388 rot_key += postfix;
5389 bed_shrink_x_key += postfix;
5390 bed_shrink_y_key += postfix;
5391
5392 ImGui::AlignTextToFramePadding();
5393 imgui->text(_L("Spacing"));
5394 ImGui::SameLine(1.2 * cursor_slider_left);
5395 ImGui::PushItemWidth(window_width - slider_icon_width);
5396 bool b_Spacing = imgui->bbl_slider_float_style("##Spacing", &settings.distance, dist_min, 100.0f, "%5.2f") || dist_min > settings.distance;
5397 ImGui::SameLine(window_width - slider_icon_width + 1.3 * cursor_slider_left);
5398 ImGui::PushItemWidth(1.5 * slider_icon_width);
5399 bool b_spacing_input = ImGui::BBLDragFloat("##spacing_input", &settings.distance, 0.05f, 0.0f, 0.0f, "%.2f");
5400 if (b_Spacing || b_spacing_input)
5401 {
5402 settings.distance = std::max(dist_min, settings.distance);
5403 settings_out.distance = settings.distance;
5404 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance));
5405 settings_changed = true;
5406 }
5407 ImGui::Separator();
5408 if (imgui->bbl_checkbox(_L("Auto rotate for arrangement"), settings.enable_rotation)) {
5409 settings_out.enable_rotation = settings.enable_rotation;
5410 appcfg->set("arrange", rot_key.c_str(), settings_out.enable_rotation);
5411 settings_changed = true;
5412 }
5413
5414 if (imgui->bbl_checkbox(_L("Allow multiple materials on same plate"), settings.allow_multi_materials_on_same_plate)) {
5415 settings_out.allow_multi_materials_on_same_plate = settings.allow_multi_materials_on_same_plate;
5416 appcfg->set("arrange", multi_material_key.c_str(), settings_out.allow_multi_materials_on_same_plate );
5417 settings_changed = true;
5418 }
5419
5420 // only show this option if the printer has micro Lidar and can do first layer scan
5421 DynamicPrintConfig &current_config = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->printers.get_edited_preset().config;
5422 PresetBundle* preset_bundle = wxGetApp().preset_bundle;
5423 const bool has_lidar = preset_bundle->printers.get_edited_preset().has_lidar(preset_bundle);
5424 auto op = current_config.option("scan_first_layer");
5425 if (has_lidar && op && op->getBool()) {
5426 if (imgui->bbl_checkbox(_L("Avoid extrusion calibration region"), settings.avoid_extrusion_cali_region)) {
5427 settings_out.avoid_extrusion_cali_region = settings.avoid_extrusion_cali_region;
5428 appcfg->set("arrange", avoid_extrusion_key.c_str(), settings_out.avoid_extrusion_cali_region ? "1" : "0");
5429 settings_changed = true;
5430 }
5431 } else {
5432 settings_out.avoid_extrusion_cali_region = false;
5433 }
5434
5435 ImGui::Separator();
5436 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_ItemSpacing, ImVec2(15.0f, 10.0f));
5437 if (imgui->button(_L("Arrange"))) {
5438 wxGetApp().plater()->set_prepare_state(Job::PREPARE_STATE_DEFAULT);
5439 wxGetApp().plater()->arrange();
5440 }
5441
5442 ImGui::SameLine();
5443
5444 if (imgui->button(_L("Reset"))) {
5445 settings_out = ArrangeSettings{};
5446 settings_out.distance = std::max(dist_min, settings_out.distance);
5447 //BBS: add specific arrange settings
5448 if (seq_print) settings_out.is_seq_print = true;
5449 appcfg->set("arrange", dist_key.c_str(), float_to_string_decimal_point(settings_out.distance));
5450 appcfg->set("arrange", rot_key.c_str(), settings_out.enable_rotation? "1" : "0");
5451 settings_changed = true;
5452 }
5453 ImGui::PopStyleVar(1);
5454 imgui->end();
5455
5456 //BBS
5457 ImGuiWrapper::pop_toolbar_style();
5458
5459 return settings_changed;
5460}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_assemble_view_toolbar ( ) const
private
7625{
7626 if (!m_assemble_view_toolbar.is_enabled())
7627 return;
7628
7629 Size cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
7630 float inv_zoom = (float)wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_inv_zoom();
7631
7632#if BBS_TOOLBAR_ON_TOP
7633 GLToolbar& collapse_toolbar = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar();
7634 float collapse_toolbar_width = collapse_toolbar.is_enabled() ? collapse_toolbar.get_width() : 0.0f;
7635 float gizmo_width = m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_width();
7636 float assemble_width = m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width();
7637 float separator_width = m_separator_toolbar.get_width();

7639 float main_toolbar_left = std::max(-0.5f * cnv_size.get_width(), -0.5f * (m_main_toolbar.get_width() + gizmo_width + assemble_width - separator_width - collapse_toolbar_width)) * inv_zoom;

7641 //float left = 0.5f * (m_main_toolbar.get_width() + gizmo_width - m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width() + collapse_toolbar_width) * inv_zoom;
7642#else
7643 float gizmo_height = m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_height();

7645 float main_toolbar_height = (float)m_main_toolbar.get_height();
7646 float assemble_height = (float)m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_height();
7647 float top = 0.5f * (assemble_height - main_toolbar_height - gizmo_height) * inv_zoom;
7648 float left = (0.5f * (float)cnv_size.get_width() - m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width()) * inv_zoom;
7649 //BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": top %1%, main_toolbar_height %2%, space_height %3% gizmo_height %4%") % top % main_toolbar_height % space_height % gizmo_height;
7650#endif
7651 m_assemble_view_toolbar.set_position(top, left);
7652 m_assemble_view_toolbar.render(*this);
7653}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_background ( ) const

6603{
6604 bool use_error_color = false;
6605 if (wxGetApp().is_editor()) {
6606 use_error_color = m_dynamic_background_enabled &&
6607 (current_printer_technology() != ptSLA || !m_volumes.empty());
6608
6609 if (!m_volumes.empty())
6610 use_error_color &= _is_any_volume_outside();
6611 else {
6612 //BBS: use current plater's bounding box
6613 //BoundingBoxf3 test_volume = (m_config != nullptr) ? print_volume(*m_config) : BoundingBoxf3();
6614 BoundingBoxf3 test_volume = (const_cast<GLCanvas3D*>(this))->_get_current_partplate_print_volume();
6615 const BoundingBoxf3& path_bounding_box = m_gcode_viewer.get_paths_bounding_box();
6616 if (empty(path_bounding_box))
6617 use_error_color = false;
6618 else

6620 use_error_color = (test_volume.radius() > 0.0) ? m_toolpath_outside : false;
6621 //use_error_color &= (test_volume.radius() > 0.0) ? !test_volume.contains(path_bounding_box) : false;
6622 }
6623 }
6624
6625 glsafe(::glPushMatrix());
6626 glsafe(::glLoadIdentity());
6627 glsafe(::glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION));
6628 glsafe(::glPushMatrix());
6629 glsafe(::glLoadIdentity());
6630
6631 // Draws a bottom to top gradient over the complete screen.
6632 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6633
6634 ::glBegin(GL_QUADS);
6635
6636 float* background_color = m_is_dark ? DEFAULT_BG_LIGHT_COLOR_DARK : DEFAULT_BG_LIGHT_COLOR;
6637 float* error_background_color = m_is_dark ? ERROR_BG_LIGHT_COLOR_DARK : ERROR_BG_LIGHT_COLOR;
6638
6639 if (use_error_color)
6640 ::glColor3fv(error_background_color);
6641 else
6642 ::glColor3fv(background_color);
6643
6644 ::glVertex2f(-1.0f, -1.0f);
6645 ::glVertex2f(1.0f, -1.0f);
6646
6647 if (use_error_color)
6648 ::glColor3fv(error_background_color);
6649 else
6650 ::glColor3fv(background_color);
6651
6652 ::glVertex2f(1.0f, 1.0f);
6653 ::glVertex2f(-1.0f, 1.0f);
6654 glsafe(::glEnd());
6655
6656 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
6657
6658 glsafe(::glPopMatrix());
6659 glsafe(::glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW));
6660 glsafe(::glPopMatrix());
6661}

◆ _render_imgui_select_plate_toolbar()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_imgui_select_plate_toolbar ( )
private
7310{
7311 if (!m_sel_plate_toolbar.is_enabled()) {
7312 if (!m_render_preview)
7313 m_render_preview = true;
7314 return;
7315 }
7316
7317 IMToolbarItem* all_plates_stats_item = m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_all_plates_stats_item;
7318
7319 PartPlateList& plate_list = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
7320 for (int i = 0; i < plate_list.get_plate_count(); i++) {
7321 if (i < m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items.size()) {
7322 if (i == plate_list.get_curr_plate_index() && !all_plates_stats_item->selected)
7323 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->selected = true;
7324 else
7325 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->selected = false;
7326
7327 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->percent = plate_list.get_plate(i)->get_slicing_percent();
7328
7329 if (plate_list.get_plate(i)->is_slice_result_valid()) {
7330 if (plate_list.get_plate(i)->is_slice_result_ready_for_print())
7331 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICED;
7332 else
7333 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED;
7334 continue;
7335 }
7336 if (plate_list.get_plate(i)->get_slicing_percent() < 0.0f)
7337 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::UNSLICED;
7338 else
7339 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICING;
7340 }
7341 }
7342 if (m_sel_plate_toolbar.show_stats_item) {
7343 all_plates_stats_item->percent = 0.0f;
7344
7345 size_t sliced_plates_cnt = 0;
7346 bool slice_failed = false;
7347 for (auto plate : plate_list.get_nonempty_plate_list()) {
7348 if (plate->is_slice_result_valid() && plate->is_slice_result_ready_for_print())
7349 sliced_plates_cnt++;
7350 if (plate->is_slice_result_valid() && !plate->is_slice_result_ready_for_print())
7351 slice_failed = true;
7352 }
7353 all_plates_stats_item->percent = (float)(sliced_plates_cnt) / (float)(plate_list.get_nonempty_plate_list().size()) * 100.0f;
7354
7355 if (all_plates_stats_item->percent == 0.0f)
7356 all_plates_stats_item->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::UNSLICED;
7357 else if (sliced_plates_cnt == plate_list.get_nonempty_plate_list().size())
7358 all_plates_stats_item->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICED;
7359 else if (all_plates_stats_item->percent < 100.0f)
7360 all_plates_stats_item->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICING;
7361
7362 if (slice_failed)
7363 all_plates_stats_item->slice_state = IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED;
7364
7365 // Changing parameters does not invalid all plates, need extra logic to validate
7366 bool gcode_result_valid = true;
7367 for (auto gcode_result : plate_list.get_nonempty_plates_slice_results()) {
7368 if (gcode_result->moves.size() == 0) {
7369 gcode_result_valid = false;
7370 }
7371 }
7372 if (all_plates_stats_item->selected && all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICED && gcode_result_valid) {
7373 m_gcode_viewer.render_all_plates_stats(plate_list.get_nonempty_plates_slice_results());
7374 m_render_preview = false;
7375 }
7376 else{
7377 m_gcode_viewer.render_all_plates_stats(plate_list.get_nonempty_plates_slice_results(), false);
7378 m_render_preview = true;
7379 }
7380 }else
7381 m_render_preview = true;
7382
7383 // places the toolbar on the top_left corner of the 3d scene
7384#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
7385 float f_scale = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
7386#else
7387 float f_scale = 1.0;
7388#endif
7389 Size cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
7390 auto canvas_w = float(cnv_size.get_width());
7391 auto canvas_h = float(cnv_size.get_height());
7392
7393 bool is_hovered = false;
7394
7395 m_sel_plate_toolbar.set_icon_size(100.0f * f_scale, 100.0f * f_scale);
7396
7397 float button_width = m_sel_plate_toolbar.icon_width;
7398 float button_height = m_sel_plate_toolbar.icon_height;
7399
7400 float frame_padding = 1.0f * f_scale;
7401 float margin_size = 4.0f * f_scale;
7402 float button_margin = frame_padding;
7403
7404 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
7405 int item_count = m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items.size() + (m_sel_plate_toolbar.show_stats_item ? 1 : 0);
7406 bool show_scroll = item_count * (button_height + frame_padding * 2.0f + button_margin) - button_margin + 22.0f * f_scale > canvas_h ? true: false;
7407 show_scroll = m_sel_plate_toolbar.is_display_scrollbar && show_scroll;
7408 float window_height = std::min(item_count * (button_height + (frame_padding + margin_size) * 2.0f + button_margin) - button_margin + 28.0f * f_scale, canvas_h);
7409 float window_width = m_sel_plate_toolbar.icon_width + margin_size * 2 + (show_scroll ? 28.0f * f_scale : 20.0f * f_scale);
7410
7411 ImVec4 window_bg = ImVec4(0.82f, 0.82f, 0.82f, 0.5f);
7412 ImVec4 button_active = ImVec4(0.12f, 0.56f, 0.92, 1.0f);
7413 ImVec4 button_hover = ImVec4(0.67f, 0.67f, 0.67, 1.0f);
7414 ImVec4 scroll_col = ImVec4(0.77f, 0.77f, 0.77f, 1.0f);
7415 //ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, ImVec4(0.f, 0.f, 0.f, 1.0f));
7416 //use white text as the background switch to black
7417 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, ImVec4(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));

7419 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ScrollbarBg, window_bg);
7420 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ScrollbarGrabActive, scroll_col);

7423 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonActive, button_active);
7424 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonHovered, button_hover);
7425

7427 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowBorderSize, 0.0f);
7428 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowRounding, 4.0f);
7429 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_FrameRounding, 3.0f);
7430
7431 imgui.set_next_window_pos(canvas_w * 0, canvas_h * 0, ImGuiCond_Always, 0, 0);
7432 imgui.set_next_window_size(window_width, window_height, ImGuiCond_Always);
7433
7434 if (show_scroll)
7435 imgui.begin(_L("Select Plate"), ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse);
7436 else
7437 imgui.begin(_L("Select Plate"), ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoScrollbar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse);
7438 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.2f);
7439
7440 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_FrameBorderSize, 1.0f * f_scale);
7441
7442 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height); // Size of the image we want to make visible
7443 ImVec4 bg_col = ImVec4(128.0f, 128.0f, 128.0f, 0.0f);
7444 ImVec4 tint_col = ImVec4(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f); // No tint
7445 ImVec2 margin = ImVec2(margin_size, margin_size);
7446
7447 if(m_sel_plate_toolbar.show_stats_item)
7448 {
7449 // draw image
7450 ImVec2 button_start_pos = ImGui::GetCursorScreenPos();
7451
7452 if (all_plates_stats_item->selected) {
7453 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Button, button_active);
7454 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonHovered, button_active);
7455 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonActive, button_active);
7456 }
7457 else {
7458 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Button, ImVec4(128.0f, 128.0f, 128.0f, 0.0f));
7459 if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED) {
7460 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonHovered, ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Button));
7461 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonActive, ImGui::GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_Button));
7462 }
7463 else {
7464 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonHovered, button_hover);
7465 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonActive, button_hover);
7466 }
7467 }
7468
7469 ImVec4 text_clr;
7470 ImTextureID btn_texture_id;
7471 if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::UNSLICED || all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICING || all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED)
7472 {
7473 text_clr = ImVec4(0, 174.0f / 255.0f, 66.0f / 255.0f, 0.2f);
7474 btn_texture_id = (ImTextureID)(intptr_t)(all_plates_stats_item->image_texture_transparent.get_id());
7475 }
7476 else
7477 {
7478 text_clr = ImVec4(0, 174.0f / 255.0f, 66.0f / 255.0f, 1);
7479 btn_texture_id = (ImTextureID)(intptr_t)(all_plates_stats_item->image_texture.get_id());
7480 }
7481
7482 if (ImGui::ImageButton2(btn_texture_id, size, {0,0}, {1,1}, frame_padding, bg_col, tint_col, margin)) {
7483 if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state != IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED) {
7484 if (m_process && !m_process->running()) {
7485 for (int i = 0; i < m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items.size(); i++) {
7486 m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i]->selected = false;
7487 }
7488 all_plates_stats_item->selected = true;
7489 wxCommandEvent evt = wxCommandEvent(EVT_GLTOOLBAR_SLICE_ALL);
7490 wxPostEvent(wxGetApp().plater(), evt);
7491 }
7492 }
7493 }
7494
7495 ImGui::PopStyleColor(3);
7496
7497 ImVec2 start_pos = ImVec2(button_start_pos.x + frame_padding + margin.x, button_start_pos.y + frame_padding + margin.y);
7498 if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::UNSLICED) {
7499 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7500 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7501 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 80));
7502 }
7503 else if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICING) {
7504 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height * all_plates_stats_item->percent / 100.0f);
7505 ImVec2 rect_start_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7506 ImVec2 rect_end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + button_width, start_pos.y + button_height);
7507 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, rect_end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 10));
7508 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(rect_start_pos, rect_end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 80));
7509 }
7510 else if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED) {
7511 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7512 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7513 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(40, 1, 1, 64));
7514 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(208, 27, 27, 255), 0.0f, 0, 1.0f);
7515 }
7516 else if (all_plates_stats_item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICED) {
7517 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7518 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7519 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 10));
7520 }
7521
7522 // draw text
7523 GImGui->FontSize = 15.0f;
7524 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, text_clr);
7525 ImVec2 text_size = ImGui::CalcTextSize(("All Plates"));
7526 ImVec2 text_start_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + (button_width - text_size.x) / 2, start_pos.y + 3.0f * button_height / 5.0f);
7527 ImGui::RenderText(text_start_pos, ("All Plates"));
7528 text_size = ImGui::CalcTextSize(("Stats"));
7529 text_start_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + (button_width - text_size.x) / 2, text_start_pos.y + ImGui::GetTextLineHeight());
7530 ImGui::RenderText(text_start_pos, ("Stats"));
7531 ImGui::PopStyleColor();
7532 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.2f);
7533 }
7534
7535 for (int i = 0; i < m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items.size(); i++) {
7536 IMToolbarItem* item = m_sel_plate_toolbar.m_items[i];
7537
7538 // draw image
7539 ImVec2 button_start_pos = ImGui::GetCursorScreenPos();
7540 ImGui::PushID(i);
7541 ImVec2 uv0 = ImVec2(0.0f, 1.0f); // UV coordinates for lower-left
7542 ImVec2 uv1 = ImVec2(1.0f, 0.0f); // UV coordinates in our texture
7543
7544 auto button_pos = ImGui::GetCursorPos();
7545 ImGui::SetCursorPos(button_pos + margin);
7546
7547 ImGui::Image(item->texture_id, size, uv0, uv1, tint_col);
7548
7549 ImGui::SetCursorPos(button_pos);
7550
7551 // invisible button
7552 auto button_size = size + margin + margin + ImVec2(2 * frame_padding, 2 * frame_padding);
7553 ImGui::PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_FrameBorderSize, 2.0f * f_scale);
7554 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Button, ImVec4(.0f, .0f, .0f, .0f));
7555 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonHovered, ImVec4(.0f, .0f, .0f, .0f));
7556 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ButtonActive, ImVec4(.0f, .0f, .0f, .0f));
7557 if (item->selected) {
7558 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Border, button_active);
7559 }
7560 else {
7561 if (ImGui::IsMouseHoveringRect(button_pos, button_pos + button_size)) {
7562 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Border, button_hover);
7563 }
7564 else {
7565 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Border, ImVec4(.0f, .0f, .0f, .0f));
7566 }
7567 }
7568 if(ImGui::Button("##invisible_button", button_size)){
7569 if (m_process && !m_process->running()) {
7570 all_plates_stats_item->selected = false;
7571 item->selected = true;
7572 // begin to slicing plate
7573 wxCommandEvent* evt = new wxCommandEvent(EVT_GLTOOLBAR_SELECT_SLICED_PLATE);
7574 evt->SetInt(i);
7575 wxQueueEvent(wxGetApp().plater(), evt);
7576 }
7577 }
7578 ImGui::PopStyleColor(4);
7579 ImGui::PopStyleVar();
7580
7581 ImVec2 start_pos = ImVec2(button_start_pos.x + frame_padding + margin.x, button_start_pos.y + frame_padding + margin.y);
7582 if (item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::UNSLICED) {
7583 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7584 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7585 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 80));
7586 } else if (item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICING) {
7587 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height * item->percent / 100.0f);
7588 ImVec2 rect_start_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7589 ImVec2 rect_end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + button_width, start_pos.y + button_height);
7590 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, rect_end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 10));
7591 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(rect_start_pos, rect_end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 80));
7592 } else if (item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICE_FAILED) {
7593 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7594 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7595 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(40, 1, 1, 64));
7596 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(208, 27, 27, 255), 0.0f, 0, 1.0f);
7597 } else if (item->slice_state == IMToolbarItem::SliceState::SLICED) {
7598 ImVec2 size = ImVec2(button_width, button_height);
7599 ImVec2 end_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + size.x, start_pos.y + size.y);
7600 ImGui::GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRectFilled(start_pos, end_pos, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 10));
7601 }
7602
7603 // draw text
7604 ImVec2 text_start_pos = ImVec2(start_pos.x + 10.0f, start_pos.y + 8.0f);
7605 ImGui::RenderText(text_start_pos, std::to_string(i + 1).c_str());
7606
7607 ImGui::PopID();
7608 }
7609 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
7610 ImGui::PopStyleColor(8);
7611 ImGui::PopStyleVar(5);
7612
7613 if (ImGui::IsWindowHovered() || is_hovered) {
7614 m_sel_plate_toolbar.is_display_scrollbar = true;
7615 } else {
7616 m_sel_plate_toolbar.is_display_scrollbar = false;
7617 }
7618
7619 imgui.end();
7620}

◆ _render_main_toolbar()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_main_toolbar ( )
private
7275{
7276 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
7277 return;
7278
7279 Size cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
7280 float inv_zoom = (float)wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_inv_zoom();
7281
7282#if BBS_TOOLBAR_ON_TOP
7283 GLToolbar& collapse_toolbar = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar();
7284 float collapse_toolbar_width = collapse_toolbar.is_enabled() ? collapse_toolbar.get_width() : 0.0f;
7285 float gizmo_width = m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_width();
7286 float assemble_width = m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width();
7287 float separator_width = m_separator_toolbar.get_width();
7288 float top = 0.5f * (float)cnv_size.get_height() * inv_zoom;
7289 float left = std::max(-0.5f * cnv_size.get_width(), -0.5f * (m_main_toolbar.get_width() + separator_width + gizmo_width + assemble_width - collapse_toolbar_width)) * inv_zoom;
7290#else
7291 float gizmo_height = m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_height();
7292 float space_height = GLGizmosManager::Default_Icons_Size * wxGetApp().toolbar_icon_scale();
7293 float main_toolbar_height = (float)m_main_toolbar.get_height();
7294 float assemble_height = m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_height();
7295 float top = 0.5f * (main_toolbar_height + gizmo_height + assemble_height) * inv_zoom;
7296 float left = (0.5f * (float)cnv_size.get_width() - m_main_toolbar.get_width()) * inv_zoom;
7297 //BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << boost::format(": top %1%, main_toolbar_height %2%, space_height %3% gizmo_height %4%") % top % main_toolbar_height % space_height % gizmo_height;
7298#endif
7299 m_main_toolbar.set_position(top, left);
7300 m_main_toolbar.render(*this);
7301 if (m_toolbar_highlighter.m_render_arrow)
7302 {
7303 m_main_toolbar.render_arrow(*this, m_toolbar_highlighter.m_toolbar_item);
7304 }
7305}

6711{
6712 if (m_volumes.empty())
6713 return;
6714

6716
6717 m_camera_clipping_plane = m_gizmos.get_clipping_plane();
6718
6719 if (m_picking_enabled)
6720 // Update the layer editing selection to the first object selected, update the current object maximum Z.
6721 m_layers_editing.select_object(*m_model, this->is_layers_editing_enabled() ? m_selection.get_object_idx() : -1);
6722
6723 if (const BuildVolume &build_volume = m_bed.build_volume(); build_volume.valid()) {
6724 switch (build_volume.type()) {
6725 case BuildVolume_Type::Rectangle: {
6726 const BoundingBox3Base<Vec3d> bed_bb = build_volume.bounding_volume().inflated(BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon);
6727 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ 0, // Rectangle
6728 { float(bed_bb.min.x()), float(bed_bb.min.y()), float(bed_bb.max.x()), float(bed_bb.max.y()) },
6729 { 0.0f, float(build_volume.printable_height()) } });
6730 break;
6731 }
6732 case BuildVolume_Type::Circle: {
6733 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ 1, // Circle
6734 { unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().center.x()), unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().center.y()), unscaled<float>(build_volume.circle().radius + BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon), 0.0f },
6735 { 0.0f, float(build_volume.printable_height() + BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon) } });
6736 break;
6737 }
6738 default:
6739 case BuildVolume_Type::Convex:
6740 case BuildVolume_Type::Custom: {
6741 m_volumes.set_print_volume({ static_cast<int>(type),
6742 { -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX },
6743 { -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX } }
6744 );
6745 }
6746 }

6750 }

6752

6755 else
6756 m_volumes.set_z_range(-FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);

6762 }

6766 else {

6780 {
6781 default:

6791 return volume.is_active && (volume.is_modifier || volume.composite_id.object_id != object_id);
6792 });
6793 m_layers_editing.render_volumes(*this, m_volumes);
6794 }
6795 else {
6796 /*if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_wireframe_enabled()) {
6797 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_show_wireframe())
6798 shader->set_uniform("show_wireframe", true);
6799 else
6800 shader->set_uniform("show_wireframe", false);
6801 }*/

6803 // do not cull backfaces to show broken geometry, if any
6804 m_volumes.render(type, m_picking_enabled, wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_view_matrix(), [this, canvas_type](const GLVolume& volume) {

5294 }

5300 }
5301

5305 wxGetApp().plater()->set_prepare_state(Job::PREPARE_STATE_DEFAULT);
5306 wxGetApp().plater()->orient();
5307 }
5308
5309 ImGui::SameLine();
5310
5311 if (imgui->button(_L("Reset"))) {
5312 settings_out = OrientSettings{};
5313 settings_out.overhang_angle = 60.f;
5314 appcfg->set("orient", angle_key, std::to_string(settings_out.overhang_angle));
5315 appcfg->set("orient", rot_key, settings_out.enable_rotation ? "1" : "0");
5316 appcfg->set("orient", key_min_area, settings_out.min_area? "1" : "0");
5317 settings_changed = true;
5318 }
5319
5320 imgui->end();
5321 ImGuiWrapper::pop_toolbar_style();
5322 return settings_changed;
5323}

7738
7739 GLToolbar& collapse_toolbar = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar();

7741 float gizmo_width = m_gizmos.get_scaled_total_width();
7742 float assemble_width = m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_width();

7747
