◆ _render_sla_slices()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_sla_slices ( )
private
8064{
8065 if (!m_use_clipping_planes || current_printer_technology() != ptSLA)
8066 return;
8067
8068 const SLAPrint* print = this->sla_print();
8069 const PrintObjects& print_objects = print->objects();
8070 if (print_objects.empty())
8071 // nothing to render, return
8072 return;
8073
8074 double clip_min_z = -m_clipping_planes[0].get_data()[3];
8075 double clip_max_z = m_clipping_planes[1].get_data()[3];
8076 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (unsigned int)print_objects.size(); ++i) {
8077 const SLAPrintObject* obj = print_objects[i];
8078
8079 if (!obj->is_step_done(slaposSliceSupports))
8080 continue;
8081
8082 SlaCap::ObjectIdToTrianglesMap::iterator it_caps_bottom = m_sla_caps[0].triangles.find(i);
8083 SlaCap::ObjectIdToTrianglesMap::iterator it_caps_top = m_sla_caps[1].triangles.find(i);
8084 {
8085 if (it_caps_bottom == m_sla_caps[0].triangles.end())
8086 it_caps_bottom = m_sla_caps[0].triangles.emplace(i, SlaCap::Triangles()).first;
8087 if (!m_sla_caps[0].matches(clip_min_z)) {
8088 m_sla_caps[0].z = clip_min_z;
8089 it_caps_bottom->second.object.clear();
8090 it_caps_bottom->second.supports.clear();
8091 }
8092 if (it_caps_top == m_sla_caps[1].triangles.end())
8093 it_caps_top = m_sla_caps[1].triangles.emplace(i, SlaCap::Triangles()).first;
8094 if (!m_sla_caps[1].matches(clip_max_z)) {
8095 m_sla_caps[1].z = clip_max_z;
8096 it_caps_top->second.object.clear();
8097 it_caps_top->second.supports.clear();
8098 }
8099 }
8100 Pointf3s &bottom_obj_triangles = it_caps_bottom->second.object;
8101 Pointf3s &bottom_sup_triangles = it_caps_bottom->second.supports;
8102 Pointf3s &top_obj_triangles = it_caps_top->second.object;
8103 Pointf3s &top_sup_triangles = it_caps_top->second.supports;
8104
8105 if ((bottom_obj_triangles.empty() || bottom_sup_triangles.empty() || top_obj_triangles.empty() || top_sup_triangles.empty()) &&
8106 !obj->get_slice_index().empty())
8107 {
8108 double layer_height = print->default_object_config().layer_height.value;
8109 double initial_layer_height = print->material_config().initial_layer_height.value;
8110 bool left_handed = obj->is_left_handed();
8111
8112 coord_t key_zero = obj->get_slice_index().front().print_level();
8113 // Slice at the center of the slab starting at clip_min_z will be rendered for the lower plane.
8114 coord_t key_low = coord_t((clip_min_z - initial_layer_height + layer_height) / SCALING_FACTOR) + key_zero;
8115 // Slice at the center of the slab ending at clip_max_z will be rendered for the upper plane.
8116 coord_t key_high = coord_t((clip_max_z - initial_layer_height) / SCALING_FACTOR) + key_zero;
8117
8118 const SliceRecord& slice_low = obj->closest_slice_to_print_level(key_low, coord_t(SCALED_EPSILON));
8119 const SliceRecord& slice_high = obj->closest_slice_to_print_level(key_high, coord_t(SCALED_EPSILON));
8120
8121 // Offset to avoid OpenGL Z fighting between the object's horizontal surfaces and the triangluated surfaces of the cuts.
8122 double plane_shift_z = 0.002;
8123
8124 if (slice_low.is_valid()) {
8125 const ExPolygons& obj_bottom = slice_low.get_slice(soModel);
8126 const ExPolygons& sup_bottom = slice_low.get_slice(soSupport);
8127 // calculate model bottom cap
8128 if (bottom_obj_triangles.empty() && !obj_bottom.empty())
8129 bottom_obj_triangles = triangulate_expolygons_3d(obj_bottom, clip_min_z - plane_shift_z, ! left_handed);
8130 // calculate support bottom cap
8131 if (bottom_sup_triangles.empty() && !sup_bottom.empty())
8132 bottom_sup_triangles = triangulate_expolygons_3d(sup_bottom, clip_min_z - plane_shift_z, ! left_handed);
8133 }
8134
8135 if (slice_high.is_valid()) {
8136 const ExPolygons& obj_top = slice_high.get_slice(soModel);
8137 const ExPolygons& sup_top = slice_high.get_slice(soSupport);
8138 // calculate model top cap
8139 if (top_obj_triangles.empty() && !obj_top.empty())
8140 top_obj_triangles = triangulate_expolygons_3d(obj_top, clip_max_z + plane_shift_z, left_handed);
8141 // calculate support top cap
8142 if (top_sup_triangles.empty() && !sup_top.empty())
8143 top_sup_triangles = triangulate_expolygons_3d(sup_top, clip_max_z + plane_shift_z, left_handed);
8144 }
8145 }
8146
8147 if (!bottom_obj_triangles.empty() || !top_obj_triangles.empty() || !bottom_sup_triangles.empty() || !top_sup_triangles.empty()) {
8148 for (const SLAPrintObject::Instance& inst : obj->instances()) {
8149 glsafe(::glPushMatrix());
8150 glsafe(::glTranslated(unscale<double>(inst.shift.x()), unscale<double>(inst.shift.y()), 0));
8151 glsafe(::glRotatef(Geometry::rad2deg(inst.rotation), 0.0, 0.0, 1.0));
8152 if (obj->is_left_handed())
8153 // The polygons are mirrored by X.
8154 glsafe(::glScalef(-1.0, 1.0, 1.0));
8155 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
8156 glsafe(::glColor3f(1.0f, 0.37f, 0.0f));
8157 if (!bottom_obj_triangles.empty()) {
8158 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(3, GL_DOUBLE, 0, (GLdouble*)bottom_obj_triangles.front().data()));
8159 glsafe(::glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, bottom_obj_triangles.size()));
8160 }
8161 if (! top_obj_triangles.empty()) {
8162 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(3, GL_DOUBLE, 0, (GLdouble*)top_obj_triangles.front().data()));
8163 glsafe(::glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, top_obj_triangles.size()));
8164 }
8165 glsafe(::glColor3f(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.37f));
8166 if (! bottom_sup_triangles.empty()) {
8167 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(3, GL_DOUBLE, 0, (GLdouble*)bottom_sup_triangles.front().data()));
8168 glsafe(::glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, bottom_sup_triangles.size()));
8169 }
8170 if (! top_sup_triangles.empty()) {
8171 glsafe(::glVertexPointer(3, GL_DOUBLE, 0, (GLdouble*)top_sup_triangles.front().data()));
8172 glsafe(::glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLES, 0, top_sup_triangles.size()));
8173 }
8174 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
8175 glsafe(::glPopMatrix());
8176 }
8177 }
8178 }
8179}

#define GL_TRIANGLES

7119 // (without a reference style pointer, we will use one compared locally as a reference)
7120

7122 ImGui::ShowFontSelector("Fonts##Selector");

7130 static bool output_only_modified = false;
7131 if (ImGui::Button("Export"))

7133 if (output_dest == 0)
7134 ImGui::LogToClipboard();
7135 else
7136 ImGui::LogToTTY();

7138 ImGui::LogText("RenderColors:" IM_NEWLINE);

7141 const ImVec4& col = RenderColor::colors[i];

7143 if (!output_only_modified || memcmp(&col, &RenderColor::colors[i], sizeof(ImVec4)) != 0)

7145 name, 23 - (int)strlen(name), "", col.x, col.y, col.z, col.w);
7146 }
7147 ImGui::LogFinish();
7148 }
7149 ImGui::SameLine(); ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(120); ImGui::Combo("##output_type", &output_dest, "To Clipboard\0To TTY\0");

7151
7152 static ImGuiTextFilter filter;

7154
7155 static ImGuiColorEditFlags alpha_flags = 0;
7156 if (ImGui::RadioButton("Opaque", alpha_flags == ImGuiColorEditFlags_None)) { alpha_flags = ImGuiColorEditFlags_None; } ImGui::SameLine();

7158 if (ImGui::RadioButton("Both", alpha_flags == ImGuiColorEditFlags_AlphaPreviewHalf)) { alpha_flags = ImGuiColorEditFlags_AlphaPreviewHalf; } ImGui::SameLine();

7164 ImGui::TextUnformatted("In the color list:\n"
7165 "Left-click on color square to open color picker,\n"
7166 "Right-click to open edit options menu.");
7167 ImGui::PopTextWrapPos();

7171 ImGui::PushItemWidth(-160);
7172 for (int i = 0; i < RenderCol_Count; i++)
7173 {
7174 const char* name = GetRenderColName(i);
7175 if (!filter.PassFilter(name))
7176 continue;
7177 ImGui::PushID(i);
7178 ImGui::ColorEdit4("##color", (float*)&RenderColor::colors[i], ImGuiColorEditFlags_AlphaBar | alpha_flags);
7179 // Tips: in a real user application, you may want to merge and use an icon font into the main font,
7180 // so instead of "Save"/"Revert" you'd use icons!
7181 // Read the FAQ and docs/FONTS.md about using icon fonts. It's really easy and super convenient!
7182 ImGui::SameLine(0.0f, 3.0f);
7183 if (ImGui::Button("Set")) {

7185 PartPlate::update_render_colors();
7186 GLGizmoBase::update_render_colors();
7187 GLCanvas3D::update_render_colors();

7189 }

7192 ImGui::PopID();

7198 }

7200 ImGui::EndTabBar();
7201 }

◆ _render_volumes_for_picking()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_render_volumes_for_picking ( ) const
private
7208{
7209 static const GLfloat INV_255 = 1.0f / 255.0f;
7210
7211 // do not cull backfaces to show broken geometry, if any
7212 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE));
7213
7214 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
7215 glsafe(::glEnableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
7216
7217 const Transform3d& view_matrix = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_view_matrix();
7218 for (size_t type = 0; type < 2; ++ type) {
7219 GLVolumeWithIdAndZList to_render = volumes_to_render(m_volumes.volumes, (type == 0) ? GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque : GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent, view_matrix);
7220 for (const GLVolumeWithIdAndZ& volume : to_render)
7221 if (!volume.first->disabled && (volume.first->composite_id.volume_id >= 0 || m_render_sla_auxiliaries)) {
7222 // Object picking mode. Render the object with a color encoding the object index.
7223 // we reserve color = (0,0,0) for occluders (as the printbed)
7224 // so we shift volumes' id by 1 to get the proper color
7225 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
7226 unsigned int id = volume.second.first;
7227 //unsigned int id = 1 + volume.second.first;
7228 unsigned int r = (id & (0x000000FF << 0)) << 0;
7229 unsigned int g = (id & (0x000000FF << 8)) >> 8;
7230 unsigned int b = (id & (0x000000FF << 16)) >> 16;
7231 unsigned int a = picking_checksum_alpha_channel(r, g, b);
7232 glsafe(::glColor4f((GLfloat)r * INV_255, (GLfloat)g * INV_255, (GLfloat)b * INV_255, (GLfloat)a * INV_255));
7233 volume.first->render();
7234 }
7235 }
7236
7237 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
7238 glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
7239
7240 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
7241}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_resize ( unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h 
)
private
6338{
6339 if (m_canvas == nullptr && m_context == nullptr)
6340 return;
6341
6342 const std::array<unsigned int, 2> new_size = { w, h };
6343 if (m_old_size == new_size)
6344 return;
6345
6346 m_old_size = new_size;
6347

6350
6351 //BBS reduce render
6352 if (m_last_w == w && m_last_h == h) {
6353 return;
6354 }

6357 m_last_h = h;
6358

6361 imgui->set_scaling(font_size, 1.0f, m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor());
6362#else
6363 imgui->set_scaling(font_size, m_canvas->GetContentScaleFactor(), 1.0f);
6364#endif

6366 this->request_extra_frame();
6367

6370}

◆ _set_warning_notification()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_set_warning_notification ( EWarning  warning,
bool  state 
)
private
8953{
8954 enum ErrorType{
8955 PLATER_WARNING,
8956 PLATER_ERROR,
8957 SLICING_SERIOUS_WARNING,
8958 SLICING_ERROR
8959 };
8960 std::string text;
8961 ErrorType error = ErrorType::PLATER_WARNING;
8962 const ModelObject* conflictObj=nullptr;
8963 switch (warning) {
8964 case EWarning::GCodeConflict: {
8965 static std::string prevConflictText;
8966 text = prevConflictText;
8967 error = ErrorType::SLICING_SERIOUS_WARNING;
8968 if (!m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result) { break; }
8969 std::string objName1 = m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.value()._objName1;
8970 std::string objName2 = m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.value()._objName2;
8971 double height = m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.value()._height;
8972 int layer = m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.value().layer;
8973 text = (boost::format(_u8L("Conflicts of gcode paths have been found at layer %d, z = %.2lf mm. Please separate the conflicted objects farther (%s <-> %s).")) % layer %
8974 height % objName1 % objName2)
8975 .str();
8976 prevConflictText = text;
8977 const PrintObject *obj2 = reinterpret_cast<const PrintObject *>(m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.value()._obj2);
8978 conflictObj = obj2->model_object();
8979 break;
8980 }
8981 case EWarning::ObjectOutside: text = _u8L("An object is layed over the boundary of plate."); break;
8982 case EWarning::ToolHeightOutside: text = _u8L("A G-code path goes beyond the max print height."); error = ErrorType::SLICING_ERROR; break;
8983 case EWarning::ToolpathOutside: text = _u8L("A G-code path goes beyond the boundary of plate."); error = ErrorType::SLICING_ERROR; break;
8984 // BBS: remove _u8L() for SLA
8985 case EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside: text = ("SLA supports outside the print area were detected."); error = ErrorType::PLATER_ERROR; break;
8986 case EWarning::SomethingNotShown: text = _u8L("Only the object being edit is visible."); break;
8987 case EWarning::ObjectClashed:
8988 text = _u8L("An object is laid over the boundary of plate or exceeds the height limit.\n"
8989 "Please solve the problem by moving it totally on or off the plate, and confirming that the height is within the build volume.");
8990 error = ErrorType::PLATER_ERROR;
8991 break;
8992 }
8993 //BBS: this may happened when exit the app, plater is null
8994 if (!wxGetApp().plater())
8995 return;
8996 auto& notification_manager = *wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager();
8997
8998 switch (error)
8999 {
9000 case PLATER_WARNING:
9001 if (state)
9002 notification_manager.push_plater_warning_notification(text);
9003 else
9004 notification_manager.close_plater_warning_notification(text);
9005 break;
9006 case PLATER_ERROR:
9007 if (state)
9008 notification_manager.push_plater_error_notification(text);
9009 else
9010 notification_manager.close_plater_error_notification(text);
9011 break;
9012 case SLICING_SERIOUS_WARNING:
9013 if (state)
9014 notification_manager.push_slicing_serious_warning_notification(text, {conflictObj});
9015 else
9016 notification_manager.close_slicing_serious_warning_notification(text);
9017 break;
9018 case SLICING_ERROR:
9019 if (state)
9020 notification_manager.push_slicing_error_notification(text, {conflictObj});
9021 else
9022 notification_manager.close_slicing_error_notification(text);
9023 break;
9024 default:
9025 break;
9026 }
9027}

◆ _set_warning_notification_if_needed()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_set_warning_notification_if_needed ( EWarning  warning)
private
8905{
8906 _set_current();
8907 bool show = false;
8908 if (!m_volumes.empty()) {
8909 show = _is_any_volume_outside();
8910 show &= m_gcode_viewer.has_data() && m_gcode_viewer.is_contained_in_bed() && m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.has_value();
8911 } else {
8912 if (wxGetApp().is_editor()) {
8913 if (current_printer_technology() != ptSLA) {
8914 unsigned int max_z_layer = m_gcode_viewer.get_layers_z_range().back();
8915 if (warning == EWarning::ToolHeightOutside) // check if max z_layer height exceed max print height
8916 show = m_gcode_viewer.has_data() && (m_gcode_viewer.get_layers_zs()[max_z_layer] - m_gcode_viewer.get_max_print_height() >= 1e-6);
8917 else if (warning == EWarning::ToolpathOutside) { // check if max x,y coords exceed bed area
8918 show = m_gcode_viewer.has_data() && !m_gcode_viewer.is_contained_in_bed() &&
8919 (m_gcode_viewer.get_max_print_height() -m_gcode_viewer.get_layers_zs()[max_z_layer] >= 1e-6);
8920 }
8921 else if (warning == EWarning::GCodeConflict)
8922 show = m_gcode_viewer.has_data() && m_gcode_viewer.is_contained_in_bed() && m_gcode_viewer.m_conflict_result.has_value();
8923 }
8924 }
8925 }
8926
8927 _set_warning_notification(warning, show);
8928}

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_update_imgui_select_plate_toolbar ( )
private
6192{
6193 bool result = true;
6194 if (!m_sel_plate_toolbar.is_enabled()) return false;
6195
6196 _update_select_plate_toolbar_stats_item();
6197
6198 m_sel_plate_toolbar.del_all_item();
6199
6200 PartPlateList& plate_list = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
6201 for (int i = 0; i < plate_list.get_plate_count(); i++) {
6202 IMToolbarItem* item = new IMToolbarItem();

6204 if (plate && plate->thumbnail_data.is_valid()) {
6205 PartPlate* plate = plate_list.get_plate(i);

6207 item->image_width = plate->thumbnail_data.width;
6208 item->image_height = plate->thumbnail_data.height;
6209 result = item->generate_texture();
6210 }

6212 }
6213

6215 return result;
6216}

◆ _update_selection_from_hover()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_update_selection_from_hover ( )
private
9040{
9041 bool ctrl_pressed = wxGetKeyState(WXK_CONTROL);
9042
9043 if (m_hover_volume_idxs.empty()) {
9044 if (!ctrl_pressed && (m_rectangle_selection.get_state() == GLSelectionRectangle::Select))
9045 m_selection.remove_all();
9046
9047 return;
9048 }
9049
9050 GLSelectionRectangle::EState state = m_rectangle_selection.get_state();
9051
9052 bool hover_modifiers_only = true;
9053 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
9054 if (!m_volumes.volumes[i]->is_modifier) {
9055 hover_modifiers_only = false;
9056 break;
9057 }
9058 }
9059
9060 bool selection_changed = false;
9061 if (state == GLSelectionRectangle::Select) {
9062 bool contains_all = true;
9063 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
9064 if (!m_selection.contains_volume((unsigned int)i)) {
9065 contains_all = false;
9066 break;
9067 }
9068 }
9069
9070 // the selection is going to be modified (Add)
9071 if (!contains_all) {
9072 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(std::string("Select by rectangle"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::Selection);
9073 selection_changed = true;
9074 }
9075 }
9076 else {
9077 bool contains_any = false;
9078 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
9079 if (m_selection.contains_volume((unsigned int)i)) {
9080 contains_any = true;
9081 break;
9082 }
9083 }
9084
9085 // the selection is going to be modified (Remove)
9086 if (contains_any) {
9087 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(std::string("Unselect by rectangle"), UndoRedo::SnapshotType::Selection);
9088 selection_changed = true;
9089 }
9090 }
9091
9092 if (!selection_changed)
9093 return;
9094
9095 Plater::SuppressSnapshots suppress(wxGetApp().plater());
9096
9097 if ((state == GLSelectionRectangle::Select) && !ctrl_pressed)
9098 m_selection.clear();
9099
9100 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
9101 if (state == GLSelectionRectangle::Select) {
9102 if (hover_modifiers_only) {
9103 const GLVolume& v = *m_volumes.volumes[i];
9104 m_selection.add_volume(v.object_idx(), v.volume_idx(), v.instance_idx(), false);
9105 }
9106 else
9107 m_selection.add(i, false);
9108 }
9109 else
9110 m_selection.remove(i);
9111 }
9112
9113 if (m_selection.is_empty())
9114 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
9115 else
9116 m_gizmos.refresh_on_off_state();
9117
9118 m_gizmos.update_data();
9119 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_OBJECT_SELECT));
9120 m_dirty = true;
9121}

◆ _update_volumes_hover_state()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::_update_volumes_hover_state ( )
private
8187{
8188 for (GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
8189 v->hover = GLVolume::HS_None;
8190 }
8191
8192 if (m_hover_volume_idxs.empty())
8193 return;
8194
8195 bool ctrl_pressed = wxGetKeyState(WXK_CONTROL); // additive select/deselect
8196 bool shift_pressed = wxGetKeyState(WXK_SHIFT); // select by rectangle
8197 bool alt_pressed = wxGetKeyState(WXK_ALT); // deselect by rectangle
8198
8199 if (alt_pressed && (shift_pressed || ctrl_pressed)) {
8200 // illegal combinations of keys
8201 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
8202 return;
8203 }
8204
8205 bool selection_modifiers_only = m_selection.is_empty() || m_selection.is_any_modifier();
8206
8207 bool hover_modifiers_only = true;
8208 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
8209 if (!m_volumes.volumes[i]->is_modifier) {
8210 hover_modifiers_only = false;
8211 break;
8212 }
8213 }
8214
8215 std::set<std::pair<int, int>> hover_instances;
8216 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
8217 const GLVolume& v = *m_volumes.volumes[i];
8218 hover_instances.insert(std::make_pair(v.object_idx(), v.instance_idx()));
8219 }
8220
8221 bool hover_from_single_instance = hover_instances.size() == 1;
8222
8223 if (hover_modifiers_only && !hover_from_single_instance) {
8224 // do not allow to select volumes from different instances
8225 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
8226 return;
8227 }
8228
8229 for (int i : m_hover_volume_idxs) {
8230 GLVolume& volume = *m_volumes.volumes[i];
8231 if (volume.hover != GLVolume::HS_None)
8232 continue;
8233
8234 bool deselect = volume.selected && ((ctrl_pressed && !shift_pressed) || alt_pressed);
8235 // (volume->is_modifier && !selection_modifiers_only && !is_ctrl_pressed) -> allows hovering on selected modifiers belonging to selection of type Instance
8236 bool select = (!volume.selected || (volume.is_modifier && !selection_modifiers_only && !ctrl_pressed)) && !alt_pressed;
8237
8238 if (select || deselect) {
8239 bool as_volume =
8240 volume.is_modifier && hover_from_single_instance && !ctrl_pressed &&
8241 (
8242 (!deselect) ||
8243 (deselect && !m_selection.is_single_full_instance() && (volume.object_idx() == m_selection.get_object_idx()) && (volume.instance_idx() == m_selection.get_instance_idx()))
8244 );
8245
8246 if (as_volume)
8247 volume.hover = deselect ? GLVolume::HS_Deselect : GLVolume::HS_Select;
8248 else {
8249 int object_idx = volume.object_idx();
8250 int instance_idx = volume.instance_idx();
8251
8252 for (GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
8253 if (v->object_idx() == object_idx && v->instance_idx() == instance_idx)
8254 v->hover = deselect ? GLVolume::HS_Deselect : GLVolume::HS_Select;
8255 }
8256 }
8257 }
8258 else if (volume.selected)
8259 volume.hover = GLVolume::HS_Hover;
8260 }
8261}

@ HS_Select

)
4717{
4718 if (!snapshot_type.empty())
4719 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(snapshot_type);
4720
4721 m_selection.flattening_rotate(normal);
4722 do_rotate(""); // avoid taking another snapshot
4723}

◆ do_mirror()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::do_mirror ( const std::string &  snapshot_type)
4734{
4735 if (m_model == nullptr)
4736 return;
4737
4738 if (!snapshot_type.empty())
4739 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(snapshot_type);
4740
4741 // stores current min_z of instances
4742 std::map<std::pair<int, int>, double> min_zs;
4743 if (!snapshot_type.empty()) {
4744 for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(m_model->objects.size()); ++i) {
4745 const ModelObject* obj = m_model->objects[i];
4746 for (int j = 0; j < static_cast<int>(obj->instances.size()); ++j) {
4747 min_zs[{ i, j }] = obj->instance_bounding_box(j).min.z();
4748 }
4749 }
4750 }
4751
4752 std::set<std::pair<int, int>> done; // keeps track of modified instances
4753
4754 Selection::EMode selection_mode = m_selection.get_mode();
4755
4756 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4757 int object_idx = v->object_idx();
4758 if (object_idx < 0 || (int)m_model->objects.size() <= object_idx)
4759 continue;
4760
4761 int instance_idx = v->instance_idx();
4762 int volume_idx = v->volume_idx();
4763
4764 done.insert(std::pair<int, int>(object_idx, instance_idx));
4765
4766 // Mirror instances/volumes
4767 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
4768 if (model_object != nullptr) {
4769 if (selection_mode == Selection::Instance)
4770 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_mirror(v->get_instance_mirror());
4771 else if (selection_mode == Selection::Volume) {
4772 if (model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->get_mirror() != v->get_volume_mirror()) {
4773 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_mirror(v->get_volume_mirror());
4774 // BBS: backup
4775 Slic3r::save_object_mesh(*model_object);
4776 }
4777 }
4778
4779 model_object->invalidate_bounding_box();
4780 }
4781 }
4782
4783 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4784 m_selection.notify_instance_update(-1, -1);
4785
4786 // Fixes sinking/flying instances
4787 for (const std::pair<int, int>& i : done) {
4788 ModelObject* m = m_model->objects[i.first];
4789
4790 //BBS: don't call translate if the z is zero
4791 double shift_z = m->get_instance_min_z(i.second);
4792 // leave sinking instances as sinking
4793 if ((min_zs.empty() || min_zs.find({ i.first, i.second })->second >= SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD || shift_z > SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD)&&(shift_z != 0.0f)) {
4794 Vec3d shift(0.0, 0.0, -shift_z);
4795 m_selection.translate(i.first, i.second, shift);
4796 m->translate_instance(i.second, shift);
4797 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4798 m_selection.notify_instance_update(i.first, i.second);
4799 }
4800 wxGetApp().obj_list()->update_info_items(static_cast<size_t>(i.first));
4801
4802 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4803 PartPlateList &plate_list = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
4804 plate_list.notify_instance_update(i.first, i.second);
4805
4806 //BBS: nofity object list to update
4807 wxGetApp().plater()->sidebar().obj_list()->update_plate_values_for_items();
4808 }
4809 //BBS: nofity object list to update
4810 wxGetApp().plater()->sidebar().obj_list()->update_plate_values_for_items();
4811
4812 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_SCHEDULE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS));
4813
4814 m_dirty = true;
4815}

int notify_instance_update(int obj_id, int instance_id)

◆ do_move()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::do_move ( const std::string &  snapshot_type)
4452{
4453 if (m_model == nullptr)
4454 return;
4455
4456 if (!snapshot_type.empty())
4457 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(snapshot_type);
4458
4459 std::set<std::pair<int, int>> done; // keeps track of modified instances
4460 bool object_moved = false;
4461
4462 // BBS: support wipe-tower for multi-plates
4463 int n_plates = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_plate_count();
4464 std::vector<Vec3d> wipe_tower_origins(n_plates, Vec3d::Zero());
4465
4466 Selection::EMode selection_mode = m_selection.get_mode();
4467
4468 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4469 int object_idx = v->object_idx();
4470 int instance_idx = v->instance_idx();
4471 int volume_idx = v->volume_idx();
4472
4473 std::pair<int, int> done_id(object_idx, instance_idx);
4474
4475 if (0 <= object_idx && object_idx < (int)m_model->objects.size()) {
4476 done.insert(done_id);
4477
4478 // Move instances/volumes
4479 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
4480 if (model_object != nullptr) {
4481 if (selection_mode == Selection::Instance)
4482 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_offset(v->get_instance_offset());
4483 else if (selection_mode == Selection::Volume) {
4484 if (model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->get_offset() != v->get_volume_offset()) {
4485 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_offset(v->get_volume_offset());
4486 // BBS: backup
4487 Slic3r::save_object_mesh(*model_object);
4488 }
4489 }
4490
4491 object_moved = true;
4492 model_object->invalidate_bounding_box();
4493 }
4494 }
4495 else if (object_idx >= 1000 && object_idx < 1000 + n_plates) {
4496 // Move a wipe tower proxy.
4497 wipe_tower_origins[object_idx - 1000] = v->get_volume_offset();
4498 }
4499 }
4500
4501 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4502 m_selection.notify_instance_update(-1, 0);
4503
4504 // Fixes flying instances
4505 for (const std::pair<int, int>& i : done) {
4506 ModelObject* m = m_model->objects[i.first];
4507 const double shift_z = m->get_instance_min_z(i.second);
4508 //BBS: don't call translate if the z is zero
4509 if ((current_printer_technology() == ptSLA || shift_z > SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD) && (shift_z != 0.0f)) {
4510 const Vec3d shift(0.0, 0.0, -shift_z);
4511 m_selection.translate(i.first, i.second, shift);
4512 m->translate_instance(i.second, shift);
4513 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4514 m_selection.notify_instance_update(i.first, i.second);
4515 }
4516 wxGetApp().obj_list()->update_info_items(static_cast<size_t>(i.first));
4517 }
4518 //BBS: nofity object list to update
4519 wxGetApp().plater()->sidebar().obj_list()->update_plate_values_for_items();
4520
4521 if (object_moved)
4522 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_INSTANCE_MOVED));
4523
4524 // BBS: support wipe-tower for multi-plates
4525 for (int plate_id = 0; plate_id < wipe_tower_origins.size(); plate_id++) {
4526 Vec3d& wipe_tower_origin = wipe_tower_origins[plate_id];
4527 if (wipe_tower_origin == Vec3d::Zero())
4528 continue;
4529
4530 PartPlateList& ppl = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
4531 DynamicConfig& proj_cfg = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->project_config;
4532 Vec3d plate_origin = ppl.get_plate(plate_id)->get_origin();
4533 ConfigOptionFloat wipe_tower_x(wipe_tower_origin(0) - plate_origin(0));
4534 ConfigOptionFloat wipe_tower_y(wipe_tower_origin(1) - plate_origin(1));
4535
4536 ConfigOptionFloats* wipe_tower_x_opt = proj_cfg.option<ConfigOptionFloats>("wipe_tower_x", true);
4537 ConfigOptionFloats* wipe_tower_y_opt = proj_cfg.option<ConfigOptionFloats>("wipe_tower_y", true);
4538 wipe_tower_x_opt->set_at(&wipe_tower_x, plate_id, 0);
4539 wipe_tower_y_opt->set_at(&wipe_tower_y, plate_id, 0);
4540 }
4541
4542 reset_sequential_print_clearance();
4543
4544 m_dirty = true;
4545}

void reset_sequential_print_clearance()

◆ do_rotate()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::do_rotate ( const std::string &  snapshot_type)
4548{
4549 if (m_model == nullptr)
4550 return;
4551
4552 if (!snapshot_type.empty())
4553 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(snapshot_type);
4554
4555 // stores current min_z of instances
4556 std::map<std::pair<int, int>, double> min_zs;
4557 for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(m_model->objects.size()); ++i) {
4558 const ModelObject* obj = m_model->objects[i];
4559 for (int j = 0; j < static_cast<int>(obj->instances.size()); ++j) {
4560 if (snapshot_type.empty() && m_selection.get_object_idx() == i) {
4561 // This means we are flattening this object. In that case pretend
4562 // that it is not sinking (even if it is), so it is placed on bed
4563 // later on (whatever is sinking will be left sinking).
4564 min_zs[{ i, j }] = SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD;
4565 } else
4566 min_zs[{ i, j }] = obj->instance_bounding_box(j).min.z();
4567
4568 }
4569 }
4570
4571 std::set<std::pair<int, int>> done; // keeps track of modified instances
4572
4573 Selection::EMode selection_mode = m_selection.get_mode();
4574
4575 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4576 int object_idx = v->object_idx();
4577 if (object_idx < 0 || (int)m_model->objects.size() <= object_idx)
4578 continue;
4579
4580 int instance_idx = v->instance_idx();
4581 int volume_idx = v->volume_idx();
4582
4583 done.insert(std::pair<int, int>(object_idx, instance_idx));
4584
4585 // Rotate instances/volumes.
4586 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
4587 if (model_object != nullptr) {
4588 if (selection_mode == Selection::Instance) {
4589 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_rotation(v->get_instance_rotation());
4590 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_offset(v->get_instance_offset());
4591 }
4592 else if (selection_mode == Selection::Volume) {
4593 if (model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->get_rotation() != v->get_volume_rotation()) {
4594 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_rotation(v->get_volume_rotation());
4595 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_offset(v->get_volume_offset());
4596 // BBS: backup
4597 Slic3r::save_object_mesh(*model_object);
4598 }
4599 }
4600 model_object->invalidate_bounding_box();
4601 }
4602 }
4603
4604 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4605 m_selection.notify_instance_update(-1, -1);
4606
4607 // Fixes sinking/flying instances
4608 for (const std::pair<int, int>& i : done) {
4609 ModelObject* m = m_model->objects[i.first];
4610
4611 //BBS: don't call translate if the z is zero
4612 const double shift_z = m->get_instance_min_z(i.second);
4613 // leave sinking instances as sinking
4614 if ((min_zs.find({ i.first, i.second })->second >= SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD || shift_z > SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD)&&(shift_z != 0.0f)) {
4615 const Vec3d shift(0.0, 0.0, -shift_z);
4616 m_selection.translate(i.first, i.second, shift);
4617 m->translate_instance(i.second, shift);
4618 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4619 m_selection.notify_instance_update(i.first, i.second);
4620 }
4621
4622 wxGetApp().obj_list()->update_info_items(static_cast<size_t>(i.first));
4623 }
4624 //BBS: nofity object list to update
4625 wxGetApp().plater()->sidebar().obj_list()->update_plate_values_for_items();
4626
4627 if (!done.empty())
4628 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_INSTANCE_ROTATED));
4629
4630 m_dirty = true;
4631}

References Slic3r::ModelObject::get_instance_min_z(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::get_mode(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::get_object_idx(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::Instance, Slic3r::ModelObject::instance_bounding_box(), Slic3r::ModelObject::instances, Slic3r::ModelObject::invalidate_bounding_box(), m_dirty, m_model, m_selection, m_volumes, Slic3r::BoundingBoxBase< PointClass >::min, Slic3r::GUI::Selection::notify_instance_update(), Slic3r::Model::objects, post_event(), Slic3r::save_object_mesh(), Slic3r::SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD, Slic3r::GUI::Selection::translate(), Slic3r::ModelObject::translate_instance(), Slic3r::GUI::Selection::Volume, Slic3r::ModelObject::volumes, and Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::volumes.

◆ do_scale()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::do_scale ( const std::string &  snapshot_type)
4634{
4635 if (m_model == nullptr)
4636 return;
4637
4638 if (!snapshot_type.empty())
4639 wxGetApp().plater()->take_snapshot(snapshot_type);
4640
4641 // stores current min_z of instances
4642 std::map<std::pair<int, int>, double> min_zs;
4643 if (!snapshot_type.empty()) {
4644 for (int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>(m_model->objects.size()); ++i) {
4645 const ModelObject* obj = m_model->objects[i];
4646 for (int j = 0; j < static_cast<int>(obj->instances.size()); ++j) {
4647 min_zs[{ i, j }] = obj->instance_bounding_box(j).min.z();
4648 }
4649 }
4650 }
4651
4652 std::set<std::pair<int, int>> done; // keeps track of modified instances
4653
4654 Selection::EMode selection_mode = m_selection.get_mode();
4655
4656 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
4657 int object_idx = v->object_idx();
4658 if (object_idx < 0 || (int)m_model->objects.size() <= object_idx)
4659 continue;
4660
4661 int instance_idx = v->instance_idx();
4662 int volume_idx = v->volume_idx();
4663
4664 done.insert(std::pair<int, int>(object_idx, instance_idx));
4665
4666 // Rotate instances/volumes
4667 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
4668 if (model_object != nullptr) {
4669 if (selection_mode == Selection::Instance) {
4670 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_scaling_factor(v->get_instance_scaling_factor());
4671 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_offset(v->get_instance_offset());
4672 }
4673 else if (selection_mode == Selection::Volume) {
4674 if (model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->get_scaling_factor() != v->get_volume_scaling_factor()) {
4675 model_object->instances[instance_idx]->set_offset(v->get_instance_offset());
4676 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_scaling_factor(v->get_volume_scaling_factor());
4677 model_object->volumes[volume_idx]->set_offset(v->get_volume_offset());
4678 // BBS: backup
4679 Slic3r::save_object_mesh(*model_object);
4680 }
4681 }
4682 model_object->invalidate_bounding_box();
4683 }
4684 }
4685
4686 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4687 m_selection.notify_instance_update(-1, -1);
4688
4689 // Fixes sinking/flying instances
4690 for (const std::pair<int, int>& i : done) {
4691 ModelObject* m = m_model->objects[i.first];
4692
4693 //BBS: don't call translate if the z is zero
4694 double shift_z = m->get_instance_min_z(i.second);
4695 // leave sinking instances as sinking
4696 if ((min_zs.empty() || min_zs.find({ i.first, i.second })->second >= SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD || shift_z > SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD) && (shift_z != 0.0f)) {
4697 Vec3d shift(0.0, 0.0, -shift_z);
4698 m_selection.translate(i.first, i.second, shift);
4699 m->translate_instance(i.second, shift);
4700 //BBS: notify instance updates to part plater list
4701 m_selection.notify_instance_update(i.first, i.second);
4702 }
4703 wxGetApp().obj_list()->update_info_items(static_cast<size_t>(i.first));
4704 }
4705 //BBS: nofity object list to update
4706 wxGetApp().plater()->sidebar().obj_list()->update_plate_values_for_items();
4707 //BBS: notify object info update
4708 wxGetApp().plater()->show_object_info();
4709
4710 if (!done.empty())
4711 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_INSTANCE_SCALED));
4712
4713 m_dirty = true;
4714}

◆ ensure_on_bed()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::ensure_on_bed ( unsigned int  object_idx,
bool  allow_negative_z 
)
2124{
2125 //BBS if asseble view canvas
2126 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2127 return;
2128 }
2129
2130 if (allow_negative_z)
2131 return;
2132
2133 typedef std::map<std::pair<int, int>, double> InstancesToZMap;
2134 InstancesToZMap instances_min_z;
2135
2136 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
2137 if (volume->object_idx() == (int)object_idx && !volume->is_modifier) {
2138 double min_z = volume->transformed_convex_hull_bounding_box().min.z();
2139 std::pair<int, int> instance = std::make_pair(volume->object_idx(), volume->instance_idx());
2140 InstancesToZMap::iterator it = instances_min_z.find(instance);
2141 if (it == instances_min_z.end())
2142 it = instances_min_z.insert(InstancesToZMap::value_type(instance, DBL_MAX)).first;
2143
2144 it->second = std::min(it->second, min_z);
2145 }
2146 }
2147
2148 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
2149 std::pair<int, int> instance = std::make_pair(volume->object_idx(), volume->instance_idx());
2150 InstancesToZMap::iterator it = instances_min_z.find(instance);
2151 if (it != instances_min_z.end())
2152 volume->set_instance_offset(Z, volume->get_instance_offset(Z) - it->second);
2153 }
2154}

◆ estimate_wipe_tower_points()

Points Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::estimate_wipe_tower_points ( int  plate_index,
bool  global = true 
) const
1748{
1749 PartPlateList & ppl = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
1750 DynamicPrintConfig &proj_cfg = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->project_config;
1751 auto & print = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_current_fff_print();
1752 int plate_count = ppl.get_plate_count();
1753 float x = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloats *>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_x"))->get_at(plate_index);
1754 float y = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloats *>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_y"))->get_at(plate_index);
1755 if (plate_index >= plate_count) { plate_index = 0; }
1756 float w = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat *>(m_config->option("prime_tower_width"))->value;
1757 float v = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat *>(m_config->option("prime_volume"))->value;
1758 Vec3d wipe_tower_size = ppl.get_plate(plate_index)->estimate_wipe_tower_size(w, v);
1759
1760 if (wipe_tower_size(1) == 0) {
1761 // when depth is unavailable (no items on this plate), we have to estimate the depth using the extruder number of all plates
1762 std::set<int> extruder_ids;
1763 if (global) {
1764 auto objs = wxGetApp().obj_list()->objects();
1765 for (ModelObject *obj : *objs) {
1766 for (ModelVolume *volume : obj->volumes) {
1767 std::vector<int> es = volume->get_extruders();
1768 extruder_ids.insert(es.begin(), es.end());
1769 }
1770 }
1771 } else {
1772 PartPlate* pl = ppl.get_plate(plate_index);
1773 std::vector<int> es = pl->get_extruders();
1774 extruder_ids.insert(es.begin(), es.end());
1775 }
1776 int extruder_size = extruder_ids.size();
1777 wipe_tower_size(1) = extruder_size * print.wipe_tower_data(extruder_size).depth + 2 * print.wipe_tower_data().brim_width;
1778 }
1779 Vec3d plate_origin = ppl.get_plate(plate_index)->get_origin();
1780 Point wt_min_corner{scale_(x), scale_(y)};
1781 Point wt_max_corner(scale_(x + wipe_tower_size(0)), scale_(y + wipe_tower_size(1)));
1782 return {wt_min_corner, {wt_max_corner.x(), wt_min_corner.y()}, wt_max_corner, {wt_min_corner.x(), wt_max_corner.y()}};
1783}

◆ get_arrange_settings() [3/3]

template<class Self >
static auto & Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_arrange_settings ( Self *  self)
inlinestaticprivate
606 {
607 PrinterTechnology ptech = self->current_printer_technology();
608
609 auto *ptr = &self->m_arrange_settings_fff;
610
611 if (ptech == ptSLA) {
612 ptr = &self->m_arrange_settings_sla;
613 } else if (ptech == ptFFF) {
614 auto co_opt = self->m_config->template option<ConfigOptionEnum<PrintSequence>>("print_sequence");
615 if (co_opt && (co_opt->value == PrintSequence::ByObject))
616 ptr = &self->m_arrange_settings_fff_seq_print;
617 else
618 ptr = &self->m_arrange_settings_fff;
619 }
620
621 return *ptr;
622 }

◆ get_canvas_size()

Size Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_canvas_size ( ) const
4412{
4413 int w = 0;
4414 int h = 0;
4415
4416 if (m_canvas != nullptr)
4417 m_canvas->GetSize(&w, &h);
4418
4419#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
4420 const float factor = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4421 w *= factor;
4422 h *= factor;
4423#else

4425#endif
4426

◆ get_empty_cells()

std::vector< Vec2f > Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_empty_cells ( const Vec2f  start_point,
const Vec2f  step = {10, 10} 
)
4917{
4918 PartPlate* plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
4919 BoundingBoxf3 build_volume = plate->get_build_volume();
4920 Vec2d vmin(build_volume.min.x(), build_volume.min.y()), vmax(build_volume.max.x(), build_volume.max.y());
4921 BoundingBoxf bbox(vmin, vmax);
4922 std::vector<Vec2f> cells;
4923 for (float x = bbox.min.x(); x < bbox.max.x(); x += step(0))
4924 for (float y = bbox.min.y(); y < bbox.max.y(); y += step(1))
4925 {
4926 cells.emplace_back(x, y);
4927 }
4928 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_model->objects.size(); ++i) {
4929 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[i];
4930 auto id = model_object->id().id;
4931 ModelInstance* model_instance0 = model_object->instances.front();
4932 Polygon hull_2d = model_object->convex_hull_2d(Geometry::assemble_transform({ 0.0, 0.0, model_instance0->get_offset().z() }, model_instance0->get_rotation(),
4933 model_instance0->get_scaling_factor(), model_instance0->get_mirror()));
4934 if (hull_2d.empty())
4935 continue;
4936
4937 const auto& instances = model_object->instances;
4938 double rotation_z0 = instances.front()->get_rotation().z();
4939 for (const auto& instance : instances) {
4940 Geometry::Transformation transformation;
4941 const Vec3d& offset = instance->get_offset();
4942 transformation.set_offset({ scale_(offset.x()), scale_(offset.y()), 0.0 });
4943 transformation.set_rotation(Z, instance->get_rotation().z() - rotation_z0);
4944 const Transform3d& trafo = transformation.get_matrix();
4945 Polygon inst_hull_2d = hull_2d.transform(trafo);
4946
4947 for (auto it = cells.begin(); it != cells.end(); )
4948 {
4949 if (inst_hull_2d.contains(Point(scale_(it->x()), scale_(it->y()))))
4950 it = cells.erase(it);
4951 else
4952 it++;
4953 }
4954 }
4955 }
4956
4957 Vec2f start = start_point;
4958 if (start_point(0) < 0 && start_point(1) < 0) {
4959 start(0) = bbox.center()(0);
4960 start(1) = bbox.center()(1);
4961 }
4962 std::sort(cells.begin(), cells.end(), [start](const Vec2f& cell1, const Vec2f& cell2) {return (cell1 - start).norm() < (cell2 - start).norm(); });
4963 return cells;
4964}
Slic3r::GUI::PartPlate::get_build_volume
BoundingBoxf3 get_build_volume()
Definition PartPlate.hpp:354
Clipper2Lib::EndType::Polygon
@ Polygon
Slic3r::Geometry::assemble_transform
void assemble_transform(Transform3d &transform, const Vec3d &translation, const Vec3d &rotation, const Vec3d &scale, const Vec3d &mirror)
Definition Geometry.cpp:308
Slic3r::offset

4432 if (m_canvas == nullptr)
4433 return Vec2d::Zero();

4437#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
4438 m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4439#else

4441#endif

4443}

Vec2f Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_nearest_empty_cell ( const Vec2f  start_point,

)
4967{
4968 std::vector<Vec2f> empty_cells = get_empty_cells(start_point, step);

4970 return empty_cells.front();
4971 else {
4972 double offset = get_size_proportional_to_max_bed_size(0.05);

◆ get_wipe_tower_info()

GLCanvas3D::WipeTowerInfo Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::get_wipe_tower_info ( int  plate_idx) const
4872{
4873 WipeTowerInfo wti;
4874
4875 for (const GLVolume* vol : m_volumes.volumes) {
4876 if (vol->is_wipe_tower && vol->object_idx() - 1000 == plate_idx) {
4877 DynamicPrintConfig& proj_cfg = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->project_config;
4878 wti.m_pos = Vec2d(proj_cfg.opt<ConfigOptionFloats>("wipe_tower_x")->get_at(plate_idx),
4879 proj_cfg.opt<ConfigOptionFloats>("wipe_tower_y")->get_at(plate_idx));
4880 // BBS: don't support rotation
4881 //wti.m_rotation = (M_PI/180.) * proj_cfg->opt_float("wipe_tower_rotation_angle");
4882
4883 auto& preset = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->prints.get_edited_preset();
4884 float wt_brim_width = preset.config.opt_float("prime_tower_brim_width");
4885
4886 const BoundingBoxf3& bb = vol->bounding_box();
4887 wti.m_bb = BoundingBoxf{to_2d(bb.min), to_2d(bb.max)};
4888 wti.m_bb.offset(wt_brim_width);
4889
4890 float brim_width = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->prints.get_edited_preset().config.opt_float("prime_tower_brim_width");
4891 wti.m_bb.offset((brim_width));
4892
4893 // BBS: add partplate logic
4894 wti.m_plate_idx = plate_idx;
4895 break;
4896 }
4897 }
4898
4899 return wti;
4900}
Slic3r::to_2d

◆ init()

bool Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::init ( )
1175{
1176 if (m_initialized)
1177 return true;
1178
1179 if (m_canvas == nullptr || m_context == nullptr)
1180 return false;
1181
1182 // init dark mode status
1183 on_change_color_mode(wxGetApp().app_config->get("dark_color_mode") == "1", false);
1184
1185 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) <<__FUNCTION__<< " enter";
1186 glsafe(::glClearColor(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
1187 glsafe(::glClearDepth(1.0f));
1188
1189 glsafe(::glDepthFunc(GL_LESS));
1190
1191 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));
1192 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
1193 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_BLEND));
1194 glsafe(::glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA));
1195
1196 // Set antialiasing / multisampling
1197 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH));
1198 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH));
1199
1200 // ambient lighting
1201 GLfloat ambient[4] = { 0.3f, 0.3f, 0.3f, 1.0f };
1202 glsafe(::glLightModelfv(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_AMBIENT, ambient));
1203
1204 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_LIGHT0));
1205 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_LIGHT1));
1206
1207 // light from camera
1208 GLfloat specular_cam[4] = { 0.3f, 0.3f, 0.3f, 1.0f };
1209 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPECULAR, specular_cam));
1210 GLfloat diffuse_cam[4] = { 0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f, 1.0f };
1211 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_DIFFUSE, diffuse_cam));
1212
1213 // light from above
1214 GLfloat specular_top[4] = { 0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f, 1.0f };
1215 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, specular_top));
1216 GLfloat diffuse_top[4] = { 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f };
1217 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, diffuse_top));
1218
1219 // Enables Smooth Color Shading; try GL_FLAT for (lack of) fun.
1220 glsafe(::glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH));
1221
1222 // A handy trick -- have surface material mirror the color.
1223 glsafe(::glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE));
1224 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL));
1225
1226 if (m_multisample_allowed)
1227 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
1228
1229 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << __FUNCTION__ << ": before m_layers_editing init";
1230 if (m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
1231 m_layers_editing.init();
1232
1233 // on linux the gl context is not valid until the canvas is not shown on screen
1234 // we defer the geometry finalization of volumes until the first call to render()
1235 m_volumes.finalize_geometry(true);
1236
1237 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) <<__FUNCTION__<< ": before gizmo init";
1238 if (m_gizmos.is_enabled() && !m_gizmos.init())
1239 std::cout << "Unable to initialize gizmos: please, check that all the required textures are available" << std::endl;
1240
1241 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) <<__FUNCTION__<< ": before _init_toolbars";
1242 if (!_init_toolbars())
1243 return false;
1244
1245 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) <<__FUNCTION__<< ": finish _init_toolbars";
1246 if (m_selection.is_enabled() && !m_selection.init())
1247 return false;
1248
1249 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) <<__FUNCTION__<< ": finish m_selection";
1250
1251#if ENABLE_IMGUI_STYLE_EDITOR
1252 //BBS load render color for style editor
1253 GLVolume::load_render_colors();
1254 PartPlate::load_render_colors();
1255 GLGizmoBase::load_render_colors();
1256 GLCanvas3D::load_render_colors();
1257 Bed3D::load_render_colors();
1258#endif
1259 //if (!wxGetApp().is_gl_version_greater_or_equal_to(3, 0))
1260 // wxGetApp().plater()->enable_wireframe(false);
1261 m_initialized = true;
1262
1263 return true;
1264}
Slic3r::GLVolumeCollection::finalize_geometry
void finalize_geometry(bool opengl_initialized)
Definition 3DScene.hpp:675

◆ load_gcode_preview()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::load_gcode_preview ( const GCodeProcessorResult &  gcode_result,
const std::vector< std::string > &  str_tool_colors,
bool  only_gcode 
)
2760{
2761 PartPlateList& partplate_list = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
2762 PartPlate* plate = partplate_list.get_curr_plate();
2763 const std::vector<BoundingBoxf3>& exclude_bounding_box = plate->get_exclude_areas();
2764
2765 //BBS: init is called in GLCanvas3D.render()
2766 //when load gcode directly, it is too late
2767 m_gcode_viewer.init(wxGetApp().get_mode(), wxGetApp().preset_bundle);
2768 m_gcode_viewer.load(gcode_result, *this->fff_print(), wxGetApp().plater()->build_volume(), exclude_bounding_box,
2769 m_initialized, wxGetApp().get_mode(), only_gcode);
2770
2771 if (wxGetApp().is_editor()) {

2773 //m_gcode_viewer.update_shells_color_by_extruder(m_config);
2774 _set_warning_notification_if_needed(EWarning::ToolHeightOutside);

2776 _set_warning_notification_if_needed(EWarning::GCodeConflict);
2777 }

2781 request_extra_frame();
2782}

◆ on_char()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_char ( wxKeyEvent &  evt)
2956{
2957 if (!m_initialized)
2958 return;
2959
2960 // see include/wx/defs.h enum wxKeyCode
2961 int keyCode = evt.GetKeyCode();
2962 int ctrlMask = wxMOD_CONTROL;
2963 int shiftMask = wxMOD_SHIFT;
2964
2965 auto imgui = wxGetApp().imgui();
2966 if (imgui->update_key_data(evt)) {
2967 render();
2968 return;
2969 }
2970
2971 bool is_in_painting_mode = false;
2972 GLGizmoPainterBase *current_gizmo_painter = dynamic_cast<GLGizmoPainterBase *>(get_gizmos_manager().get_current());
2973 if (current_gizmo_painter != nullptr) {
2974 is_in_painting_mode = true;
2975 }
2976
2977 //BBS: add orient deactivate logic
2978 if (keyCode == WXK_ESCAPE
2979 && (_deactivate_arrange_menu() || _deactivate_orient_menu()))
2980 return;
2981
2982 if (m_gizmos.on_char(evt))
2983 return;
2984
2985 if ((evt.GetModifiers() & ctrlMask) != 0) {
2986 // CTRL is pressed
2987 switch (keyCode) {
2988#ifdef __APPLE__
2989 case 'a':
2990 case 'A':
2991#else /* __APPLE__ */
2992 case WXK_CONTROL_A:
2993#endif /* __APPLE__ */
2994 if (!is_in_painting_mode && !m_layers_editing.is_enabled())
2995 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_SELECT_ALL));
2996 break;
2997#ifdef __APPLE__
2998 case 'c':
2999 case 'C':
3000#else /* __APPLE__ */
3001 case WXK_CONTROL_C:
3002#endif /* __APPLE__ */
3003 if (!is_in_painting_mode)
3004 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLTOOLBAR_COPY));
3005 break;
3006#ifdef __APPLE__
3007 case 'm':
3008 case 'M':
3009#else /* __APPLE__ */
3010 case WXK_CONTROL_M:
3011#endif /* __APPLE__ */
3012 {
3013#ifdef _WIN32
3014 if (wxGetApp().app_config->get("use_legacy_3DConnexion") == "true") {
3015#endif //_WIN32
3016#ifdef __APPLE__
3017 // On OSX use Cmd+Shift+M to "Show/Hide 3Dconnexion devices settings dialog"
3018 if ((evt.GetModifiers() & shiftMask) != 0) {
3019#endif // __APPLE__
3020 Mouse3DController& controller = wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller();
3021 controller.show_settings_dialog(!controller.is_settings_dialog_shown());
3022 m_dirty = true;
3023#ifdef __APPLE__
3024 }
3025 else
3026 // and Cmd+M to minimize application
3027 wxGetApp().mainframe->Iconize();
3028#endif // __APPLE__
3029#ifdef _WIN32
3030 }
3031#endif //_WIN32
3032 break;
3033 }
3034#ifdef __APPLE__
3035 case 'v':
3036 case 'V':
3037#else /* __APPLE__ */
3038 case WXK_CONTROL_V:
3039#endif /* __APPLE__ */
3040 if (!is_in_painting_mode)
3041 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLTOOLBAR_PASTE));
3042 break;
3043
3044#ifdef __APPLE__
3045 case 'x':
3046 case 'X':
3047#else /* __APPLE__ */
3048 case WXK_CONTROL_X:
3049#endif /* __APPLE__ */

3051 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLTOOLBAR_CUT));
3052 break;
3053
3054#ifdef __APPLE__
3055 case 'f':
3056 case 'F':
3057#else /* __APPLE__ */

3059#endif /* __APPLE__ */
3060 break;
3061
3062
3063#ifdef __APPLE__
3064 case 'y':
3065 case 'Y':
3066#else /* __APPLE__ */
3067 case WXK_CONTROL_Y:
3068#endif /* __APPLE__ */
3069 if (m_canvas_type == CanvasView3D || m_canvas_type == CanvasAssembleView) {
3070 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_REDO));
3071 }
3072 break;
3073#ifdef __APPLE__

3102 case '6': { select_view("right"); break; }

◆ on_gesture()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_gesture ( wxGestureEvent &  evt)
3779{
3780 if (!m_initialized || !_set_current())
3781 return;
3782
3783 auto & camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
3784 if (evt.GetEventType() == wxEVT_GESTURE_PAN) {
3785 auto p = evt.GetPosition();
3786 auto d = static_cast<wxPanGestureEvent&>(evt).GetDelta();
3787 float z = 0;
3788 const Vec3d &p2 = _mouse_to_3d({p.x, p.y}, &z);
3789 const Vec3d &p1 = _mouse_to_3d({p.x - d.x, p.y - d.y}, &z);
3790 camera.set_target(camera.get_target() + p1 - p2);
3791 } else if (evt.GetEventType() == wxEVT_GESTURE_ZOOM) {
3792 static float zoom_start = 1;
3793 if (evt.IsGestureStart())
3794 zoom_start = camera.get_zoom();
3795 camera.set_zoom(zoom_start * static_cast<wxZoomGestureEvent&>(evt).GetZoomFactor());
3796 } else if (evt.GetEventType() == wxEVT_GESTURE_ROTATE) {
3797 PartPlate* plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
3798 bool rotate_limit = current_printer_technology() != ptSLA;
3799 static double last_rotate = 0;
3800 if (evt.IsGestureStart())
3801 last_rotate = 0;
3802 auto rotate = static_cast<wxRotateGestureEvent&>(evt).GetRotationAngle() - last_rotate;
3803 last_rotate += rotate;
3804 if (plate)
3805 camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(-rotate, 0, rotate_limit, plate->get_bounding_box().center());
3806 else
3807 camera.rotate_on_sphere(-rotate, 0, rotate_limit);
3808 }
3809 m_dirty = true;
3810}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_idle ( wxIdleEvent &  evt)
2909{
2910 if (!m_initialized)
2911 return;
2912
2913 m_dirty |= m_main_toolbar.update_items_state();
2914 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
2915 m_dirty |= m_assemble_view_toolbar.update_items_state();
2916 // BBS
2917 //m_dirty |= wxGetApp().plater()->get_view_toolbar().update_items_state();

2921 m_dirty |= mouse3d_controller_applied;
2922 m_dirty |= wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager()->update_notifications(*this);
2923 auto gizmo = wxGetApp().plater()->get_view3D_canvas3D()->get_gizmos_manager().get_current();
2924 if (gizmo != nullptr) m_dirty |= gizmo->update_items_state();
2925#if ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2926 // ImGuiWrapper::m_requires_extra_frame may have been set by a render made outside of the OnIdle mechanism
2927 bool imgui_requires_extra_frame = wxGetApp().imgui()->requires_extra_frame();
2928 m_dirty |= imgui_requires_extra_frame;
2929#endif // ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2930
2931 if (!m_dirty)
2932 return;
2933
2934#if ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2935 // this needs to be done here.
2936 // during the render launched by the refresh the value may be set again
2937 wxGetApp().imgui()->reset_requires_extra_frame();
2938#endif // ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2939
2940 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
2941
2942#if ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2943 if (m_extra_frame_requested || mouse3d_controller_applied || imgui_requires_extra_frame || wxGetApp().imgui()->requires_extra_frame()) {
2944#else
2945 if (m_extra_frame_requested || mouse3d_controller_applied) {
2946 m_dirty = true;
2947#endif // ENABLE_ENHANCED_IMGUI_SLIDER_FLOAT
2948 m_extra_frame_requested = false;
2949 evt.RequestMore();
2950 }
2951 else
2952 m_dirty = false;
2953}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_key ( wxKeyEvent &  evt)
3326{
3327 static GLCanvas3D const * thiz = nullptr;
3328 static TranslationProcessor translationProcessor(nullptr, nullptr);
3329 if (thiz != this) {
3330 thiz = this;
3331 translationProcessor = TranslationProcessor(
3332 [this]() {
3333 do_move(L("Tool Move"));
3334 m_gizmos.update_data();
3335
3336 // BBS
3337 //wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
3338 // Let the plater know that the dragging finished, so a delayed refresh
3339 // of the scene with the background processing data should be performed.
3340 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_MOUSE_DRAGGING_FINISHED));
3341 // updates camera target constraints
3342 refresh_camera_scene_box();
3343 m_dirty = true;
3344 },
3345 [this](const Vec3d& direction, bool slow, bool camera_space) {
3346 m_selection.start_dragging();
3347 double multiplier = slow ? 1.0 : 10.0;
3348
3349 Vec3d displacement;
3350 if (camera_space) {
3351 Eigen::Matrix<double, 3, 3, Eigen::DontAlign> inv_view_3x3 = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_view_matrix().inverse().matrix().block(0, 0, 3, 3);
3352 displacement = multiplier * (inv_view_3x3 * direction);
3353 displacement.z() = 0.0;
3354 }
3355 else
3356 displacement = multiplier * direction;
3357
3358 m_selection.translate(displacement);
3359 m_selection.stop_dragging();
3360 m_dirty = true;
3361 }
3362 );}
3363
3364 const int keyCode = evt.GetKeyCode();
3365
3366 auto imgui = wxGetApp().imgui();
3367 if (imgui->update_key_data(evt)) {
3368 render();
3369 }
3370 else
3371 {
3372 if (!m_gizmos.on_key(evt)) {
3373 if (evt.GetEventType() == wxEVT_KEY_UP) {
3374 if (evt.ShiftDown() && evt.ControlDown() && keyCode == WXK_SPACE) {
3375#if !BBL_RELEASE_TO_PUBLIC
3376 wxGetApp().plater()->toggle_render_statistic_dialog();
3377 m_dirty = true;
3378#endif
3379 }
3380 else if (evt.ShiftDown() && evt.ControlDown() && keyCode == WXK_RETURN) {
3381 wxGetApp().plater()->toggle_show_wireframe();
3382 m_dirty = true;
3383 }
3384 else if (m_tab_down && keyCode == WXK_TAB && !evt.HasAnyModifiers()) {
3385 // Enable switching between 3D and Preview with Tab
3386 // m_canvas->HandleAsNavigationKey(evt); // XXX: Doesn't work in some cases / on Linux
3387 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_TAB));
3388 }
3389 else if (keyCode == WXK_TAB && evt.ShiftDown() && !evt.ControlDown() && ! wxGetApp().is_gcode_viewer()) {
3390 // Collapse side-panel with Shift+Tab
3391 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_COLLAPSE_SIDEBAR));
3392 }
3393 else if (keyCode == WXK_SHIFT) {
3394 translationProcessor.process(evt);
3395
3396 if (m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging()) {
3397 _update_selection_from_hover();
3398 m_rectangle_selection.stop_dragging();
3399 m_mouse.ignore_left_up = true;
3400 m_dirty = true;
3401 }
3402// set_cursor(Standard);
3403 }
3404 else if (keyCode == WXK_ALT) {
3405 if (m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging()) {
3406 _update_selection_from_hover();
3407 m_rectangle_selection.stop_dragging();
3408 m_mouse.ignore_left_up = true;
3409 m_dirty = true;
3410 }
3411// set_cursor(Standard);
3412 }
3413 else if (keyCode == WXK_CONTROL)
3414 m_dirty = true;
3415 else if (m_gizmos.is_enabled() && !m_selection.is_empty() && m_canvas_type != CanvasAssembleView) {
3416 translationProcessor.process(evt);
3417
3418 switch (keyCode)
3419 {
3420 case WXK_NUMPAD_PAGEUP: case WXK_PAGEUP:
3421 case WXK_NUMPAD_PAGEDOWN: case WXK_PAGEDOWN:
3422 {
3423 do_rotate(L("Tool Rotate"));
3424 m_gizmos.update_data();
3425
3426 // BBS
3427 //wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();

3429 // of the scene with the background processing data should be performed.

3431 // updates camera target constraints
3432 refresh_camera_scene_box();
3433 m_dirty = true;
3434
3435 break;
3436 }
3437 default: { break; }
3438 }
3439 }
3440
3441 // BBS: add select view logic
3442 if (evt.ControlDown()) {
3443 switch (keyCode) {
3444 case '0':
3445 case WXK_NUMPAD0: //0 on numpad
3446 { select_view("plate");
3447 zoom_to_bed();
3448 break;
3449 }
3450 case '1':
3451 case WXK_NUMPAD1: //1 on numpad
3452 { select_view("top"); break; }
3453 case '2':
3454 case WXK_NUMPAD2: //2 on numpad
3455 { select_view("bottom"); break; }
3456 case '3':
3457 case WXK_NUMPAD3: //3 on numpad
3458 { select_view("front"); break; }
3459 case '4':
3460 case WXK_NUMPAD4: //4 on numpad
3461 { select_view("rear"); break; }
3462 case '5':
3463 case WXK_NUMPAD5: //5 on numpad
3464 { select_view("left"); break; }
3465 case '6':
3466 case WXK_NUMPAD6: //6 on numpad
3467 { select_view("right"); break; }
3468 case '7':
3469 case WXK_NUMPAD7: //7 on numpad
3470 { select_plate(); break; }
3471 default: break;
3472 }
3473 }
3474 }
3475 else if (evt.GetEventType() == wxEVT_KEY_DOWN) {
3476 m_tab_down = keyCode == WXK_TAB && !evt.HasAnyModifiers();
3477 if (keyCode == WXK_SHIFT) {
3478 translationProcessor.process(evt);
3479
3480 if (m_picking_enabled && (m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::SlaSupports))
3481 {
3482 m_mouse.ignore_left_up = false;
3483// set_cursor(Cross);
3484 }
3485 }
3486 else if (keyCode == WXK_ALT) {
3487 if (m_picking_enabled && (m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::SlaSupports))
3488 {
3489 m_mouse.ignore_left_up = false;
3490// set_cursor(Cross);
3491 }
3492 }
3493 else if (keyCode == WXK_CONTROL)
3494 m_dirty = true;
3495 else if (keyCode == WXK_TAB && evt.ShiftDown() && !evt.ControlDown() && !wxGetApp().is_gcode_viewer()) {
3496 // Collapse side-panel with Shift+Tab
3497 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_COLLAPSE_SIDEBAR));
3498 } else if (m_gizmos.is_enabled() && !m_selection.is_empty() && m_canvas_type != CanvasAssembleView) {
3499 auto _do_rotate = [this](double angle_z_rad) {
3500 m_selection.start_dragging();
3501 m_selection.rotate(Vec3d(0.0, 0.0, angle_z_rad), TransformationType(TransformationType::World_Relative_Joint));
3502 m_selection.stop_dragging();
3503 m_dirty = true;
3504// wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
3505 };
3506
3507 translationProcessor.process(evt);
3508
3509 switch (keyCode)
3510 {
3511 case WXK_NUMPAD_PAGEUP: case WXK_PAGEUP: { _do_rotate(0.25 * M_PI); break; }
3512 case WXK_NUMPAD_PAGEDOWN: case WXK_PAGEDOWN: { _do_rotate(-0.25 * M_PI); break; }
3513 default: { break; }
3514 }
3515 } else if (!m_gizmos.is_enabled()) {
3516 // DoubleSlider navigation in Preview
3517 if (m_canvas_type == CanvasPreview) {
3518 IMSlider *m_layers_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_layers_slider();
3519 IMSlider *m_moves_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_moves_slider();
3520 if (evt.CmdDown() || evt.ShiftDown()) {
3521 if (evt.GetKeyCode() == 'G') {
3522 m_layers_slider->show_go_to_layer(true);
3523 }
3524 IMSlider *m_layers_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_layers_slider();
3525 IMSlider *m_moves_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_moves_slider();
3526 if (keyCode == WXK_UP || keyCode == WXK_DOWN) {
3527 int new_pos;
3528 if (m_layers_slider->GetSelection() == ssHigher) {
3529 new_pos = keyCode == WXK_UP ? m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue() + 5 : m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue() - 5;
3530 m_layers_slider->SetHigherValue(new_pos);
3531 }
3532 else if (m_layers_slider->GetSelection() == ssLower) {
3533 new_pos = keyCode == WXK_UP ? m_layers_slider->GetLowerValue() + 5 : m_layers_slider->GetLowerValue() - 5;
3534 m_layers_slider->SetLowerValue(new_pos);
3535 }
3536 if (m_layers_slider->is_one_layer()) m_layers_slider->SetLowerValue(m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue());
3537 // BBS set as dirty, update in render_gcode()
3538 m_layers_slider->set_as_dirty();
3539 } else if (keyCode == WXK_LEFT || keyCode == WXK_RIGHT) {
3540 const int new_pos = keyCode == WXK_RIGHT ? m_moves_slider->GetHigherValue() + 5 : m_moves_slider->GetHigherValue() - 5;
3541 m_moves_slider->SetHigherValue(new_pos);
3542 // BBS set as dirty, update in render_gcode()
3543 m_moves_slider->set_as_dirty();
3544 }
3545 }
3546 else if (keyCode == WXK_UP || keyCode == WXK_DOWN) {
3547 int new_pos;
3548 if (m_layers_slider->GetSelection() == ssHigher) {
3549 new_pos = keyCode == WXK_UP ? m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue() + 1 : m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue() - 1;
3550 m_layers_slider->SetHigherValue(new_pos);
3551 }
3552 else if (m_layers_slider->GetSelection() == ssLower) {
3553 new_pos = keyCode == WXK_UP ? m_layers_slider->GetLowerValue() + 1 : m_layers_slider->GetLowerValue() - 1;
3554 m_layers_slider->SetLowerValue(new_pos);
3555 }
3556 if (m_layers_slider->is_one_layer()) m_layers_slider->SetLowerValue(m_layers_slider->GetHigherValue());
3557 // BBS set as dirty, update in render_gcode()
3558 m_layers_slider->set_as_dirty();
3559 } else if (keyCode == WXK_LEFT || keyCode == WXK_RIGHT) {
3560 const int new_pos = keyCode == WXK_RIGHT ? m_moves_slider->GetHigherValue() + 1 : m_moves_slider->GetHigherValue() - 1;

3563 m_moves_slider->set_as_dirty();
3564 }
3565 m_dirty = true;
3566 }
3567 }
3568 }
3569 }
3570 else return;
3571 }
3572

3577 && keyCode != WXK_DOWN) {

◆ on_mouse()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_mouse ( wxMouseEvent &  evt)
3813{
3814 if (!m_initialized || !_set_current())
3815 return;
3816
3817 // BBS: single snapshot
3818 Plater::SingleSnapshot single(wxGetApp().plater());
3819
3820#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
