3823 evt.SetY(evt.GetY() * scale);
3824#endif
3825
3826 Point pos(evt.GetX(), evt.GetY());
3827
3828 ImGuiWrapper* imgui = wxGetApp().imgui();
3829 if (m_tooltip.is_in_imgui() && evt.LeftUp())
3830 // ignore left up events coming from imgui windows and not processed by them
3831 m_mouse.ignore_left_up = true;
3832 m_tooltip.set_in_imgui(false);
3833 if (imgui->update_mouse_data(evt)) {
3834 if (evt.LeftDown() && m_canvas != nullptr)
3835 m_canvas->SetFocus();
3836 m_mouse.position = evt.Leaving() ? Vec2d(-1.0, -1.0) : pos.cast<double>();
3837 m_tooltip.set_in_imgui(true);
3838 render();
3839#ifdef SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS
3840 printf((format_mouse_event_debug_message(evt) + " - Consumed by ImGUI\n").c_str());
3841#endif /* SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS */
3842 m_dirty = true;
3843 // do not return if dragging or tooltip not empty to allow for tooltip update
3844 // also, do not return if the mouse is moving and also is inside MM gizmo to allow update seed fill selection
3845 if (!m_mouse.dragging && m_tooltip.is_empty() && (m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation || !evt.Moving()))
3846 return;
3847 }
3848
3849#ifdef __WXMSW__
3850 bool on_enter_workaround = false;
3851 if (! evt.Entering() && ! evt.Leaving() && m_mouse.position.x() == -1.0) {
3852 // Workaround for SPE-832: There seems to be a mouse event sent to the window before evt.Entering()
3853 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
3854 render();
3855#ifdef SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS
3856 printf((format_mouse_event_debug_message(evt) + " - OnEnter workaround\n").c_str());
3857#endif /* SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS */
3858 on_enter_workaround = true;
3859 } else
3860#endif /* __WXMSW__ */
3861 {
3862#ifdef SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS
3863 printf((format_mouse_event_debug_message(evt) + " - other\n").c_str());
3864#endif /* SLIC3R_DEBUG_MOUSE_EVENTS */
3865 }
3866
3867 if (m_main_toolbar.on_mouse(evt, *this)) {
3868 if (m_main_toolbar.is_any_item_pressed())
3869 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
3870 if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp())
3871 mouse_up_cleanup();
3872 m_mouse.set_start_position_3D_as_invalid();
3873 return;
3874 }
3875
3876 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
3877 if (m_assemble_view_toolbar.on_mouse(evt, *this)) {
3878 if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp())
3879 mouse_up_cleanup();
3880 m_mouse.set_start_position_3D_as_invalid();
3881 return;
3882 }
3883
3884 if (wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar().on_mouse(evt, *this)) {
3885 if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp())
3886 mouse_up_cleanup();
3887 m_mouse.set_start_position_3D_as_invalid();
3888 return;
3889 }
3890
3891 // BBS
3892#if 0
3893 if (wxGetApp().plater()->get_view_toolbar().on_mouse(evt, *this)) {
3894 if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp())
3895 mouse_up_cleanup();
3896 m_mouse.set_start_position_3D_as_invalid();
3897 return;
3898 }
3899#endif
3900
3901 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
3902 volume->force_sinking_contours = false;
3903 }
3904
3905 auto show_sinking_contours = [this]() {
3906 const Selection::IndicesList& idxs = m_selection.get_volume_idxs();
3907 for (unsigned int idx : idxs) {
3908 m_volumes.volumes[idx]->force_sinking_contours = true;
3909 }
3910 m_dirty = true;
3911 };
3912
3913 if (m_gizmos.on_mouse(evt)) {
3914 if (m_gizmos.is_running()) {
3915 _deactivate_arrange_menu();
3916 _deactivate_orient_menu();
3917 _deactivate_layersediting_menu();
3918 }
3919 if (wxWindow::FindFocus() != m_canvas)
3920 // Grab keyboard focus for input in gizmo dialogs.
3921 m_canvas->SetFocus();
3922
3923 if (evt.LeftDown()) {
3924 // Clear hover state in main toolbar
3925 wxMouseEvent evt2 = evt;
3926 evt2.SetEventType(wxEVT_MOTION);
3927 evt2.SetLeftDown(false);
3928 m_main_toolbar.on_mouse(evt2, *this);
3929 }
3930
3931 if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp())
3932 mouse_up_cleanup();
3933
3934 m_mouse.set_start_position_3D_as_invalid();
3935 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
3936
3937 if (evt.Dragging() && current_printer_technology() == ptFFF && (fff_print()->config().print_sequence == PrintSequence::ByObject)) {
3938 switch (m_gizmos.get_current_type())
3939 {
3940 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Move:
3941 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Scale:
3942 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Rotate:
3943 {
3944 update_sequential_clearance();
3945 break;
3946 }
3947 default: { break; }
3948 }
3949 }
3950 else if (evt.Dragging()) {
3951 switch (m_gizmos.get_current_type())
3952 {
3953 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Move:
3954 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Scale:
3955 case GLGizmosManager::EType::Rotate:
3956 {
3957 show_sinking_contours();
3958 break;
3959 }
3960 default: { break; }
3961 }
3962 }
3963 else if (evt.LeftUp() &&
3964 m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::EType::Scale &&
3965 m_gizmos.get_current()->get_state() == GLGizmoBase::EState::On) {
3966 wxGetApp().obj_list()->selection_changed();
3967 }
3968
3969 return;
3970 }
3971
3972 bool any_gizmo_active = m_gizmos.get_current() != nullptr;
3973
3974 int selected_object_idx = m_selection.get_object_idx();
3975 int layer_editing_object_idx = is_layers_editing_enabled() ? selected_object_idx : -1;
3976
3977
3978 if (m_mouse.drag.move_requires_threshold && m_mouse.is_move_start_threshold_position_2D_defined() && m_mouse.is_move_threshold_met(pos)) {
3979 m_mouse.drag.move_requires_threshold = false;
3980 m_mouse.set_move_start_threshold_position_2D_as_invalid();
3981 }
3982
3983 if (evt.ButtonDown() && wxWindow::FindFocus() != m_canvas)
3984 // Grab keyboard focus on any mouse click event.
3985 m_canvas->SetFocus();
3986
3987 if (evt.Entering()) {
3988//#if defined(__WXMSW__) || defined(__linux__)
3989// // On Windows and Linux needs focus in order to catch key events
3990 // Set focus in order to remove it from sidebar fields
3991 if (m_canvas != nullptr) {
3992 // Only set focus, if the top level window of this canvas is active.
3993 auto p = dynamic_cast<wxWindow*>(evt.GetEventObject());
3994 while (p->GetParent())
3995 p = p->GetParent();
3996 auto *top_level_wnd = dynamic_cast<wxTopLevelWindow*>(p);
3997 if (top_level_wnd && top_level_wnd->IsActive() && !wxGetApp().get_side_menu_popup_status())
3998 ;// m_canvas->SetFocus();
3999 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
4000 m_tooltip_enabled = false;
4001 // 1) forces a frame render to ensure that m_hover_volume_idxs is updated even when the user right clicks while
4002 // the context menu is shown, ensuring it to disappear if the mouse is outside any volume and to
4003 // change the volume hover state if any is under the mouse
4004 // 2) when switching between 3d view and preview the size of the canvas changes if the side panels are visible,
4005 // so forces a resize to avoid multiple renders with different sizes (seen as flickering)
4006 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
4007 m_tooltip_enabled = true;
4008 }
4009 m_mouse.set_start_position_2D_as_invalid();
4010//#endif
4011 }
4012 else if (evt.Leaving()) {
4013 // to remove hover on objects when the mouse goes out of this canvas
4014 m_mouse.position = Vec2d(-1.0, -1.0);
4015 m_dirty = true;
4016 }
4017 else if (evt.LeftDown() || evt.RightDown() || evt.MiddleDown()) {
4018 //BBS: add orient deactivate logic
4019 if (!m_gizmos.on_mouse(evt)) {
4020 if (_deactivate_arrange_menu() || _deactivate_orient_menu())
4021 return;
4022 }
4023
4024 // If user pressed left or right button we first check whether this happened on a volume or not.
4025 m_layers_editing.state = LayersEditing::Unknown;
4026 if (layer_editing_object_idx != -1 && m_layers_editing.bar_rect_contains(*this, pos(0), pos(1))) {
4027 // A volume is selected and the mouse is inside the layer thickness bar.
4028 // Start editing the layer height.
4029 m_layers_editing.state = LayersEditing::Editing;
4030 _perform_layer_editing_action(&evt);
4031 }
4032
4033 else {
4034 // BBS: define Alt key to enable volume selection mode
4035 m_selection.set_volume_selection_mode(evt.AltDown() ? Selection::Volume : Selection::Instance);
4036 if (evt.LeftDown() && evt.ShiftDown() && m_picking_enabled && m_layers_editing.state != LayersEditing::Editing) {
4037 if (m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::SlaSupports
4038 && m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports
4039 && m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::Seam
4040 && m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation) {
4041 m_rectangle_selection.start_dragging(m_mouse.position, evt.ShiftDown() ? GLSelectionRectangle::Select : GLSelectionRectangle::Deselect);
4042 m_dirty = true;
4043 }
4044 }
4045 else {
4046 // Select volume in this 3D canvas.
4047 // Don't deselect a volume if layer editing is enabled or any gizmo is active. We want the object to stay selected
4048 // during the scene manipulation.
4049
4050 if (m_picking_enabled && (!any_gizmo_active || !evt.CmdDown()) && (!m_hover_volume_idxs.empty())) {
4051 if (evt.LeftDown() && !m_hover_volume_idxs.empty()) {
4052 int volume_idx = get_first_hover_volume_idx();
4053 bool already_selected = m_selection.contains_volume(volume_idx);
4054 bool ctrl_down = evt.CmdDown();
4055
4056 Selection::IndicesList curr_idxs = m_selection.get_volume_idxs();
4057
4058 if (already_selected && ctrl_down)
4059 m_selection.remove(volume_idx);
4060 else {
4061 m_selection.add(volume_idx, !ctrl_down, true);
4062 m_mouse.drag.move_requires_threshold = !already_selected;
4063 if (already_selected)
4064 m_mouse.set_move_start_threshold_position_2D_as_invalid();
4065 else
4066 m_mouse.drag.move_start_threshold_position_2D = pos;
4067 }
4068
4069 // propagate event through callback
4070 if (curr_idxs != m_selection.get_volume_idxs()) {
4071 if (m_selection.is_empty())
4072 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
4073 else
4074 m_gizmos.refresh_on_off_state();
4075
4076 m_gizmos.update_data();
4077 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_OBJECT_SELECT));
4078 m_dirty = true;
4079 }
4080 }
4081 }
4082
4083 if (!m_hover_volume_idxs.empty()) {
4084 if (evt.LeftDown() && m_moving_enabled && m_mouse.drag.move_volume_idx == -1) {
4085 // Only accept the initial position, if it is inside the volume bounding box.
4086 int volume_idx = get_first_hover_volume_idx();
4087 BoundingBoxf3 volume_bbox = m_volumes.volumes[volume_idx]->transformed_bounding_box();
4088 volume_bbox.offset(1.0);
4089 if ((!any_gizmo_active || !evt.CmdDown()) && volume_bbox.contains(m_mouse.scene_position)) {
4090 m_volumes.volumes[volume_idx]->hover = GLVolume::HS_None;
4091 // The dragging operation is initiated.
4092 m_mouse.drag.move_volume_idx = volume_idx;
4093 m_selection.start_dragging();
4094 m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D = m_mouse.scene_position;
4095 m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement = true;
4096 m_moving = true;
4097 }
4098 }
4099 }
4100 }
4101 }
4102 }
4103 else if (evt.Dragging() && evt.LeftIsDown() && m_mouse.drag.move_volume_idx != -1 && m_layers_editing.state == LayersEditing::Unknown) {
4104 if (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
4105 if (!m_mouse.drag.move_requires_threshold) {
4106 m_mouse.dragging = true;
4107 Vec3d cur_pos = m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D;
4108 // we do not want to translate objects if the user just clicked on an object while pressing shift to remove it from the selection and then drag
4109 if (m_selection.contains_volume(get_first_hover_volume_idx())) {
4110 const Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4111 if (std::abs(camera.get_dir_forward()(2)) < EPSILON) {
4112 // side view -> move selected volumes orthogonally to camera view direction
4113 Linef3 ray = mouse_ray(pos);
4114 Vec3d dir = ray.unit_vector();
4115 // finds the intersection of the mouse ray with the plane parallel to the camera viewport and passing throught the starting position
4116 // use ray-plane intersection see i.e. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Line%E2%80%93plane_intersection algebric form
4117 // in our case plane normal and ray direction are the same (orthogonal view)
4118 // when moving to perspective camera the negative z unit axis of the camera needs to be transformed in world space and used as plane normal
4119 Vec3d inters = ray.a + (m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D - ray.a).dot(dir) / dir.squaredNorm() * dir;
4120 // vector from the starting position to the found intersection
4121 Vec3d inters_vec = inters - m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D;
4122
4123 Vec3d camera_right = camera.get_dir_right();
4124 Vec3d camera_up = camera.get_dir_up();
4125
4126 // finds projection of the vector along the camera axes
4127 double projection_x = inters_vec.dot(camera_right);
4128 double projection_z = inters_vec.dot(camera_up);
4129
4130 // apply offset
4131 cur_pos = m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D + projection_x * camera_right + projection_z * camera_up;
4132 }
4133 else {
4134 // Generic view
4135 // Get new position at the same Z of the initial click point.
4136 float z0 = 0.0f;
4137 float z1 = 1.0f;
4138 cur_pos = Linef3(_mouse_to_3d(pos, &z0), _mouse_to_3d(pos, &z1)).intersect_plane(m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D(2));
4139 }
4140 }
4141
4142 m_selection.translate(cur_pos - m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D);
4143 if (current_printer_technology() == ptFFF && (fff_print()->config().print_sequence == PrintSequence::ByObject))
4144 update_sequential_clearance();
4145 // BBS
4146 //wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
4147 m_dirty = true;
4148 }
4149 }
4150 }
4151 else if (evt.Dragging() && evt.LeftIsDown() && m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging()) {
4152 //BBS not in assemble view
4153 if (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
4154 m_rectangle_selection.dragging(pos.cast<double>());
4155 m_dirty = true;
4156 }
4157 }
4158 else if (evt.Dragging()) {
4159 m_mouse.dragging = true;
4160
4161 if (m_layers_editing.state != LayersEditing::Unknown && layer_editing_object_idx != -1) {
4162 if (m_layers_editing.state == LayersEditing::Editing) {
4163 _perform_layer_editing_action(&evt);
4164 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
4165 }
4166 }
4167 // do not process the dragging if the left mouse was set down in another canvas
4168 else if (evt.LeftIsDown()) {
4169 // if dragging over blank area with left button, rotate
4170 if ((any_gizmo_active || m_hover_volume_idxs.empty()) && m_mouse.is_start_position_3D_defined()) {
4171 const Vec3d rot = (Vec3d(pos.x(), pos.y(), 0.) - m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D) * (PI * TRACKBALLSIZE / 180.);
4172 if (this->m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView || m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports ||
4173 m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::Seam || m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation) {
4174 //BBS rotate around target
4175 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4176 Vec3d rotate_target = Vec3d::Zero();
4177 if (!m_selection.is_empty())
4178 rotate_target = m_selection.get_bounding_box().center();
4179 else
4180 rotate_target = volumes_bounding_box().center();
4181 //BBS do not limit rotate in assemble view
4182 camera.rotate_local_with_target(Vec3d(rot.y(), rot.x(), 0.), rotate_target);
4183 //camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(rot.x(), rot.y(), false, rotate_target);
4184 }
4185 else {
4186#ifdef SUPPORT_FEEE_CAMERA
4187 if (wxGetApp().app_config->get("use_free_camera") == "1")
4188 // Virtual track ball (similar to the 3DConnexion mouse).
4189 wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().rotate_local_around_target(Vec3d(rot.y(), rot.x(), 0.));
4190 else {
4191#endif
4192 // Forces camera right vector to be parallel to XY plane in case it has been misaligned using the 3D mouse free rotation.
4193 // It is cheaper to call this function right away instead of testing wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller().connected(),
4194 // which checks an atomics (flushes CPU caches).
4195 // See GH issue #3816.
4196 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4197
4198 bool rotate_limit = current_printer_technology() != ptSLA;
4199 Vec3d rotate_target = m_selection.get_bounding_box().center();
4200
4201 camera.recover_from_free_camera();
4202 //BBS modify rotation
4203 //if (m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports
4204 // || m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::Seam
4205 // || m_gizmos.get_current_type() == GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation) {
4206 // //camera.rotate_local_with_target(Vec3d(rot.y(), rot.x(), 0.), rotate_target);
4207 // //camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(rot.x(), rot.y(), rotate_limit, rotate_target);
4208 //}
4209 //else
4210 if (evt.ControlDown() || evt.CmdDown()) {
4211 if ((m_rotation_center.x() == 0.f) && (m_rotation_center.y() == 0.f) && (m_rotation_center.z() == 0.f)) {
4212 auto canvas_w = float(get_canvas_size().get_width());
4213 auto canvas_h = float(get_canvas_size().get_height());
4214 Point screen_center(canvas_w/2, canvas_h/2);
4215 //camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(rot.x(), rot.y(), rotate_limit, wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_bounding_box().center());
4216 m_rotation_center = _mouse_to_3d(screen_center);
4217 m_rotation_center(2) = 0.f;
4218 }
4219 camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(rot.x(), rot.y(), rotate_limit, m_rotation_center);
4220 } else {
4221 //BBS rotate with current plate center
4222 PartPlate* plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
4223 if (plate)
4224 camera.rotate_on_sphere_with_target(rot.x(), rot.y(), rotate_limit, plate->get_bounding_box().center());
4225 else
4226 camera.rotate_on_sphere(rot.x(), rot.y(), rotate_limit);
4227 }
4228#ifdef SUPPORT_FEEE_CAMERA
4229 }
4230#endif
4231 }
4232
4233 m_dirty = true;
4234 }
4235 m_mouse.drag.start_position_3D = Vec3d((double)pos(0), (double)pos(1), 0.0);
4236 }
4237 else if (evt.MiddleIsDown() || evt.RightIsDown()) {
4238 // If dragging over blank area with right button, pan.
4239 if (m_mouse.is_start_position_2D_defined()) {
4240 // get point in model space at Z = 0
4241 float z = 0.0f;
4242 const Vec3d& cur_pos = _mouse_to_3d(pos, &z);
4243 Vec3d orig = _mouse_to_3d(m_mouse.drag.start_position_2D, &z);
4244 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4245#ifdef SUPPORT_FREE_CAMERA
4246 if (this->m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
4247 if (wxGetApp().app_config->get("use_free_camera") != "1")
4248 // Forces camera right vector to be parallel to XY plane in case it has been misaligned using the 3D mouse free rotation.
4249 // It is cheaper to call this function right away instead of testing wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller().connected(),
4250 // which checks an atomics (flushes CPU caches).
4251 // See GH issue #3816.
4252 camera.recover_from_free_camera();
4253 }
4254#endif
4255
4256 camera.set_target(camera.get_target() + orig - cur_pos);
4257 m_dirty = true;
4258 m_mouse.ignore_right_up = true;
4259 }
4260
4261 m_mouse.drag.start_position_2D = pos;
4262 }
4263 }
4264 else if (evt.LeftUp() || evt.MiddleUp() || evt.RightUp()) {
4265 if (evt.LeftUp()) {
4266 m_selection.stop_dragging();
4267 m_rotation_center(0) = m_rotation_center(1) = m_rotation_center(2) = 0.f;
4268 }
4269
4270 if (m_layers_editing.state != LayersEditing::Unknown) {
4271 m_layers_editing.state = LayersEditing::Unknown;
4272 _stop_timer();
4273 m_layers_editing.accept_changes(*this);
4274 }
4275 else if (m_mouse.drag.move_volume_idx != -1 && m_mouse.dragging) {
4276 do_move(L("Move Object"));
4277 // BBS
4278 //wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
4279 // Let the plater know that the dragging finished, so a delayed refresh
4280 // of the scene with the background processing data should be performed.
4281 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_MOUSE_DRAGGING_FINISHED));
4282 }
4283 else if (evt.LeftUp() && m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging() && m_layers_editing.state != LayersEditing::Editing) {
4284 //BBS: don't use alt as de-select
4285 //if (evt.ShiftDown() || evt.AltDown())
4286 if (evt.ShiftDown())
4287 _update_selection_from_hover();
4288
4289 m_rectangle_selection.stop_dragging();
4290 }
4291 else if (evt.LeftUp() && !m_mouse.ignore_left_up && !m_mouse.dragging && m_hover_volume_idxs.empty() && m_hover_plate_idxs.empty() && !is_layers_editing_enabled()) {
4292 // deselect and propagate event through callback
4293 if (!evt.ShiftDown() && (!any_gizmo_active || !evt.CmdDown()) && m_picking_enabled)
4294 deselect_all();
4295 }
4296 //BBS Select plate in this 3D canvas.
4297 else if (evt.LeftUp() && !m_mouse.dragging && m_picking_enabled && !m_hover_plate_idxs.empty() && (m_canvas_type == CanvasView3D) && !is_layers_editing_enabled())
4298 {
4299 int hover_idx = m_hover_plate_idxs.front();
4300 wxGetApp().plater()->select_plate_by_hover_id(hover_idx);
4301 //wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().select_plate_view();
4302 //deselect all the objects
4303 if (m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::MeshBoolean && m_hover_volume_idxs.empty())
4304 deselect_all();
4305 }
4306 else if (evt.RightUp() && !is_layers_editing_enabled()) {
4307 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
4308 // forces a frame render to ensure that m_hover_volume_idxs is updated even when the user right clicks while
4309 // the context menu is already shown
4310 render();
4311 if (!m_hover_volume_idxs.empty()) {
4312 // if right clicking on volume, propagate event through callback (shows context menu)
4313 int volume_idx = get_first_hover_volume_idx();
4314 if (!m_volumes.volumes[volume_idx]->is_wipe_tower // no context menu for the wipe tower
4315 && m_gizmos.get_current_type() != GLGizmosManager::SlaSupports) // disable context menu when the gizmo is open
4316 {
4317 // forces the selection of the volume
4318 /* m_selection.add(volume_idx); // #et_FIXME_if_needed
4319 * To avoid extra "Add-Selection" snapshots,
4320 * call add() with check_for_already_contained=true
4321 * */
4322 m_selection.add(volume_idx, true, true);
4323 m_gizmos.refresh_on_off_state();
4324 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_OBJECT_SELECT));
4325 m_gizmos.update_data();
4326 // BBS
4327 //wxGetApp().obj_manipul()->set_dirty();
4328 // forces a frame render to update the view before the context menu is shown
4329 render();
4330 }
4331 }
4332
4333 //BBS change plate selection
4334 if (!m_hover_plate_idxs.empty() && (m_canvas_type == CanvasView3D) && !m_mouse.dragging) {
4335 int hover_idx = m_hover_plate_idxs.front();
4336 wxGetApp().plater()->select_plate_by_hover_id(hover_idx, true);
4337 if (m_hover_volume_idxs.empty())
4338 deselect_all();
4339 render();
4340 }
4341
4342 Vec2d logical_pos = pos.cast<double>();
4343#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
4344 const float factor = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4345 logical_pos = logical_pos.cwiseQuotient(Vec2d(factor, factor));
4346#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
4347
4348 if (!m_mouse.ignore_right_up) {
4349 //BBS post right click event
4350 if (!m_hover_plate_idxs.empty()) {
4351 post_event(RBtnPlateEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_PLATE_RIGHT_CLICK, { logical_pos, m_hover_plate_idxs.front() }));
4352 }
4353 else {
4354 // do not post the event if the user is panning the scene
4355 // or if right click was done over the wipe tower
4356 bool post_right_click_event = m_hover_volume_idxs.empty() || !m_volumes.volumes[get_first_hover_volume_idx()]->is_wipe_tower;
4357 if (post_right_click_event)
4358 post_event(RBtnEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_RIGHT_CLICK, { logical_pos, m_hover_volume_idxs.empty() }));
4359 }
4360 }
4361 }
4362
4363 mouse_up_cleanup();
4364 }
4365 else if (evt.Moving()) {
4366 m_mouse.position = pos.cast<double>();
4367
4368 // updates gizmos overlay
4369 if (m_selection.is_empty())
4370 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
4371
4372 m_dirty = true;
4373 }
4374 else
4375 evt.Skip();
4376
4377 if (m_moving)
4378 show_sinking_contours();
4379
4380#ifdef __WXMSW__
4381 if (on_enter_workaround)
4382 m_mouse.position = Vec2d(-1., -1.);
4383#endif /* __WXMSW__ */
4384}

◆ on_mouse_wheel()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::on_mouse_wheel ( wxMouseEvent &  evt)
3583{
3584#ifdef WIN32
3585 // Try to filter out spurious mouse wheel events comming from 3D mouse.
3586 if (wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller().process_mouse_wheel())
3587 return;
3588#endif
3589
3590 if (!m_initialized)
3591 return;
3592
3593 // Ignore the wheel events if the middle button is pressed.
3594 if (evt.MiddleIsDown())
3595 return;
3596
3597#if ENABLE_RETINA_GL
3598 const float scale = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
3599 evt.SetX(evt.GetX() * scale);
3600 evt.SetY(evt.GetY() * scale);
3601#endif
3602
3603 if (wxGetApp().imgui()->update_mouse_data(evt)) {
3604 if (m_canvas_type == CanvasPreview) {
3605 IMSlider* m_layers_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_layers_slider();
3606 IMSlider* m_moves_slider = get_gcode_viewer().get_moves_slider();
3607 m_layers_slider->on_mouse_wheel(evt);
3608 m_moves_slider->on_mouse_wheel(evt);
3609 }
3610 render();
3611 m_dirty = true;
3612 return;
3613 }
3614
3615#ifdef __WXMSW__
3616 // For some reason the Idle event is not being generated after the mouse scroll event in case of scrolling with the two fingers on the touch pad,
3617 // if the event is not allowed to be passed further.
3618 // evt.Skip() used to trigger the needed screen refresh, but it does no more. wxWakeUpIdle() seem to work now.
3619 wxWakeUpIdle();
3620#endif /* __WXMSW__ */
3621
3622 // Performs layers editing updates, if enabled
3623 if (is_layers_editing_enabled()) {
3624 int object_idx_selected = m_selection.get_object_idx();
3625 if (object_idx_selected != -1) {
3626 // A volume is selected. Test, whether hovering over a layer thickness bar.
3627 if (m_layers_editing.bar_rect_contains(*this, (float)evt.GetX(), (float)evt.GetY())) {
3628 // Adjust the width of the selection.
3629 m_layers_editing.band_width = std::max(std::min(m_layers_editing.band_width * (1.0f + 0.1f * (float)evt.GetWheelRotation() / (float)evt.GetWheelDelta()), 10.0f), 1.5f);
3630 if (m_canvas != nullptr)
3631 m_canvas->Refresh();
3632
3633 return;
3634 }
3635 }
3636 }
3637
3638 // Inform gizmos about the event so they have the opportunity to react.
3639 if (m_gizmos.on_mouse_wheel(evt))
3640 return;
3641
3642 if (m_canvas_type == CanvasAssembleView && (evt.AltDown() || evt.CmdDown())) {
3643 float rotation = (float)evt.GetWheelRotation() / (float)evt.GetWheelDelta();
3644 if (evt.AltDown()) {
3645 auto clp_dist = m_gizmos.m_assemble_view_data->model_objects_clipper()->get_position();
3646 clp_dist = rotation < 0.f
3647 ? std::max(0., clp_dist - 0.01)
3648 : std::min(1., clp_dist + 0.01);
3649 m_gizmos.m_assemble_view_data->model_objects_clipper()->set_position(clp_dist, true);
3650 }
3651 else if (evt.CmdDown()) {
3652 m_explosion_ratio = rotation < 0.f
3653 ? std::max(1., m_explosion_ratio - 0.01)
3654 : std::min(3., m_explosion_ratio + 0.01);
3655 if (m_explosion_ratio != GLVolume::explosion_ratio) {
3656 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
3657 volume->set_bounding_boxes_as_dirty();
3658 }
3659 GLVolume::explosion_ratio = m_explosion_ratio;
3660 }
3661 }
3662 return;
3663 }
3664 // Calculate the zoom delta and apply it to the current zoom factor
3665#ifdef SUPPORT_REVERSE_MOUSE_ZOOM
3666 double direction_factor = (wxGetApp().app_config->get("reverse_mouse_wheel_zoom") == "1") ? -1.0 : 1.0;
3667#else
3668 double direction_factor = 1.0;
3669#endif
3670 auto delta = direction_factor * (double)evt.GetWheelRotation() / (double)evt.GetWheelDelta();
3671 bool zoom_to_mouse = wxGetApp().app_config->get("zoom_to_mouse") == "true";
3672 if (!zoom_to_mouse) {// zoom to center
3673 _update_camera_zoom(delta);
3674 }
3675 else {
3676 auto cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
3677 auto screen_center_3d_pos = _mouse_to_3d({ cnv_size.get_width() * 0.5, cnv_size.get_height() * 0.5 });
3678 auto mouse_3d_pos = _mouse_to_3d({evt.GetX(), evt.GetY()});
3679 Vec3d displacement = mouse_3d_pos - screen_center_3d_pos;
3680 wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().translate(displacement);
3681 auto origin_zoom = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_zoom();
3682 _update_camera_zoom(delta);
3683 auto new_zoom = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().get_zoom();
3684 wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera().translate((-displacement) / (new_zoom / origin_zoom));
3685 }
3686}

4389 m_dirty = true;
4390 else

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::reload_scene ( bool  refresh_immediately,

)

print->is_step_done(psWipeTower)

2213{
2214 if (m_canvas == nullptr || m_config == nullptr || m_model == nullptr)
2215 return;
2216
2217 if (!m_initialized)
2218 return;
2219
2220 _set_current();
2221
2222 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
2223
2224 struct ModelVolumeState {
2225 ModelVolumeState(const GLVolume* volume) :
2226 model_volume(nullptr), geometry_id(volume->geometry_id), volume_idx(-1) {}
2227 ModelVolumeState(const ModelVolume* model_volume, const ObjectID& instance_id, const GLVolume::CompositeID& composite_id) :
2228 model_volume(model_volume), geometry_id(std::make_pair(model_volume->id().id, instance_id.id)), composite_id(composite_id), volume_idx(-1) {}
2229 ModelVolumeState(const ObjectID& volume_id, const ObjectID& instance_id) :
2230 model_volume(nullptr), geometry_id(std::make_pair(volume_id.id, instance_id.id)), volume_idx(-1) {}
2231 bool new_geometry() const { return this->volume_idx == size_t(-1); }
2232 const ModelVolume* model_volume;
2233 // ObjectID of ModelVolume + ObjectID of ModelInstance
2234 // or timestamp of an SLAPrintObjectStep + ObjectID of ModelInstance
2235 std::pair<size_t, size_t> geometry_id;
2236 GLVolume::CompositeID composite_id;
2237 // Volume index in the new GLVolume vector.
2238 size_t volume_idx;
2239 };
2240 std::vector<ModelVolumeState> model_volume_state;
2241 std::vector<ModelVolumeState> aux_volume_state;
2242
2243 struct GLVolumeState {
2244 GLVolumeState() :
2245 volume_idx(size_t(-1)) {}
2246 GLVolumeState(const GLVolume* volume, unsigned int volume_idx) :
2247 composite_id(volume->composite_id), volume_idx(volume_idx) {}
2248 GLVolumeState(const GLVolume::CompositeID &composite_id) :
2249 composite_id(composite_id), volume_idx(size_t(-1)) {}
2250
2251 GLVolume::CompositeID composite_id;
2252 // Volume index in the old GLVolume vector.
2253 size_t volume_idx;
2254 };
2255
2256 // SLA steps to pull the preview meshes for.
2257 typedef std::array<SLAPrintObjectStep, 3> SLASteps;
2258 SLASteps sla_steps = { slaposDrillHoles, slaposSupportTree, slaposPad };
2259 struct SLASupportState {
2260 std::array<PrintStateBase::StateWithTimeStamp, std::tuple_size<SLASteps>::value> step;
2261 };
2262 // State of the sla_steps for all SLAPrintObjects.
2263 std::vector<SLASupportState> sla_support_state;
2264
2265 std::vector<size_t> instance_ids_selected;
2266 std::vector<size_t> map_glvolume_old_to_new(m_volumes.volumes.size(), size_t(-1));
2267 std::vector<GLVolumeState> deleted_volumes;
2268 // BBS
2269 std::vector<GLVolumeState> deleted_wipe_towers;
2270 std::vector<GLVolume*> glvolumes_new;
2271 glvolumes_new.reserve(m_volumes.volumes.size());
2272 auto model_volume_state_lower = [](const ModelVolumeState& m1, const ModelVolumeState& m2) { return m1.geometry_id < m2.geometry_id; };
2273
2274 m_reload_delayed = !m_canvas->IsShown() && !refresh_immediately && !force_full_scene_refresh;
2275
2276 PrinterTechnology printer_technology = current_printer_technology();
2277
2278 // BBS: support wipe tower for multi-plates
2279 PartPlateList& ppl = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list();
2280 int n_plates = ppl.get_plate_count();
2281 std::vector<int> volume_idxs_wipe_tower_old(n_plates, -1);
2282
2283 // Release invalidated volumes to conserve GPU memory in case of delayed refresh (see m_reload_delayed).
2284 // First initialize model_volumes_new_sorted & model_instances_new_sorted.
2285 for (int object_idx = 0; object_idx < (int)m_model->objects.size(); ++object_idx) {
2286 const ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[object_idx];
2287 for (int instance_idx = 0; instance_idx < (int)model_object->instances.size(); ++instance_idx) {
2288 const ModelInstance* model_instance = model_object->instances[instance_idx];
2289 for (int volume_idx = 0; volume_idx < (int)model_object->volumes.size(); ++volume_idx) {
2290 const ModelVolume* model_volume = model_object->volumes[volume_idx];
2291 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2292 if (model_volume->is_model_part())
2293 model_volume_state.emplace_back(model_volume, model_instance->id(), GLVolume::CompositeID(object_idx, volume_idx, instance_idx));
2294 }
2295 else {
2296 model_volume_state.emplace_back(model_volume, model_instance->id(), GLVolume::CompositeID(object_idx, volume_idx, instance_idx));
2297 }
2298 }
2299 }
2300 }
2301 if (printer_technology == ptSLA) {
2302 const SLAPrint* sla_print = this->sla_print();
2303#ifndef NDEBUG
2304 // Verify that the SLAPrint object is synchronized with m_model.
2305 check_model_ids_equal(*m_model, sla_print->model());
2306#endif /* NDEBUG */
2307 sla_support_state.reserve(sla_print->objects().size());
2308 for (const SLAPrintObject* print_object : sla_print->objects()) {
2309 SLASupportState state;
2310 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++istep) {
2311 state.step[istep] = print_object->step_state_with_timestamp(sla_steps[istep]);
2312 if (state.step[istep].state == PrintStateBase::DONE) {
2313 if (!print_object->has_mesh(sla_steps[istep]))
2314 // Consider the DONE step without a valid mesh as invalid for the purpose
2315 // of mesh visualization.
2316 state.step[istep].state = PrintStateBase::INVALID;
2317 else if (sla_steps[istep] != slaposDrillHoles)
2318 for (const ModelInstance* model_instance : print_object->model_object()->instances)
2319 // Only the instances, which are currently printable, will have the SLA support structures kept.
2320 // The instances outside the print bed will have the GLVolumes of their support structures released.
2321 if (model_instance->is_printable())
2322 aux_volume_state.emplace_back(state.step[istep].timestamp, model_instance->id());
2323 }
2324 }
2325 sla_support_state.emplace_back(state);
2326 }
2327 }
2328 std::sort(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), model_volume_state_lower);
2329 std::sort(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), model_volume_state_lower);
2330
2331 // BBS: normalize painting data with current filament count
2332 for (unsigned int obj_idx = 0; obj_idx < (unsigned int)m_model->objects.size(); ++obj_idx) {
2333 const ModelObject& model_object = *m_model->objects[obj_idx];
2334 for (int volume_idx = 0; volume_idx < (int)model_object.volumes.size(); ++volume_idx) {
2335 ModelVolume& model_volume = *model_object.volumes[volume_idx];
2336 if (!model_volume.is_model_part())
2337 continue;
2338
2339 unsigned int filaments_count = (unsigned int)dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionStrings*>(m_config->option("filament_colour"))->values.size();
2340 model_volume.update_extruder_count(filaments_count);
2341 }
2342 }
2343
2344 // Release all ModelVolume based GLVolumes not found in the current Model. Find the GLVolume of a hollowed mesh.
2345 for (size_t volume_id = 0; volume_id < m_volumes.volumes.size(); ++volume_id) {
2346 GLVolume* volume = m_volumes.volumes[volume_id];
2347 ModelVolumeState key(volume);
2348 ModelVolumeState* mvs = nullptr;
2349 if (volume->volume_idx() < 0) {
2350 auto it = std::lower_bound(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2351 if (it != aux_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id)
2352 // This can be an SLA support structure that should not be rendered (in case someone used undo
2353 // to revert to before it was generated). We only reuse the volume if that's not the case.
2354 if (m_model->objects[volume->composite_id.object_id]->sla_points_status != sla::PointsStatus::NoPoints)
2355 mvs = &(*it);
2356 }
2357 else {
2358 auto it = std::lower_bound(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2359 if (it != model_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id)
2360 mvs = &(*it);
2361 }
2362 // Emplace instance ID of the volume. Both the aux volumes and model volumes share the same instance ID.
2363 // The wipe tower has its own wipe_tower_instance_id().
2364 if (m_selection.contains_volume(volume_id)) {
2365 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2366 if (!volume->is_modifier)
2367 instance_ids_selected.emplace_back(volume->geometry_id.second);
2368 }
2369 else {
2370 instance_ids_selected.emplace_back(volume->geometry_id.second);
2371 }
2372 }
2373 if (mvs == nullptr || force_full_scene_refresh) {
2374 // This GLVolume will be released.
2375 if (volume->is_wipe_tower) {
2376 // There is only one wipe tower.
2377 //assert(volume_idx_wipe_tower_old == -1);
2378 int plate_id = volume->composite_id.object_id - 1000;
2379 if (plate_id < n_plates)
2380 volume_idxs_wipe_tower_old[plate_id] = (int)volume_id;
2381 }
2382 if (!m_reload_delayed) {
2383 deleted_volumes.emplace_back(volume, volume_id);
2384 // BBS
2385 if (volume->is_wipe_tower)
2386 deleted_wipe_towers.emplace_back(volume, volume_id);
2387 delete volume;
2388 }
2389 }
2390 else {
2391 // This GLVolume will be reused.
2392 volume->set_sla_shift_z(0.0);
2393 map_glvolume_old_to_new[volume_id] = glvolumes_new.size();
2394 mvs->volume_idx = glvolumes_new.size();
2395 glvolumes_new.emplace_back(volume);
2396 // Update color of the volume based on the current extruder.
2397 if (mvs->model_volume != nullptr) {
2398 int extruder_id = mvs->model_volume->extruder_id();
2399 if (extruder_id != -1)
2400 volume->extruder_id = extruder_id;
2401
2402 volume->is_modifier = !mvs->model_volume->is_model_part();
2403 volume->set_color(color_from_model_volume(*mvs->model_volume));
2404
2405 // updates volumes transformations
2406 if (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2407 volume->set_instance_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_object()->instances[mvs->composite_id.instance_id]->get_transformation());
2408 volume->set_volume_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_transformation());
2409 // updates volumes convex hull
2410 if (mvs->model_volume->is_model_part() && ! volume->convex_hull())
2411 // Model volume was likely changed from modifier or support blocker / enforcer to a model part.
2412 // Only model parts require convex hulls.
2413 volume->set_convex_hull(mvs->model_volume->get_convex_hull_shared_ptr());
2414 volume->set_offset_to_assembly(Vec3d(0, 0, 0));
2415 }
2416 else {
2417 volume->set_instance_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_object()->instances[mvs->composite_id.instance_id]->get_assemble_transformation());
2418 volume->set_volume_transformation(mvs->model_volume->get_transformation());
2419 // updates volumes convex hull
2420 if (mvs->model_volume->is_model_part() && ! volume->convex_hull())
2421 // Model volume was likely changed from modifier or support blocker / enforcer to a model part.
2422 // Only model parts require convex hulls.
2423 volume->set_convex_hull(mvs->model_volume->get_convex_hull_shared_ptr());
2424 volume->set_offset_to_assembly(mvs->model_volume->get_object()->instances[mvs->composite_id.instance_id]->get_offset_to_assembly());
2425 }
2426 }
2427 }
2428 }
2429 sort_remove_duplicates(instance_ids_selected);
2430 auto deleted_volumes_lower = [](const GLVolumeState &v1, const GLVolumeState &v2) { return v1.composite_id < v2.composite_id; };
2431 std::sort(deleted_volumes.begin(), deleted_volumes.end(), deleted_volumes_lower);
2432
2433 //BBS clean hover_volume_idxs
2434 m_hover_volume_idxs.clear();
2435
2436 if (m_reload_delayed)
2437 return;
2438
2439 // BBS: do not check wipe tower changes
2440 bool update_object_list = false;
2441 if (deleted_volumes.size() != deleted_wipe_towers.size())
2442 update_object_list = true;
2443
2444 if (m_volumes.volumes != glvolumes_new && !update_object_list) {
2445 int vol_idx = 0;
2446 for (; vol_idx < std::min(m_volumes.volumes.size(), glvolumes_new.size()); vol_idx++) {
2447 if (m_volumes.volumes[vol_idx] != glvolumes_new[vol_idx]) {
2448 update_object_list = true;
2449 break;
2450 }
2451 }
2452 for (int temp_idx = vol_idx; temp_idx < m_volumes.volumes.size() && !update_object_list; temp_idx++) {
2453 // Volumes in m_volumes might not exist anymore, so we cannot
2454 // directly check if they are is_wipe_towers, for which we do
2455 // not want to update the object list. Instead, we do a kind of
2456 // slow thing of seeing if they were in the deleted list, and if
2457 // so, if they were a wipe tower.
2458 bool was_deleted_wipe_tower = false;
2459 for (int del_idx = 0; del_idx < deleted_wipe_towers.size(); del_idx++) {
2460 if (deleted_wipe_towers[del_idx].volume_idx == temp_idx) {
2461 was_deleted_wipe_tower = true;
2462 break;
2463 }
2464 }
2465 if (!was_deleted_wipe_tower) {
2466 update_object_list = true;
2467 }
2468 }
2469 for (int temp_idx = vol_idx; temp_idx < glvolumes_new.size() && !update_object_list; temp_idx++) {
2470 if (!glvolumes_new[temp_idx]->is_wipe_tower)
2471 update_object_list = true;
2472 }
2473 }
2474 m_volumes.volumes = std::move(glvolumes_new);
2475 for (unsigned int obj_idx = 0; obj_idx < (unsigned int)m_model->objects.size(); ++ obj_idx) {
2476 const ModelObject &model_object = *m_model->objects[obj_idx];
2477 for (int volume_idx = 0; volume_idx < (int)model_object.volumes.size(); ++ volume_idx) {
2478 const ModelVolume &model_volume = *model_object.volumes[volume_idx];
2479 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView && !model_volume.is_model_part())
2480 continue;
2481 for (int instance_idx = 0; instance_idx < (int)model_object.instances.size(); ++ instance_idx) {
2482 const ModelInstance &model_instance = *model_object.instances[instance_idx];
2483 ModelVolumeState key(model_volume.id(), model_instance.id());
2484 auto it = std::lower_bound(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2485 assert(it != model_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2486 if (it->new_geometry()) {
2487 // New volume.
2488 auto it_old_volume = std::lower_bound(deleted_volumes.begin(), deleted_volumes.end(), GLVolumeState(it->composite_id), deleted_volumes_lower);
2489 if (it_old_volume != deleted_volumes.end() && it_old_volume->composite_id == it->composite_id)
2490 // If a volume changed its ObjectID, but it reuses a GLVolume's CompositeID, maintain its selection.
2491 map_glvolume_old_to_new[it_old_volume->volume_idx] = m_volumes.volumes.size();
2492 // Note the index of the loaded volume, so that we can reload the main model GLVolume with the hollowed mesh
2493 // later in this function.
2494 it->volume_idx = m_volumes.volumes.size();
2495 m_volumes.load_object_volume(&model_object, obj_idx, volume_idx, instance_idx, m_color_by, m_initialized, m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView);
2496 m_volumes.volumes.back()->geometry_id = key.geometry_id;
2497 update_object_list = true;
2498 } else {
2499 // Recycling an old GLVolume.
2500 GLVolume &existing_volume = *m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx];
2501 assert(existing_volume.geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2502 // Update the Object/Volume/Instance indices into the current Model.
2503 if (existing_volume.composite_id != it->composite_id) {
2504 existing_volume.composite_id = it->composite_id;
2505 update_object_list = true;
2506 }
2507 }
2508 }
2509 }
2510 }
2511 if (printer_technology == ptSLA) {
2512 size_t idx = 0;
2513 const SLAPrint *sla_print = this->sla_print();
2514 std::vector<double> shift_zs(m_model->objects.size(), 0);
2515 double relative_correction_z = sla_print->relative_correction().z();
2516 if (relative_correction_z <= EPSILON)
2517 relative_correction_z = 1.;
2518 for (const SLAPrintObject *print_object : sla_print->objects()) {
2519 SLASupportState &state = sla_support_state[idx ++];
2520 const ModelObject *model_object = print_object->model_object();
2521 // Find an index of the ModelObject
2522 int object_idx;
2523 // There may be new SLA volumes added to the scene for this print_object.
2524 // Find the object index of this print_object in the Model::objects list.
2525 auto it = std::find(sla_print->model().objects.begin(), sla_print->model().objects.end(), model_object);
2526 assert(it != sla_print->model().objects.end());
2527 object_idx = it - sla_print->model().objects.begin();
2528 // Cache the Z offset to be applied to all volumes with this object_idx.
2529 shift_zs[object_idx] = print_object->get_current_elevation() / relative_correction_z;
2530 // Collect indices of this print_object's instances, for which the SLA support meshes are to be added to the scene.
2531 // pairs of <instance_idx, print_instance_idx>
2532 std::vector<std::pair<size_t, size_t>> instances[std::tuple_size<SLASteps>::value];
2533 for (size_t print_instance_idx = 0; print_instance_idx < print_object->instances().size(); ++ print_instance_idx) {
2534 const SLAPrintObject::Instance &instance = print_object->instances()[print_instance_idx];
2535 // Find index of ModelInstance corresponding to this SLAPrintObject::Instance.
2536 auto it = std::find_if(model_object->instances.begin(), model_object->instances.end(),
2537 [&instance](const ModelInstance *mi) { return mi->id() == instance.instance_id; });
2538 assert(it != model_object->instances.end());
2539 int instance_idx = it - model_object->instances.begin();
2540 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++ istep)
2541 if (sla_steps[istep] == slaposDrillHoles) {
2542 // Hollowing is a special case, where the mesh from the backend is being loaded into the 1st volume of an instance,
2543 // not into its own GLVolume.
2544 // There shall always be such a GLVolume allocated.
2545 ModelVolumeState key(model_object->volumes.front()->id(), instance.instance_id);
2546 auto it = std::lower_bound(model_volume_state.begin(), model_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2547 assert(it != model_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2548 assert(!it->new_geometry());
2549 GLVolume &volume = *m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx];
2550 if (! volume.offsets.empty() && state.step[istep].timestamp != volume.offsets.front()) {
2551 // The backend either produced a new hollowed mesh, or it invalidated the one that the front end has seen.
2552 volume.indexed_vertex_array.release_geometry();
2553 if (state.step[istep].state == PrintStateBase::DONE) {
2554 TriangleMesh mesh = print_object->get_mesh(slaposDrillHoles);
2555 assert(! mesh.empty());
2556 mesh.transform(sla_print->sla_trafo(*m_model->objects[volume.object_idx()]).inverse());
2557#if ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
2558 volume.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(mesh, true);
2559#else
2560 volume.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(mesh);
2561#endif // ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
2562 } else {
2563 // Reload the original volume.
2564#if ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
2565 volume.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(m_model->objects[volume.object_idx()]->volumes[volume.volume_idx()]->mesh(), true);
2566#else
2567 volume.indexed_vertex_array.load_mesh(m_model->objects[volume.object_idx()]->volumes[volume.volume_idx()]->mesh());
2568#endif // ENABLE_SMOOTH_NORMALS
2569 }
2570 volume.finalize_geometry(true);
2571 }
2572 //FIXME it is an ugly hack to write the timestamp into the "offsets" field to not have to add another member variable
2573 // to the GLVolume. We should refactor GLVolume significantly, so that the GLVolume will not contain member variables
2574 // of various concenrs (model vs. 3D print path).
2575 volume.offsets = { state.step[istep].timestamp };
2576 } else if (state.step[istep].state == PrintStateBase::DONE) {
2577 // Check whether there is an existing auxiliary volume to be updated, or a new auxiliary volume to be created.
2578 ModelVolumeState key(state.step[istep].timestamp, instance.instance_id.id);
2579 auto it = std::lower_bound(aux_volume_state.begin(), aux_volume_state.end(), key, model_volume_state_lower);
2580 assert(it != aux_volume_state.end() && it->geometry_id == key.geometry_id);
2581 if (it->new_geometry()) {
2582 // This can be an SLA support structure that should not be rendered (in case someone used undo
2583 // to revert to before it was generated). If that's the case, we should not generate anything.
2584 if (model_object->sla_points_status != sla::PointsStatus::NoPoints)
2585 instances[istep].emplace_back(std::pair<size_t, size_t>(instance_idx, print_instance_idx));
2586 else
2587 shift_zs[object_idx] = 0.;
2588 } else {
2589 // Recycling an old GLVolume. Update the Object/Instance indices into the current Model.
2590 m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->composite_id = GLVolume::CompositeID(object_idx, m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->volume_idx(), instance_idx);
2591 m_volumes.volumes[it->volume_idx]->set_instance_transformation(model_object->instances[instance_idx]->get_transformation());
2592 }
2593 }
2594 }
2595
2596 for (size_t istep = 0; istep < sla_steps.size(); ++istep)
2597 if (!instances[istep].empty())
2598 m_volumes.load_object_auxiliary(print_object, object_idx, instances[istep], sla_steps[istep], state.step[istep].timestamp, m_initialized);
2599 }
2600
2601 // Shift-up all volumes of the object so that it has the right elevation with respect to the print bed
2602 for (GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes)
2603 if (volume->object_idx() < (int)m_model->objects.size() && m_model->objects[volume->object_idx()]->instances[volume->instance_idx()]->is_printable())
2604 volume->set_sla_shift_z(shift_zs[volume->object_idx()]);
2605 }
2606
2607 // BBS
2608 if (printer_technology == ptFFF && m_config->has("filament_colour") && (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView)) {
2609 // Should the wipe tower be visualized ?
2610 unsigned int filaments_count = (unsigned int)dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionStrings*>(m_config->option("filament_colour"))->values.size();
2611
2612 bool wt = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionBool*>(m_config->option("enable_prime_tower"))->value;
2613 auto co = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionEnum<PrintSequence>*>(m_config->option<ConfigOptionEnum<PrintSequence>>("print_sequence"));
2614
2615 const DynamicPrintConfig &dconfig = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->prints.get_edited_preset().config;
2616 auto timelapse_type = dconfig.option<ConfigOptionEnum<TimelapseType>>("timelapse_type");
2617 bool timelapse_enabled = timelapse_type ? (timelapse_type->value == TimelapseType::tlSmooth) : false;
2618
2619 if (wt && (timelapse_enabled || filaments_count > 1)) {
2620 for (int plate_id = 0; plate_id < n_plates; plate_id++) {
2621 // If print ByObject and there is only one object in the plate, the wipe tower is allowed to be generated.
2622 PartPlate* part_plate = ppl.get_plate(plate_id);
2623 if (part_plate->get_print_seq() == PrintSequence::ByObject ||
2624 (part_plate->get_print_seq() == PrintSequence::ByDefault && co != nullptr && co->value == PrintSequence::ByObject)) {
2625 if (ppl.get_plate(plate_id)->printable_instance_size() != 1)
2626 continue;
2627 }
2628
2629 DynamicPrintConfig& proj_cfg = wxGetApp().preset_bundle->project_config;
2630 float x = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloats*>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_x"))->get_at(plate_id);
2631 float y = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloats*>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_y"))->get_at(plate_id);
2632 float w = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("prime_tower_width"))->value;
2633 float a = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_rotation_angle"))->value;
2634 // BBS
2635 float v = dynamic_cast<const ConfigOptionFloat*>(m_config->option("prime_volume"))->value;
2636 Vec3d plate_origin = ppl.get_plate(plate_id)->get_origin();
2637
2638 const Print* print = m_process->fff_print();
2639 float brim_width = print->wipe_tower_data(filaments_count).brim_width;
2640 Vec3d wipe_tower_size = ppl.get_plate(plate_id)->estimate_wipe_tower_size(w, v);
2641
2642 const float margin = 15.f;
2643 BoundingBoxf3 plate_bbox = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_plate(plate_id)->get_bounding_box();
2644 coordf_t plate_bbox_x_max_local_coord = plate_bbox.max(0) - plate_origin(0);
2645 coordf_t plate_bbox_y_max_local_coord = plate_bbox.max(1) - plate_origin(1);
2646 if (x + margin + wipe_tower_size(0) > plate_bbox_x_max_local_coord) {
2647 x = plate_bbox_x_max_local_coord - wipe_tower_size(0) - margin;
2648 ConfigOptionFloat wt_x_opt(x);
2649 dynamic_cast<ConfigOptionFloats *>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_x"))->set_at(&wt_x_opt, plate_id, 0);
2650 }
2651 if (y + margin + wipe_tower_size(1) > plate_bbox_y_max_local_coord) {
2652 y = plate_bbox_y_max_local_coord - wipe_tower_size(1) - margin;
2653 ConfigOptionFloat wt_y_opt(y);
2654 dynamic_cast<ConfigOptionFloats*>(proj_cfg.option("wipe_tower_y"))->set_at(&wt_y_opt, plate_id, 0);
2655 }
2656
2657 int volume_idx_wipe_tower_new = m_volumes.load_wipe_tower_preview(
2658 1000 + plate_id, x + plate_origin(0), y + plate_origin(1),
2659 (float)wipe_tower_size(0), (float)wipe_tower_size(1), (float)wipe_tower_size(2), a, true, brim_width, m_initialized);
2661 int volume_idx_wipe_tower_old = volume_idxs_wipe_tower_old[plate_id];
2662 if (volume_idx_wipe_tower_old != -1)
2663 map_glvolume_old_to_new[volume_idx_wipe_tower_old] = volume_idx_wipe_tower_new;
2664 }
2665 }
2666 }
2667
2668 update_volumes_colors_by_extruder();
2669 // Update selection indices based on the old/new GLVolumeCollection.
2670 if (m_selection.get_mode() == Selection::Instance)
2671 m_selection.instances_changed(instance_ids_selected);
2672 else
2673 m_selection.volumes_changed(map_glvolume_old_to_new);
2674
2675 m_gizmos.update_data();
2676 m_gizmos.update_assemble_view_data();
2677 m_gizmos.refresh_on_off_state();
2678
2679 // Update the toolbar
2680 //BBS: notify the PartPlateList to reload all objects
2681 if (update_object_list)
2682 {
2683 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_OBJECT_SELECT));
2684 }
2685
2686 //BBS:exclude the assmble view
2687 if (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2688 _set_warning_notification_if_needed(EWarning::GCodeConflict);
2689 // checks for geometry outside the print volume to render it accordingly
2690 if (!m_volumes.empty()) {
2691 ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState state;
2692 const bool contained_min_one = m_volumes.check_outside_state(m_bed.build_volume(), &state);
2693 const bool partlyOut = (state == ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState::ModelInstancePVS_Partly_Outside);
2694 const bool fullyOut = (state == ModelInstanceEPrintVolumeState::ModelInstancePVS_Fully_Outside);
2695
2696 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, partlyOut);
2697 //BBS: turn off the warning when fully outside
2698 //_set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, fullyOut);
2699 if (printer_technology != ptSLA || !contained_min_one)
2700 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, false);
2701
2702 post_event(Event<bool>(EVT_GLCANVAS_ENABLE_ACTION_BUTTONS,
2703 contained_min_one && !m_model->objects.empty() && !partlyOut));
2704 }
2705 else {
2706 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectOutside, false);
2707 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::ObjectClashed, false);
2708 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SlaSupportsOutside, false);
2709 post_event(Event<bool>(EVT_GLCANVAS_ENABLE_ACTION_BUTTONS, false));
2710 }
2711 }
2712
2713 refresh_camera_scene_box();
2714
2715 if (m_selection.is_empty()) {
2716 // If no object is selected, deactivate the active gizmo, if any
2717 // Otherwise it may be shown after cleaning the scene (if it was active while the objects were deleted)
2718 m_gizmos.reset_all_states();
2719 // BBS
2720#if 0
2721 // If no object is selected, reset the objects manipulator on the sidebar
2722 // to force a reset of its cache
2723 auto manip = wxGetApp().obj_manipul();
2724 if (manip != nullptr)
2725 manip->set_dirty();
2726#endif
2727 }
2728
2729 // and force this canvas to be redrawn.
2730 m_dirty = true;
2731}

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::render ( bool  only_init = false)
1786{
1787 if (m_in_render) {
1788 // if called recursively, return
1789 m_dirty = true;
1790 return;
1791 }
1792
1793 m_in_render = true;
1794 Slic3r::ScopeGuard in_render_guard([this]() { m_in_render = false; });
1795 (void)in_render_guard;
1796
1797 if (m_canvas == nullptr)
1798 return;
1799
1800 //BBS: add enable_render
1801 if (!m_enable_render)
1802 return;
1803
1804 // ensures this canvas is current and initialized
1805 if (!_is_shown_on_screen() || !_set_current() || !wxGetApp().init_opengl())
1806 return;
1807
1808 if (!is_initialized() && !init())
1809 return;
1810
1811 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled())
1812 m_gcode_viewer.init(wxGetApp().get_mode(), wxGetApp().preset_bundle);
1813
1814 if (! m_bed.build_volume().valid()) {
1815 // this happens at startup when no data is still saved under <>\AppData\Roaming\Slic3rPE
1816 post_event(SimpleEvent(EVT_GLCANVAS_UPDATE_BED_SHAPE));
1817 return;
1818 }
1819
1820 if (only_init)
1821 return;
1822
1823#if ENABLE_ENVIRONMENT_MAP
1824 if (wxGetApp().is_editor())
1825 wxGetApp().plater()->init_environment_texture();
1826#endif // ENABLE_ENVIRONMENT_MAP
1827
1828 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
1829 // Probably due to different order of events on Linux/GTK2, when one switched from 3D scene
1830 // to preview, this was called before canvas had its final size. It reported zero width
1831 // and the viewport was set incorrectly, leading to tripping glAsserts further down
1832 // the road (in apply_projection). That's why the minimum size is forced to 10.
1833 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
1834 camera.apply_viewport(0, 0, std::max(10u, (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width()), std::max(10u, (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height()));
1835
1836 if (camera.requires_zoom_to_bed) {
1837 zoom_to_bed();
1838 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
1839 camera.requires_zoom_to_bed = false;
1840 }
1841
1842 if (camera.requires_zoom_to_plate > REQUIRES_ZOOM_TO_PLATE_IDLE) {
1843 zoom_to_plate(camera.requires_zoom_to_plate);
1844 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
1845 camera.requires_zoom_to_plate = REQUIRES_ZOOM_TO_PLATE_IDLE;
1846 }
1847
1848 if (camera.requires_zoom_to_volumes) {
1849 zoom_to_volumes();
1850 _resize((unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width(), (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height());
1851 camera.requires_zoom_to_volumes = false;
1852 }
1853
1854 camera.apply_view_matrix();
1855 camera.apply_projection(_max_bounding_box(true, true, true));
1856
1857 GLfloat position_cam[4] = { 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f };
1858 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_POSITION, position_cam));
1859 GLfloat position_top[4] = { -0.5f, -0.5f, 1.0f, 0.0f };
1860 glsafe(::glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, position_top));
1861
1862 wxGetApp().imgui()->new_frame();
1863
1864 if (m_picking_enabled) {
1865 if (m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging())
1866 // picking pass using rectangle selection
1867 _rectangular_selection_picking_pass();
1868 //BBS: enable picking when no volumes for partplate logic
1869 //else if (!m_volumes.empty())
1870 else
1871 // regular picking pass
1872 _picking_pass();
1873 }
1874
1875#if ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1876 if (!m_picking_enabled || !m_show_picking_texture) {
1877#endif // ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1878 // draw scene
1879 glsafe(::glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
1880 _render_background();
1881
1882 //BBS add partplater rendering logic
1883 bool only_current = false, only_body = false, show_axes = true, no_partplate = false;
1884 GLGizmosManager::EType gizmo_type = m_gizmos.get_current_type();
1885 if (!m_main_toolbar.is_enabled()) {
1886 //only_body = true;
1887 only_current = true;
1888 }
1889 else if ((gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports) || (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::Seam) || (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation))
1890 no_partplate = true;
1891
1892 /* view3D render*/
1893 int hover_id = (m_hover_plate_idxs.size() > 0)?m_hover_plate_idxs.front():-1;
1894 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasView3D) {
1895 //BBS: add outline logic
1896 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque, !m_gizmos.is_running());
1897 _render_sla_slices();
1898 _render_selection();
1899 if (!no_partplate)
1900 _render_bed(!camera.is_looking_downward(), show_axes);
1901 if (!no_partplate) //BBS: add outline logic
1902 _render_platelist(!camera.is_looking_downward(), only_current, only_body, hover_id, true);
1903 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent, !m_gizmos.is_running());
1904 }
1905 /* preview render */
1906 else if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasPreview && m_render_preview) {
1907 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque, !m_gizmos.is_running());
1908 _render_sla_slices();
1909 _render_selection();
1910 _render_bed(!camera.is_looking_downward(), show_axes);
1911 _render_platelist(!camera.is_looking_downward(), only_current, true, hover_id);
1912 // BBS: GUI refactor: add canvas size as parameters
1913 _render_gcode(cnv_size.get_width(), cnv_size.get_height());
1914 }
1915 /* assemble render*/
1916 else if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
1917 //BBS: add outline logic
1918 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Opaque, !m_gizmos.is_running());
1919 //_render_bed(!camera.is_looking_downward(), show_axes);
1920 _render_plane();
1921 //BBS: add outline logic insteadof selection under assemble view
1922 //_render_selection();
1923 // BBS: add outline logic
1924 _render_objects(GLVolumeCollection::ERenderType::Transparent, !m_gizmos.is_running());
1925 }
1926
1927 _render_sequential_clearance();
1928#if ENABLE_RENDER_SELECTION_CENTER
1929 _render_selection_center();
1930#endif // ENABLE_RENDER_SELECTION_CENTER
1931
1932 // we need to set the mouse's scene position here because the depth buffer
1933 // could be invalidated by the following gizmo render methods
1934 // this position is used later into on_mouse() to drag the objects
1935 if (m_picking_enabled)
1936 m_mouse.scene_position = _mouse_to_3d(m_mouse.position.cast<coord_t>());
1937
1938 // sidebar hints need to be rendered before the gizmos because the depth buffer
1939 // could be invalidated by the following gizmo render methods
1940 _render_selection_sidebar_hints();
1941 _render_current_gizmo();
1942#if ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1943 }
1944#endif // ENABLE_RENDER_PICKING_PASS
1945
1946#if ENABLE_SHOW_CAMERA_TARGET
1947 _render_camera_target();
1948#endif // ENABLE_SHOW_CAMERA_TARGET
1949
1950 if (m_picking_enabled && m_rectangle_selection.is_dragging())
1951 m_rectangle_selection.render(*this);
1952
1953 // draw overlays
1954 _render_overlays();
1955
1956 if (wxGetApp().plater()->is_render_statistic_dialog_visible()) {
1957 ImGui::ShowMetricsWindow();
1958
1959 ImGuiWrapper& imgui = *wxGetApp().imgui();
1960 imgui.begin(std::string("Render statistics"), ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse);
1961 imgui.text("FPS (SwapBuffers() calls per second):");
1962 ImGui::SameLine();
1963 imgui.text(std::to_string(m_render_stats.get_fps_and_reset_if_needed()));
1964 ImGui::Separator();
1965 imgui.text("Compressed textures:");
1966 ImGui::SameLine();
1967 imgui.text(OpenGLManager::are_compressed_textures_supported() ? "supported" : "not supported");
1968 imgui.text("Max texture size:");
1969 ImGui::SameLine();
1970 imgui.text(std::to_string(OpenGLManager::get_gl_info().get_max_tex_size()));
1971 imgui.end();
1972 }
1973
1974#if ENABLE_PROJECT_DIRTY_STATE_DEBUG_WINDOW
1975 if (wxGetApp().is_editor() && wxGetApp().plater()->is_view3D_shown())
1976 wxGetApp().plater()->render_project_state_debug_window();
1977#endif // ENABLE_PROJECT_DIRTY_STATE_DEBUG_WINDOW
1978
1979#if ENABLE_CAMERA_STATISTICS
1980 camera.debug_render();
1981#endif // ENABLE_CAMERA_STATISTICS
1982
1983#if ENABLE_IMGUI_STYLE_EDITOR
1984 if (wxGetApp().get_mode() == ConfigOptionMode::comDevelop)
1985 _render_style_editor();
1986#endif
1987
1988
1989 std::string tooltip;
1990
1991 // Negative coordinate means out of the window, likely because the window was deactivated.
1992 // In that case the tooltip should be hidden.
1993 if (m_mouse.position.x() >= 0. && m_mouse.position.y() >= 0.) {
1994 if (tooltip.empty())
1995 tooltip = m_layers_editing.get_tooltip(*this);
1996
1997 if (tooltip.empty())
1998 tooltip = m_gizmos.get_tooltip();
1999
2000 if (tooltip.empty())
2001 tooltip = m_main_toolbar.get_tooltip();
2002
2003 //BBS: GUI refactor: GLToolbar
2004 if (tooltip.empty())
2005 tooltip = m_assemble_view_toolbar.get_tooltip();
2006
2007 if (tooltip.empty())
2008 tooltip = wxGetApp().plater()->get_collapse_toolbar().get_tooltip();
2009
2010 // BBS
2011#if 0
2012 if (tooltip.empty())
2013 tooltip = wxGetApp().plater()->get_view_toolbar().get_tooltip();
2014#endif
2015 }
2016
2017 set_tooltip(tooltip);
2018
2019 if (m_tooltip_enabled)
2020 m_tooltip.render(m_mouse.position, *this);
2021
2022 wxGetApp().plater()->get_mouse3d_controller().render_settings_dialog(*this);
2023
2024 if (m_canvas_type != ECanvasType::CanvasAssembleView) {
2025 float right_margin = SLIDER_DEFAULT_RIGHT_MARGIN;
2026 float bottom_margin = SLIDER_DEFAULT_BOTTOM_MARGIN;
2027 if (m_canvas_type == ECanvasType::CanvasPreview) {
2028 right_margin = SLIDER_RIGHT_MARGIN;
2029 bottom_margin = SLIDER_BOTTOM_MARGIN;
2030 }
2031 wxGetApp().plater()->get_notification_manager()->render_notifications(*this, get_overlay_window_width(), bottom_margin, right_margin);
2032 }
2033
2034 wxGetApp().imgui()->render();
2035
2036 m_canvas->SwapBuffers();
2037 m_render_stats.increment_fps_counter();
2038}
REQUIRES_ZOOM_TO_PLATE_IDLE
#define REQUIRES_ZOOM_TO_PLATE_IDLE

)
2047{
2048 GLShaderProgram* shader = wxGetApp().get_shader("thumbnail");
2049 ModelObjectPtrs& model_objects = GUI::wxGetApp().model().objects;
2050 std::vector<std::array<float, 4>> colors = ::get_extruders_colors();
2051 switch (OpenGLManager::get_framebuffers_type())
2052 {
2053 case OpenGLManager::EFramebufferType::Arb:
2054 { render_thumbnail_framebuffer(thumbnail_data, w, h, thumbnail_params,

Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ render_thumbnail_framebuffer()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::render_thumbnail_framebuffer ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
PartPlateList &  partplate_list,
ModelObjectPtrs &  model_objects,
const GLVolumeCollection &  volumes,
std::vector< std::array< float, 4 > > &  extruder_colors,
GLShaderProgram *  shader,
Camera::EType  camera_type,
bool  use_top_view = false,
bool  for_picking = false 
)
static
5701{
5702 thumbnail_data.set(w, h);
5703 if (!thumbnail_data.is_valid())
5704 return;
5705
5706 bool multisample = OpenGLManager::can_multisample();
5707 if (for_picking)
5708 multisample = false;
5709 //if (!multisample)
5710 // glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5711
5712 GLint max_samples;
5713 glsafe(::glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_SAMPLES, &max_samples));
5714 GLsizei num_samples = max_samples / 2;
5715
5716 GLuint render_fbo;
5717 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
5718 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
5719
5720 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_thumbnail prepare: w %1%, h %2%, max_samples %3%, render_fbo %4%") %w %h %max_samples % render_fbo;
5721 GLuint render_tex = 0;
5722 GLuint render_tex_buffer = 0;
5723 if (multisample) {
5724 // use renderbuffer instead of texture to avoid the need to use glTexImage2DMultisample which is available only since OpenGL 3.2
5725 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5726 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
5727 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_RGBA8, w, h));
5728 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_tex_buffer));
5729 }
5730 else {
5731 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
5732 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
5733 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5734 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5735 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5736 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5737 }
5738
5739 GLuint render_depth;
5740 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
5741 glsafe(::glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5742 if (multisample)
5743 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisample(GL_RENDERBUFFER, num_samples, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, w, h));
5744 else
5745 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, w, h));
5746
5747 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, GL_RENDERBUFFER, render_depth));
5748
5749 GLenum drawBufs[] = { GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 };
5750 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5751
5752 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
5753 render_thumbnail_internal(thumbnail_data, thumbnail_params, partplate_list, model_objects, volumes, extruder_colors, shader, camera_type, use_top_view, for_picking);
5754
5755 if (multisample) {
5756 GLuint resolve_fbo;
5757 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
5758 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5759
5760 GLuint resolve_tex;
5761 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5762 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex));
5763 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5764 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5765 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5766 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, resolve_tex, 0));
5767
5768 glsafe(::glDrawBuffers(1, drawBufs));
5769
5770 if (::glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER) == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE) {
5771 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, render_fbo));
5772 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_DRAW_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5773 glsafe(::glBlitFramebuffer(0, 0, w, h, 0, 0, w, h, GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT, GL_LINEAR));
5774
5775 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER, resolve_fbo));
5776 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5777 }
5778
5779 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &resolve_tex));
5780 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &resolve_fbo));
5781 }
5782 else
5783 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5784
5785#if ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5786 debug_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
5787#endif // ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5788 }
5789 else {
5790 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_thumbnail prepare: GL_FRAMEBUFFER not complete");
5791 }
5792
5793 glsafe(::glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0));
5794 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_depth));
5795 if (render_tex_buffer != 0)
5796 glsafe(::glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5797 if (render_tex != 0)
5798 glsafe(::glDeleteTextures(1, &render_tex));
5799 glsafe(::glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &render_fbo));
5800
5801 //if (!multisample)
5802 // glsafe(::glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5803 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_thumbnail prepare: finished");
5804}

5814 bool multisample = OpenGLManager::can_multisample();

5816 multisample = false;
5817 //if (!multisample)
5818 // glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5819
5820 GLint max_samples;
5821 glsafe(::glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_SAMPLES_EXT, &max_samples));
5822 GLsizei num_samples = max_samples / 2;
5823
5824 GLuint render_fbo;
5825 glsafe(::glGenFramebuffersEXT(1, &render_fbo));
5826 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, render_fbo));
5827
5828 GLuint render_tex = 0;
5829 GLuint render_tex_buffer = 0;
5830 if (multisample) {
5831 // use renderbuffer instead of texture to avoid the need to use glTexImage2DMultisample which is available only since OpenGL 3.2
5832 glsafe(::glGenRenderbuffersEXT(1, &render_tex_buffer));
5833 glsafe(::glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_tex_buffer));
5834 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisampleEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, num_samples, GL_RGBA8, w, h));
5835 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_tex_buffer));
5836 }
5837 else {
5838 glsafe(::glGenTextures(1, &render_tex));
5839 glsafe(::glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex));
5840 glsafe(::glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA8, w, h, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, nullptr));
5841 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5842 glsafe(::glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR));
5843 glsafe(::glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT, GL_TEXTURE_2D, render_tex, 0));
5844 }
5845
5846 GLuint render_depth;

5848 glsafe(::glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5849 if (multisample)
5850 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageMultisampleEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, num_samples, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, w, h));
5851 else
5852 glsafe(::glRenderbufferStorageEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT, w, h));
5853
5854 glsafe(::glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, render_depth));
5855

5865 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, resolve_fbo));
5866

5874

5876

5878 glsafe(::glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_READ_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, render_fbo));

5884 }
5885

5893 debug_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
5894#endif // ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT

5489 //BBS modify visible calc function
5490 int plate_idx = thumbnail_params.plate_id;
5491 PartPlate* plate = partplate_list.get_plate(plate_idx);
5492 BoundingBoxf3 plate_build_volume = plate->get_build_volume();
5493 plate_build_volume.min(0) -= Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5494 plate_build_volume.min(1) -= Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5495 plate_build_volume.min(2) -= Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5496 plate_build_volume.max(0) += Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5497 plate_build_volume.max(1) += Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5498 plate_build_volume.max(2) += Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;

5502 plate_build_volume.max(2) = std::max(plate_build_volume.max(2), h);
5503 }*/
5504
5505 auto is_visible = [plate_idx, plate_build_volume](const GLVolume& v) {
5506 bool ret = v.printable;
5507 if (plate_idx >= 0) {
5508 bool contained = false;
5509 BoundingBoxf3 plate_bbox = plate_build_volume;
5510 plate_bbox.min(2) = -1e10;
5511 const BoundingBoxf3& volume_bbox = v.transformed_convex_hull_bounding_box();
5512 if (plate_bbox.contains(volume_bbox) && (volume_bbox.max(2) > 0)) {
5513 contained = true;
5514 }
5515 ret &= contained;
5516 }
5517 else {
5518 ret &= (!v.shader_outside_printer_detection_enabled || !v.is_outside);
5519 }
5520 return ret;
5521 };
5522
5523 static std::array<float, 4> curr_color;
5524 static const std::array<float, 4> orange = { 0.923f, 0.504f, 0.264f, 1.0f };
5525 static const std::array<float, 4> gray = { 0.64f, 0.64f, 0.64f, 1.0f };
5526
5527 GLVolumePtrs visible_volumes;
5528
5529 for (GLVolume* vol : volumes.volumes) {
5530 if (!vol->is_modifier && !vol->is_wipe_tower && (!thumbnail_params.parts_only || vol->composite_id.volume_id >= 0)) {
5531 if (is_visible(*vol)) {
5532 visible_volumes.emplace_back(vol);
5533 }
5534 }
5535 }

5541 volumes_box.max.z() = 0;

5543 for (const GLVolume* vol : visible_volumes) {
5544 volumes_box.merge(vol->transformed_bounding_box());
5545 }
5546 }
5547 volumes_box.min.z() = -Slic3r::BuildVolume::SceneEpsilon;
5548 double width = volumes_box.max.x() - volumes_box.min.x();
5549 double depth = volumes_box.max.y() - volumes_box.min.y();
5550 double height = volumes_box.max.z() - volumes_box.min.z();

5552 volumes_box.min.x() = volumes_box.min.x() - width * 0.1f;
5553 volumes_box.max.y() = volumes_box.max.y() + depth * 0.1f;
5554 volumes_box.min.y() = volumes_box.min.y() - depth * 0.1f;
5555 volumes_box.max.z() = volumes_box.max.z() + height * 0.1f;
5556 volumes_box.min.z() = volumes_box.min.z() - height * 0.1f;

5558 Camera camera;
5559 camera.set_type(camera_type);

5561 //plate_build_volume.min(2) = - plate_build_volume.max(2);
5562 camera.set_scene_box(plate_build_volume);

5566 //plate_box.min.z() = 0.0;

5571 float center_y = (plate_build_volume.max(1) + plate_build_volume.min(1))/2;

5573 Vec3d center(center_x, center_y, 0.f);
5574 double zoom_ratio, scale_x, scale_y;
5575
5576 scale_x = ((double)thumbnail_data.width)/(plate_build_volume.max(0) - plate_build_volume.min(0));
5577 scale_y = ((double)thumbnail_data.height)/(plate_build_volume.max(1) - plate_build_volume.min(1));
5578 zoom_ratio = (scale_x <= scale_y)?scale_x:scale_y;
5579 camera.look_at(center + distance_z * Vec3d::UnitZ(), center, Vec3d::UnitY());
5580 camera.set_zoom(zoom_ratio);

5588 camera.apply_view_matrix();

5591 }
5592
5593 camera.apply_view_matrix();

5595 camera.apply_projection(plate_build_volume);

5608 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));

5625 for (GLVolume* vol : visible_volumes) {
5626 // Object picking mode. Render the object with a color encoding the object index.
5627 // we reserve color = (0,0,0) for occluders (as the printbed)
5628 // so we shift volumes' id by 1 to get the proper color
5629 //BBS: remove the bed picking logic
5630 unsigned int id = vol->model_object_ID;
5631 //unsigned int id = 1 + volume.second.first;
5632 unsigned int r = (id & (0x000000FF << 0)) >> 0;
5633 unsigned int g = (id & (0x000000FF << 8)) >> 8;
5634 unsigned int b = (id & (0x000000FF << 16)) >> 16;
5635 unsigned int a = 0xFF;

5640 curr_color[3] = (GLfloat)a * INV_255;

5642
5643 bool is_active = vol->is_active;
5644 vol->is_active = true;
5645 vol->simple_render(nullptr, model_objects, extruder_colors);
5646 vol->is_active = is_active;
5647 }
5648
5649 //glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_NORMAL_ARRAY));
5650 //glsafe(::glDisableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY));
5651
5652 glsafe(::glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE));
5653
5654 //if (OpenGLManager::can_multisample())
5655 // glsafe(::glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE));
5656 }
5657 else {
5658 shader->start_using();
5659 shader->set_uniform("emission_factor", 0.1f);
5660 for (GLVolume* vol : visible_volumes) {
5661 //BBS set render color for thumbnails
5662 curr_color[0] = vol->color[0];
5663 curr_color[1] = vol->color[1];
5664 curr_color[2] = vol->color[2];
5665 curr_color[3] = vol->color[3];
5666
5667 std::array<float, 4> new_color = adjust_color_for_rendering(curr_color);
5668 shader->set_uniform("uniform_color", new_color);
5669 shader->set_uniform("volume_world_matrix", vol->world_matrix());

5671 //shader->set_uniform("uniform_color", orange);
5672 /*if (plate_idx > 0) {
5673 shader->set_uniform("uniform_color", orange);
5674 }
5675 else {

5677 }*/
5678 // the volume may have been deactivated by an active gizmo
5679 bool is_active = vol->is_active;
5680 vol->is_active = true;
5681 vol->simple_render(shader, model_objects, extruder_colors);
5682 vol->is_active = is_active;
5683 }
5684 shader->stop_using();
5685 }
5686
5687 glsafe(::glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST));

5690 //plate->render( false, true, true);
5691

5693 //if (thumbnail_params.transparent_background)
5694 // glsafe(::glClearColor(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f));
5695 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(info) << boost::format("render_thumbnail: finished");
