void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::render_thumbnail_legacy ( ThumbnailData &  thumbnail_data,
unsigned int  w,
unsigned int  h,
const ThumbnailsParams &  thumbnail_params,
PartPlateList &  partplate_list,
ModelObjectPtrs &  model_objects,
const GLVolumeCollection &  volumes,
std::vector< std::array< float, 4 > > &  extruder_colors,
GLShaderProgram *  shader,
Camera::EType  camera_type 
)
private
5910{
5911 // check that thumbnail size does not exceed the default framebuffer size
5912 const Size& cnv_size = get_canvas_size();
5913 unsigned int cnv_w = (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_width();
5914 unsigned int cnv_h = (unsigned int)cnv_size.get_height();
5915 if (w > cnv_w || h > cnv_h) {
5916 float ratio = std::min((float)cnv_w / (float)w, (float)cnv_h / (float)h);
5917 w = (unsigned int)(ratio * (float)w);
5918 h = (unsigned int)(ratio * (float)h);
5919 }
5920
5921 thumbnail_data.set(w, h);
5922 if (!thumbnail_data.is_valid())
5923 return;
5924
5925 render_thumbnail_internal(thumbnail_data, thumbnail_params, partplate_list, model_objects, volumes, extruder_colors, shader, camera_type);
5926
5927 glsafe(::glReadPixels(0, 0, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, (void*)thumbnail_data.pixels.data()));
5928#if ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT
5929 debug_output_thumbnail(thumbnail_data);
5930#endif // ENABLE_THUMBNAIL_GENERATOR_DEBUG_OUTPUT

◆ schedule_extra_frame()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::schedule_extra_frame ( int  miliseconds)
3704{
3705 // Schedule idle event right now
3706 if (miliseconds == 0)
3707 {
3708 // We want to wakeup idle evnt but most likely this is call inside render cycle so we need to wait
3709 if (m_in_render)
3710 miliseconds = 33;
3711 else {
3712 m_dirty = true;
3713 wxWakeUpIdle();
3714 return;
3715 }
3716 }
3717 int remaining_time = m_render_timer.GetInterval();
3718 // Timer is not running
3719 if (!m_render_timer.IsRunning()) {
3720 m_render_timer.StartOnce(miliseconds);
3721 // Timer is running - restart only if new period is shorter than remaning period
3722 } else {
3723 if (miliseconds + 20 < remaining_time) {
3724 m_render_timer.Stop();
3725 m_render_timer.StartOnce(miliseconds);
3726 }
3727 }
3728}

References m_dirty, m_in_render, and m_render_timer.

Referenced by Slic3r::GUI::NotificationManager::push_notification_data(), Slic3r::GUI::GLGizmoSimplify::request_rerender(), and Slic3r::GUI::NotificationManager::update_notifications().

◆ toggle_model_objects_visibility()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::toggle_model_objects_visibility ( bool  visible,
const ModelObject *  mo = nullptr,
int  instance_idx = -1,
const ModelVolume *  mv = nullptr 
)
1397{
1398 for (GLVolume* vol : m_volumes.volumes) {
1399 // BBS: add partplate logic
1400 if (vol->composite_id.object_id >= 1000 &&
1401 vol->composite_id.object_id < 1000 + wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_plate_count()) { // wipe tower
1402 vol->is_active = (visible && mo == nullptr);
1403 }
1404 else {
1405 if ((mo == nullptr || m_model->objects[vol->composite_id.object_id] == mo)
1406 && (instance_idx == -1 || vol->composite_id.instance_id == instance_idx)
1407 && (mv == nullptr || m_model->objects[vol->composite_id.object_id]->volumes[vol->composite_id.volume_id] == mv)) {
1408 vol->is_active = visible;
1409
1410 if (instance_idx == -1) {
1411 vol->force_native_color = false;
1412 vol->force_neutral_color = false;
1413 } else {
1414 const GLGizmosManager& gm = get_gizmos_manager();
1415 auto gizmo_type = gm.get_current_type();
1416 if ( (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::FdmSupports
1417 || gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::Seam)
1418 && ! vol->is_modifier)
1419 vol->force_neutral_color = true;
1420 else if (gizmo_type == GLGizmosManager::MmuSegmentation)
1421 vol->is_active = false;
1422 else
1423 vol->force_native_color = true;
1424 }
1425 }
1426 }
1427 }
1428 if (visible && !mo)
1429 toggle_sla_auxiliaries_visibility(true, mo, instance_idx);
1430
1431 if (!mo && !visible && !m_model->objects.empty() && (m_model->objects.size() > 1 || m_model->objects.front()->instances.size() > 1))
1432 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SomethingNotShown, true);
1433
1434 if (!mo && visible)
1435 _set_warning_notification(EWarning::SomethingNotShown, false);
1436}

1387 vol->composite_id.object_id < 1000 + wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_plate_count())

◆ update_instance_printable_state_for_object()

1443

◆ update_sequential_clearance()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::update_sequential_clearance ( )
5021{
5022 if (current_printer_technology() != ptFFF || (fff_print()->config().print_sequence == PrintSequence::ByLayer))
5023 return;
5024
5025 if (m_gizmos.is_dragging())
5026 return;
5027
5028 // collects instance transformations from volumes
5029 // first define temporary cache
5030 unsigned int instances_count = 0;
5031 std::vector<std::vector<std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>>> instance_transforms;
5032 for (size_t obj = 0; obj < m_model->objects.size(); ++obj) {
5033 instance_transforms.emplace_back(std::vector<std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>>());
5034 const ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[obj];
5035 for (size_t i = 0; i < model_object->instances.size(); ++i) {
5036 instance_transforms[obj].emplace_back(std::optional<Geometry::Transformation>());
5037 ++instances_count;
5038 }
5039 }
5040
5041 //if (instances_count == 1)
5042 // return;
5043
5044 // second fill temporary cache with data from volumes
5045 for (const GLVolume* v : m_volumes.volumes) {
5046 if (v->is_modifier || v->is_wipe_tower)
5047 continue;
5048
5049 auto& transform = instance_transforms[v->object_idx()][v->instance_idx()];
5050 if (!transform.has_value())
5051 transform = v->get_instance_transformation();
5052 }
5053
5054 // calculates objects 2d hulls (see also: Print::sequential_print_horizontal_clearance_valid())
5055 // this is done only the first time this method is called while moving the mouse,
5056 // the results are then cached for following displacements
5057 if (m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement) {
5058 m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hull_2d_cache.clear();
5059 float shrink_factor = static_cast<float>(scale_(0.5 * fff_print()->config().extruder_clearance_radius.value - EPSILON));
5060 double mitter_limit = scale_(0.1);
5061 m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hull_2d_cache.reserve(m_model->objects.size());
5062 for (size_t i = 0; i < m_model->objects.size(); ++i) {
5063 ModelObject* model_object = m_model->objects[i];
5064 ModelInstance* model_instance0 = model_object->instances.front();
5065 Polygon hull_no_offset = model_object->convex_hull_2d(Geometry::assemble_transform({ 0.0, 0.0, model_instance0->get_offset().z() }, model_instance0->get_rotation(),
5066 model_instance0->get_scaling_factor(), model_instance0->get_mirror()));
5067 auto tmp = offset(hull_no_offset,
5068 // Shrink the extruder_clearance_radius a tiny bit, so that if the object arrangement algorithm placed the objects
5069 // exactly by satisfying the extruder_clearance_radius, this test will not trigger collision.
5070 shrink_factor,
5071 jtRound, mitter_limit);
5072 Polygon hull_2d = !tmp.empty() ? tmp.front() : hull_no_offset;// tmp may be empty due to clipper's bug, see STUDIO-2452
5073
5074 Pointf3s& cache_hull_2d = m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hull_2d_cache.emplace_back(Pointf3s());
5075 cache_hull_2d.reserve(hull_2d.points.size());
5076 for (const Point& p : hull_2d.points) {
5077 cache_hull_2d.emplace_back(unscale<double>(p.x()), unscale<double>(p.y()), 0.0);
5078 }
5079 }
5080 m_sequential_print_clearance_first_displacement = false;
5081 }
5082
5083 // calculates instances 2d hulls (see also: Print::sequential_print_horizontal_clearance_valid())
5084 //BBS: add the height logic
5085 PartPlate* plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
5086 Polygons polygons;
5087 std::vector<std::pair<Polygon, float>> height_polygons;
5088 polygons.reserve(instances_count);
5089 height_polygons.reserve(instances_count);
5090 std::vector<struct height_info> convex_and_bounding_boxes;
5091 struct height_info
5092 {
5093 double instance_height;
5094 BoundingBox bounding_box;
5095 Polygon hull_polygon;
5096 };
5097 for (size_t i = 0; i < instance_transforms.size(); ++i) {
5098 const auto& instances = instance_transforms[i];
5099 double rotation_z0 = instances.front()->get_rotation().z();
5100 int index = 0;
5101 for (const auto& instance : instances) {
5102 Geometry::Transformation transformation;
5103 const Vec3d& offset = instance->get_offset();
5104 transformation.set_offset({ offset.x(), offset.y(), 0.0 });
5105 transformation.set_rotation(Z, instance->get_rotation().z() - rotation_z0);
5106 const Transform3d& trafo = transformation.get_matrix();
5107 const Pointf3s& hull_2d = m_sequential_print_clearance.m_hull_2d_cache[i];
5108 Points inst_pts;
5109 inst_pts.reserve(hull_2d.size());
5110 for (size_t j = 0; j < hull_2d.size(); ++j) {
5111 const Vec3d p = trafo * hull_2d[j];
5112 inst_pts.emplace_back(scaled<double>(p.x()), scaled<double>(p.y()));
5113 }
5114 Polygon convex_hull(std::move(inst_pts));
5115 BoundingBox bouding_box = convex_hull.bounding_box();
5116 BoundingBox plate_bb = plate->get_bounding_box_crd();
5117 double instance_height = m_model->objects[i]->get_instance_max_z(index++);
5118 //skip the object for not current plate
5119 if (!plate_bb.overlap(bouding_box))
5120 continue;
5121 convex_and_bounding_boxes.push_back({instance_height, bouding_box, convex_hull});
5122 polygons.emplace_back(std::move(convex_hull));
5123 }
5124 }
5125
5126 //sort the print instance
5127 std::sort(convex_and_bounding_boxes.begin(), convex_and_bounding_boxes.end(),
5128 [](auto &l, auto &r) {
5129 auto ly1 = l.bounding_box.min.y();
5130 auto ly2 = l.bounding_box.max.y();
5131 auto ry1 = r.bounding_box.min.y();
5132 auto ry2 = r.bounding_box.max.y();
5133 auto inter_min = std::max(ly1, ry1);
5134 auto inter_max = std::min(ly2, ry2);
5135 auto lx = l.bounding_box.min.x();
5136 auto rx = r.bounding_box.min.x();
5137 if (inter_max - inter_min > 0)
5138 return (lx < rx) || ((lx == rx)&&(ly1 < ry1));
5139 else
5140 return (ly1 < ry1);
5141 });
5142
5143 /*bool has_interlaced_objects = false;
5144 for (int k = 0; k < bounding_box_count; k++)
5145 {
5146 Polygon& convex = convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].hull_polygon;
5147 BoundingBox& bbox = convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].bounding_box;
5148 auto iy1 = bbox.min.y();
5149 auto iy2 = bbox.max.y();
5150
5151 for (int i = k+1; i < bounding_box_count; i++)
5152 {
5153 Polygon& next_convex = convex_and_bounding_boxes[i].hull_polygon;
5154 BoundingBox& next_bbox = convex_and_bounding_boxes[i].bounding_box;
5155 auto py1 = next_bbox.min.y();
5156 auto py2 = next_bbox.max.y();
5157 auto inter_min = std::max(iy1, py1); // min y of intersection
5158 auto inter_max = std::min(iy2, py2); // max y of intersection. length=max_y-min_y>0 means intersection exists
5159 if (inter_max - inter_min > 0) {
5160 has_interlaced_objects = true;
5161 break;
5162 }
5163 }
5164 if (has_interlaced_objects)
5165 break;
5166 }*/
5167
5168 int bounding_box_count = convex_and_bounding_boxes.size();
5169 double printable_height = fff_print()->config().printable_height;
5170 double hc1 = fff_print()->config().extruder_clearance_height_to_lid;
5171 double hc2 = fff_print()->config().extruder_clearance_height_to_rod;
5172 for (int k = 0; k < bounding_box_count; k++)
5173 {
5174 Polygon& convex = convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].hull_polygon;
5175 BoundingBox& bbox = convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].bounding_box;
5176 auto iy1 = bbox.min.y();
5177 auto iy2 = bbox.max.y();
5178 double height = (k == (bounding_box_count - 1))?printable_height:hc1;
5179
5180 /*if (has_interlaced_objects) {
5181 if ((k < (bounding_box_count - 1)) && (convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].instance_height > hc2)) {
5182 height_polygons.emplace_back(std::make_pair(convex, hc2));
5183 }
5184 }
5185 else {
5186 if ((k < (bounding_box_count - 1)) && (convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].instance_height > hc1)) {
5187 height_polygons.emplace_back(std::make_pair(convex, hc1));
5188 }
5189 }*/
5190
5191 for (int i = k+1; i < bounding_box_count; i++)
5192 {
5193 Polygon& next_convex = convex_and_bounding_boxes[i].hull_polygon;
5194 BoundingBox& next_bbox = convex_and_bounding_boxes[i].bounding_box;
5195 auto py1 = next_bbox.min.y();
5196 auto py2 = next_bbox.max.y();
5197 auto inter_min = std::max(iy1, py1); // min y of intersection
5198 auto inter_max = std::min(iy2, py2); // max y of intersection. length=max_y-min_y>0 means intersection exists
5199 if (inter_max - inter_min > 0) {
5200 height = hc2;
5201 break;
5202 }
5203 }
5204 if (height < convex_and_bounding_boxes[k].instance_height)
5205 height_polygons.emplace_back(std::make_pair(convex, height));
5206 }
5207
5208 // sends instances 2d hulls to be rendered

◆ update_ui_from_settings()

void Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::update_ui_from_settings ( )
4843{
4844 m_dirty = true;
4845
4846#if __APPLE__
4847 // Update OpenGL scaling on OSX after the user toggled the "use_retina_opengl" settings in Preferences dialog.
4848 const float orig_scaling = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4849
4850 const bool use_retina = true;
4851 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "GLCanvas3D: Use Retina OpenGL: " << use_retina;
4852 m_retina_helper->set_use_retina(use_retina);
4853 const float new_scaling = m_retina_helper->get_scale_factor();
4854
4855 if (new_scaling != orig_scaling) {
4856 BOOST_LOG_TRIVIAL(debug) << "GLCanvas3D: Scaling factor: " << new_scaling;
4857
4858 Camera& camera = wxGetApp().plater()->get_camera();
4859 camera.set_zoom(camera.get_zoom() * new_scaling / orig_scaling);
4860 _refresh_if_shown_on_screen();
4861 }
4862#endif // ENABLE_RETINA_GL
4863
4864#ifdef SUPPORT_COLLAPSE_BUTTON
4865 if (wxGetApp().is_editor())
4866 wxGetApp().plater()->enable_collapse_toolbar(wxGetApp().app_config->get("show_collapse_button") == "1");
4867#endif
4868}

References _refresh_if_shown_on_screen(), camera, Slic3r::GUI::Camera::get_zoom(), m_dirty, and Slic3r::GUI::Camera::set_zoom().

BoundingBoxf3 Slic3r::GUI::GLCanvas3D::volumes_bounding_box ( ) const
1506{
1507 BoundingBoxf3 bb;
1508 for (const GLVolume* volume : m_volumes.volumes) {
1509 if (!m_apply_zoom_to_volumes_filter || ((volume != nullptr) && volume->zoom_to_volumes))

1687{
1688 BoundingBoxf3 box;
1689 if (plate_idx == REQUIRES_ZOOM_TO_ALL_PLATE) {
1690 box = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_bounding_box();
1691 box.min.z() = 0.0;
1692 box.max.z() = 0.0;
1693 _zoom_to_box(box, DefaultCameraZoomToPlateMarginFactor);

1697 plate = wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_curr_plate();
1698 }else {
1699 assert(plate_idx >= 0 && plate_idx < wxGetApp().plater()->get_partplate_list().get_plate_count());

1704 box.max.z() = 0.0;

1706 }
